text: 已知椭圆$C$: $\frac{x^{2}}{a^{2}}+\frac{y^{2}}{b^{2}}=1(a>b>0)$左、右焦点分别为$F_{1}$、$F_{2}$，过$F_{1}$且倾斜角为$30^{\circ}$的直线$l_{1}$与过$F_{2}$的直线$l_{2}$交于$P$点，点$P$在椭圆上，且$\angle F_{1} P F_{2}=90^{\circ}$.则椭圆$C$的离心率$e$=?

text: 已知椭圆$C$: $\frac{x^{2}}{a^{2}}+\frac{y^{2}}{b^{2}}=1(a>b>0)$，过右焦点$F$且斜率为$\sqrt{3}$的直线与椭圆$C$相交于$A$、$B$两点，若$\overrightarrow{A F}=\frac{1}{2} \overrightarrow{F B}$，则椭圆$C$的离心率为?

text: 设直线$l$: $y=x+1$与椭圆$C$: $\frac{x^{2}}{a^{2}}+\frac{y^{2}}{b^{2}}=1(a>b>0)$相交于$A$、$B$两点，与$x$轴相交于左焦点$F$，且$\overrightarrow{A F}=3 \overrightarrow{F B}$，则椭圆的离心率$e$=?
fact_expressions: l: Line;C: Ellipse;b: Number;a: Number;A: Point;F: Point;B: Point;e: Number;a > b;b > 0;Expression(C) = (y^2/b^2 + x^2/a^2 = 1);Expression(l)=(y=x+1);Intersection(l,C)={A,B};Intersection(l,xAxis)=F;LeftFocus(C)=F;VectorOf(A, F) = 3*VectorOf(F, B);Eccentricity(C) = e

text: 已知椭圆$\frac{x^{2}}{25}+\frac{y^{2}}{16}=1$上一点$P$到其左准线的距离为$10$, $F$是该椭圆的左焦点，若点$M$满足$\overrightarrow{O M}=\frac{1}{2}(\overrightarrow{O P}+\overrightarrow{O F})$(其中$O$为坐标原点)，则$|O M|$=?
fact_expressions: G: Ellipse;Expression(G) = (x^2/25 + y^2/16 = 1);P: Point;PointOnCurve(P, G);Distance(P, LeftDirectrix(G)) = 10;F: Point;LeftFocus(G) = F;M: Point;O: Origin;VectorOf(O, M) = (1/2)*(VectorOf(O, P) + VectorOf(O, F))

text: 已知双曲线$\frac{x^{2}}{a^{2}}-\frac{y^{2}}{b^{2}}=1(a>0, b>0)$的一条渐近线与$y=\sqrt{3} x-1$平行，且它的一个焦点在抛物线$y^{2}=8 \sqrt{2} x$的准线上，则双曲线的方程为?
fact_expressions: G: Hyperbola;b: Number;a: Number;H: Parabola;a>0;b>0;l:Line;Expression(G) = (-y^2/b^2 + x^2/a^2 = 1);Expression(H) = (y^2 = 8*sqrt(2)*x);Expression(l)=(y=sqrt(3)*x-1);IsParallel(l,OneOf(Asymptote(G)));PointOnCurve(OneOf(Focus(G)),Directrix(H))

text: 已知双曲线$\frac{x^{2}}{a^{2}}-\frac{y^{2}}{b^{2}}=1(a>0, b>0)$的一条渐近线方程是$y=\sqrt{3} x$，它的一个焦点在抛物线$y^{2}=24 x$的准线上，则双曲线的方程为?
fact_expressions: G: Hyperbola;b: Number;a: Number;H: Parabola;a>0;b>0;Expression(G) = (-y^2/b^2 + x^2/a^2 = 1);Expression(H) = (y^2 = 24*x);Expression(OneOf(Asymptote(G))) = (y = sqrt(3)*x);PointOnCurve(OneOf(Focus(G)), Directrix(H))

text: 过抛物线$y^{2}=-4 x$的焦点$F$作直线$l$，与抛物线交于$A$、$B$两点，与准线交于$C$点，若$\overrightarrow{F C}=4 \overrightarrow{F B}$，则$|\overrightarrow{A B}|$=?
fact_expressions: G: Parabola;Expression(G) = (y^2 = -4*x);F: Point;Focus(G) = F;l: Line;PointOnCurve(F, l);A: Point;B: Point;Intersection(l, G) = {A, B};C: Point;Intersection(l, Directrix(G)) = C;VectorOf(F, C) = 4*VectorOf(F, B)

text: 过抛物线$y^{2}=4 x$的焦点$F$作直线$l$，与抛物线交于$A$、$B$两点，与准线交于$C$点，若$\overrightarrow{F C}=4 \overrightarrow{F B}$，则$|\overrightarrow{A B}|$=?
fact_expressions: G: Parabola;Expression(G) = (y^2 = 4*x);F: Point;Focus(G) = F;l: Line;PointOnCurve(F, l);A: Point;B: Point;Intersection(l, G) = {A, B};C: Point;Intersection(l, Directrix(G)) = C;VectorOf(F, C) = 4*VectorOf(F, B)

text: 过双曲线$\frac{x^{2}}{a^{2}} - \frac{y^{2}}{b^{2}}=1 (a>0, b>0)$的右顶点$A$作斜率$-1$的直线，该直线与双曲线的两条渐近线的交点分别为$B$,$C$. 若$\overrightarrow{A B}=\frac{1}{2} \overrightarrow{B C}$, 则双曲线的离心率是?
fact_expressions: G: Hyperbola;b: Number;a: Number;H: Line;A: Point;B: Point;C: Point;a>0;b>0;Expression(G) = (-y^2/b^2 + x^2/a^2 = 1);RightVertex(G)=A;Slope(H)=-1;PointOnCurve(A,H);L1:Line;L2:Line;Asymptote(G)={L1,L2};Intersection(H,L1)=B;Intersection(H,L2)=C;VectorOf(A, B) = VectorOf(B, C)/2

text: 过双曲线$\frac{x^{2}}{a^{2}}-\frac{y^{2}}{b^{2}}=1(a>0, b>0)$的右顶点$A$作斜率为$-1$的直线，该直线与双曲线的两条渐近线的交点分别为$B$、$C$. 若$\overrightarrow{A B}=\frac{1}{2} \overrightarrow{B C}$，则双曲线的离心率是?
fact_expressions: G: Hyperbola;b: Number;a: Number;H: Line;A: Point;B: Point;C: Point;a>0;b>0;Expression(G) = (-y^2/b^2 + x^2/a^2 = 1);RightVertex(G)=A;PointOnCurve(A,H);Slope(H)=-1;L1:Line;L2:Line;Asymptote(G)={L1,L2};Intersection(H,L1)=B;Intersection(H,L2)=C;VectorOf(A, B) = VectorOf(B, C)/2

text: 双曲线$\frac{x^{2}}{a^{2}}-\frac{y^{2}}{b^{2}}=1 (a>0 , b>0)$的左、右焦点分别是$F_{1}$、$F_{2}$，过$F_{1}$作倾斜角为$30^{\circ}$的直线交双曲线右支于$M$点，若$M F_{2}$垂直于$x$轴，则双曲线的离心率为?

text: 双曲线$\frac{x^{2}}{a^{2}}-\frac{y^{2}}{b^{2}}=1(a>0, b>0)$的左、右焦点分别是$F_{1}$、$F_{2}$，过$F_{1}$作倾斜角为$45^{\circ}$的直线交双曲线右支于$M$点，若$M F_{2}$垂直于$x$轴，则双曲线的离心率为?
fact_expressions: G: Hyperbola;b: Number;a: Number;H: Line;M: Point;F2: Point;F1: Point;a>0;b>0;Expression(G) = (-y^2/b^2 + x^2/a^2 = 1);LeftFocus(G) = F1;RightFocus(G) = F2;PointOnCurve(F1, H);Inclination(H)=ApplyUnit(45,degree);Intersection(H, RightPart(G)) = M;IsPerpendicular(LineSegmentOf(M,F2),xAxis)

text: 点$p(x , y)$是椭圆$\frac{x^{2}}{a^{2}}+\frac{y^{2}}{b^{2}}=1  (a>b>0)$上的任意一点，$F_{1}$、$F_{2}$是椭圆的两个焦点，且$\angle F_{1} P F _{2} \leq 90^{\circ}$，则该椭圆的离心率的取值范围是?

text: 点$P(x, y)$是椭圆$\frac{x^{2}}{a^{2}} + \frac{y^{2}}{b^{2}}=1  (a>b>0)$上的任意一点，$F_{1}$, $F_{2}$是椭圆的两个焦点，且$\angle F_{1} P F_{2} \leq 90^{\circ}$，则该椭圆的离心率的取值范围是?

text: 若双曲线经过点$(1, \sqrt{3})$，其渐近线方程为$y=\pm 2 x$，则双曲线的方程是?
fact_expressions: G: Hyperbola;H: Point;Coordinate(H) = (1, sqrt(3));PointOnCurve(H, G);Expression(Asymptote(G)) = (y = pm*(2*x))

text: 中心在原点的双曲线，其渐近线方程是$y=\pm \sqrt{3} x$，且过点$(\sqrt{2}, \sqrt{3})$，则双曲线的标准方程为?
fact_expressions: O: Origin;Center(G) = O;G: Hyperbola;Expression(Asymptote(G)) = (y = pm*(sqrt(3)*x));H: Point;Coordinate(H) = (sqrt(2), sqrt(3));PointOnCurve(H, G)
G: Hyperbola;Expression(G) = (-y^2/b^2 + x^2/a^2 = 1);b: Number;a: Number;a>0;b>0;Eccentricity(G) = 3;H: Circle;Expression(H) = (m - 6*y + x^2 + y^2 = 0);m: Number;IsTangent(Asymptote(G), H) = True

text: 设$A(-2,0)$, $B(2,0)$，若直线$y=a x(a>0)$上存在一点$P$满足$|P A|+|P B|=6$，且$\Delta P A B$的内心到$x$轴的距离为$\frac{3 \sqrt{30}}{20}$，则$a$=?
fact_expressions: G: Line;a: Number;A: Point;B: Point;P: Point;a>0;Expression(G) = (y = a*x);Coordinate(A) = (-2, 0);Coordinate(B) = (2, 0);PointOnCurve(P,G);Abs(LineSegmentOf(P,A))+Abs(LineSegmentOf(P,B))=6;Distance(Incenter(TriangleOf(P,A,B)), xAxis) = (3*sqrt(30))/20

text: 设$A(-1,0)$, $B(1,0)$，若直线$y=k x  (k>0)$上存在一点$P$满足$|P A|+|P B|=4$，且$\Delta P A B$的内心到$x$轴的距离为$\frac{2 \sqrt{21}}{21}$，则$k$=?
fact_expressions: A: Point;Coordinate(A) = (-1, 0);B: Point;Coordinate(B) = (1, 0);G: Line;Expression(G) = (y = k*x);k: Number;k>0;P: Point;PointOnCurve(P, G);Abs(LineSegmentOf(P, A)) + Abs(LineSegmentOf(P, B)) = 4;Distance(Incenter(TriangleOf(P, A, B)), xAxis) = (2*sqrt(21))/21

text: 已知点$P(0 , 1)$，椭圆$\frac{x^{2}}{4}+y^{2}=m(m>1)$上两点$A$、$B$满足$\overrightarrow{A P}=2\overrightarrow{PB}$，则当$m$=?时，点$B$横坐标的绝对值最大.
fact_expressions: P: Point;Coordinate(P) = (0, 1);G: Ellipse;Expression(G) = (x^2/4 + y^2 = m);m: Number;m>1;A: Point;B: Point;PointOnCurve(A, G);PointOnCurve(B, G);VectorOf(A, P) = 2*VectorOf(P, B);WhenMax(Abs(XCoordinate(B)))

text: 已知点$P(0 , 1)$，椭圆$\frac{x^{2}}{4}+y^{2}=m(m>1)$上两点$A$、$B$满足$\overrightarrow{A P}=2\overrightarrow{P B}$，则当$m$=?时，点$B$横坐标的绝对值最大
fact_expressions: G: Ellipse;m: Number;P: Point;A: Point;B: Point;m>1;Expression(G) = (x^2/4 + y^2 = m);Coordinate(P) = (0, 1);PointOnCurve(A,G);PointOnCurve(B,G);VectorOf(A,P)=2*VectorOf(P,B);WhenMax(Abs(XCoordinate(B)))

text: 在焦点在$x$轴的椭圆过点$P(3 , 0)$，且长轴长是短轴长的$3$倍，则其标准方程为?

text: 若焦点在$x$轴的椭圆过点$P(3,0)$，且长轴长是短轴长的$3$倍，则其标准方程为?
fact_expressions: G: Ellipse;P: Point;Coordinate(P) = (3, 0);PointOnCurve(Focus(G),xAxis);PointOnCurve(P,G);Length(MajorAxis(G))=3*Length(MinorAxis(G))

text: $P$为抛物线$y=2 x^{2}$上一动点，当点$P$到直线$2 x-y-4=0$的距离最短时，$P$点的坐标是?

text: 椭圆$\frac{x^{2}}{4}+\frac{y^{2}}{9}=1$上一点到两焦点的距离之和为?

text: 直线$l$交椭圆$\frac{x^{2}}{2}+y^{2}=1$于$A$、$B$两点，若线段$A B$的中点坐标为$(1, \frac{1}{2})$. 则直线$l$的方程为?

text: 抛物线$x^{2}=\frac{1}{4} y$的准线方程是?

text: 抛物线$x^{2}=\frac{1}{3} y$的准线方程为?

text: 设双曲线的焦点在坐标轴上，两条渐近线方程为$y=\pm \frac{1}{3} x$，则该双曲线的离心率$e$=?

text: 已知焦点在$x$轴上的双曲线的渐近线方程为$y=\pm \frac{1}{3} x$，则该双曲线的离心率为?

text: 直线$y=kx-2$交抛物线$y^{2}=8 x$于$A$,$B$两点，若$AB$中点的横坐标是$2$, 则  $|A B|$?

text: 已知椭圆$\frac{x^{2}}{a^{2}}+y^{2}=1  (a>0)$的焦点$F_{1}$、$F_{2}$，抛物线$y^{2}=2 x$的焦点为$F$，若$\overrightarrow{F_{1} F}=3 \overrightarrow{F F_{2}}$，则$a$=?

text: 过双曲线$C$:$ \frac{x^{2}}{a^{2}}-\frac{y^{2}}{b^{2}}=1(a>0, b>0)$的一个焦点作圆$x^{2} + y^{2}=a^{2}$的两条切线，切点分别为$A$、$B$，若$\angle A O B=120 ° $（$O$是坐标原点），则双曲线$C$的离心率为?

text: 过椭圆$\frac{x^{2}}{3}+y^{2}=1$的一个焦点$F_{1}$的直线与椭圆交于$A$、$B$两点，则$A$、$B$与椭圆的另一焦点$F_{2}$构成的$\Delta A B F_{2}$的周长为?

text: 已知过点$(\sqrt{3}, 4)$的双曲线的两条渐近线为$2 x \pm y=0$，则该双曲线的方程为?
fact_expressions: H: Point;Coordinate(H) = (sqrt(3), 4);PointOnCurve(H, G);G: Hyperbola;Expression(Asymptote(G)) = (2*x + pm*y = 0)

text: 若点$P(t, 1)$在抛物线$x^{2}=2 p y(p>0)$上，且到其准线的距离为$2$，则$t$=?

text: 已知$\sin \theta+\cos \theta=\frac{1}{5}$，双曲线$x^{2} \sin \theta+y^{2} \cos \theta=1$的焦点在$y$轴上，则双曲线$C$的离心率$e$=?

text: 已知直线$l$: $x-m y+\sqrt{3} m=0$上存在点$M$满足与两点$A(-1,0)$ , $B(1,0)$连线的斜率$k_{M A}$与$k_{M B}$之积为$3$，则实数$m$的取值范围是?

text: 已知双曲线$C$: $\frac{x^{2}}{a^{2}}-\frac{y^{2}}{b^{2}}=1(a>0, b>0)$的左焦点为$F_{1}$、$P$为双曲线上一点，$P F_{1}$与双曲线$C$的渐近线平行，且$|P O|=|F_{1} O|$，其中$O$为坐标原点，则双曲线$C$的离心率$e$=?

text: 已知抛物线$y^{2}=2 p x(p>0)$的准线与曲线$4 x^{2}-\frac{3 y^{2}}{4}=1(y>0)$交于点$P$、$F$为抛物线焦点，直线$P F$的倾斜角为$135^{\circ}$，则$p$=?

text: 已知椭圆$\frac{x^{2}}{a^{2}}+\frac{y^{2}}{b^{2}}=1(a>b>0)$，点$F_{1}$、$F_{2}$是椭圆的左右焦点，点$A$是椭圆上的点，$\triangle A F_{1} F_{2}$的内切圆的圆心为$M$，若$\overrightarrow{M F_{1}}+2 \overrightarrow{M F_{2}}+2 \overrightarrow{M A}=0$，则椭圆的离心率为?

text: 已知椭圆$E$: $\frac{x^{2}}{a^{2}}+\frac{y^{2}}{b^{2}}=1(a>b>0)$的右焦点为$F$，点$M$是椭圆$E$上任意一点，点$A(0, b)$，若$\triangle A M F$的周长的最大值是$6 b$，则椭圆$E$的离心率是?

text: 双曲线的焦点在$x$轴上，虚轴长为$12$，离心率为$\frac{5}{4}$，则双曲线的标准方程为?
fact_expressions: G: Hyperbola;PointOnCurve(Focus(G), xAxis);Length(ImageinaryAxis(G)) = 12;Eccentricity(G)=5/4

text: 设$F$是椭圆$\frac{x^{2}}{4}+\frac{y^{2}}{3}=1$上的右焦点，$P$是椭圆上的动点，$A$是直线$3 x-4 y-12=0$的动点，则$|P A|-|P F|$的最小值为?
fact_expressions: F: Point;RightFocus(G) = F;G: Ellipse;Expression(G) = (x^2/4 + y^2/3 = 1);P: Point;PointOnCurve(P, G) = True;A: Point;PointOnCurve(A, H) = True;H: Line;Expression(H) = (3*x - 4*y - 12 = 0)

text: 已知$F(-4,0)$是椭圆$\frac{x^{2}}{a^{2}}+\frac{y^{2}}{b^{2}}=1(a>b>0)$的一个焦点，过$F$的直线$l$交该椭圆于$A$、$B$两点，线段$A B$的中点坐标为$(-3,1)$，则该椭圆的离心率是?
fact_expressions: l: Line;G: Ellipse;b: Number;a: Number;B: Point;A: Point;F: Point;a > b;b > 0;Expression(G) = (y^2/b^2 + x^2/a^2 = 1);Coordinate(MidPoint(LineSegmentOf(A,B))) = (-3, 1);Coordinate(F) = (-4, 0);OneOf(Focus(G)) = F;PointOnCurve(F, l);Intersection(l, G) = {A, B}

text: 已知抛物线$y^{2}=4 x$, 焦点为$F$，$\Delta ABC$三个顶点均在抛物线上，若$\overrightarrow{F A}+\overrightarrow{F B}+\overrightarrow{F C}=\overrightarrow{0}$, 则$|FA|+|FB|+|FC|$=?
fact_expressions: G: Parabola;A: Point;B: Point;C: Point;F: Point;Expression(G) = (y^2 = 4*x);Focus(G) = F;PointOnCurve(Vertex(TriangleOf(A, B, C)), G);VectorOf(F, A) + VectorOf(F, B) + VectorOf(F, C) = 0
query_expressions: Abs(LineSegmentOf(F, A)) + Abs(LineSegmentOf(F, B)) + Abs(LineSegmentOf(F, C))

text: 已知椭圆$\frac{x^{2}}{2}+\frac{y^{2}}{3}=1$ , $F_{1}$ , $F_{2}$是它的焦点，$A B$是过$F_{1}$的弦，则$\triangle A B F_{2}$的周长为?
fact_expressions: G: Ellipse;Expression(G) = (x^2/2 + y^2/3 = 1);F1: Point;F2: Point;Focus(G) = {F1,F2};A: Point;B: Point;IsChordOf(LineSegmentOf(A,B),G) = True ;PointOnCurve(F1,LineSegmentOf(A,B)) = True

text: 双曲线$\frac{x^{2}}{2}-y^{2}=1$渐近线的方程是?
fact_expressions: G: Hyperbola;Expression(G) = (x^2/2 - y^2 = 1)

text: 过双曲线$E$: $\frac{x^{2}}{a^{2}}-\frac{y^{2}}{b^{2}}=1(a>0, b>0)$的右焦点，且斜率为$2$的直线与$E$的右支有两个不同的公共点，则双曲线离心率的取值范围是?
fact_expressions: E: Hyperbola;Expression(E) = (-y^2/b^2 + x^2/a^2 = 1);b: Number;a: Number;a>0;b>0;G: Line;PointOnCurve(RightFocus(E), G);Slope(G) = 2;NumIntersection(G, RightPart(E)) = 2

text: 过双曲线$E$: $\frac{x^{2}}{a^{2}}-\frac{y^{2}}{b^{2}}=1(a, b>0)$的右焦点，且斜率为$2$的直线与$E$的右支有两个不同的公共点，则双曲线离心率的取值范围是?
fact_expressions: E: Hyperbola;Expression(E) = (-y^2/b^2 + x^2/a^2 = 1);b: Number;a: Number;a>0;b>0;G: Line;PointOnCurve(RightFocus(E), G);Slope(G) = 2;NumIntersection(G, RightPart(E)) = 2

text: 已知抛物线$C$: $y^{2}=2 p x(p>0)$，直线$l$: $x=2$交抛物线$C$于$P$、$Q$两点，且$O P \perp O Q$，则抛物线$C$的方程为?
fact_expressions: C: Parabola;Expression(C) = (y^2 = 2*(p*x));p: Number;p>0;l: Line;Expression(l) = (x = 2);P: Point;Q: Point;Intersection(l, C) = {P, Q};O: Origin;IsPerpendicular(LineSegmentOf(O, P), LineSegmentOf(O, Q))

text: 已知椭圆$4 x^{2}+n y^{2}=1$的焦点在$x$轴上，长轴长是短轴长的$2$倍，则$n$的值是?
fact_expressions: G: Ellipse;n: Number;Expression(G) = (n*y^2 + 4*x^2 = 1);PointOnCurve(Focus(G), xAxis);Length(MajorAxis(G)) = 2*Length(MinorAxis(G))

text: 渐近线为$y=\pm \sqrt{3} x$，且过点$(1,1)$的双曲线方程是?
fact_expressions: G: Hyperbola;H: Point;Coordinate(H) = (1, 1);Expression(Asymptote(G)) = (y = pm*sqrt(3)*x);PointOnCurve(H, G)

text: 若直线$l$:$y=-\frac{x}{2}+m$与曲线$C$: $y=\frac{1}{2} \sqrt{|4-x^{2}|}$有且仅有三个交点，则实数$m$的取值范围是?
fact_expressions: l: Line;C: Curve;m: Real;Expression(l)=(y=-x/2+m);Expression(C) = (y = sqrt(Abs(4 - x^2))/2);NumIntersection(l,C)=3

text: 已知$A$、$B$是抛物线$C$:$y^{2}=2 p x(p>0)$上纵坐标分别为$a$, $b(a b \neq 0)$的不同两点，若$C$在$A$、$B$两点处的切线相交于点$M$，则点$M$的纵坐标为?(结果用$a$, $b$表示)
fact_expressions: C: Parabola;p: Number;p>0;Expression(C) = (y^2 = 2*p*x);A:Point;B:Point;M:Point;a:Number;b:Number;Negation(a*b=0);PointOnCurve(A,C);PointOnCurve(B,C);YCoordinate(A)=a;YCoordinate(B)=b;Negation(A=B);Intersection(TangentOnPoint(A,C),TangentOnPoint(B,C))=M

text: 焦点在$x$轴上双曲线的一条渐近线方程为$y=2 x$，焦距为$10$，这双曲线的方程为?
fact_expressions: G: Hyperbola;PointOnCurve(Focus(G), xAxis);Expression(OneOf(Asymptote(G))) = (y = 2*x);FocalLength(G) = 10

text: 抛物线$y^{2}=2 p x(p>0)$的焦点为$F$、$M$为抛物线上的点，设$A(\frac{7}{2} p, 0)$，若$|A F|=2|M F|$ , $\Delta A M F$的面积为$\frac{27 \sqrt{2}}{2}$，则$p$的值为?
fact_expressions: G: Parabola;p: Number;A: Point;F: Point;M: Point;p>0;Expression(G) = (y^2 = 2*p*x);Focus(G)=F;PointOnCurve(M,G);Coordinate(A) = ((7/2)*p, 0);Abs(LineSegmentOf(A, F)) = 2*Abs(LineSegmentOf(M, F));Area(TriangleOf(A,M,F))=27*sqrt(2)/2

text: 一条直线过点$(\frac{1}{4}, 0)$，且与抛物线$y^{2}=x$交于$A$、$B$两点. 若$|A B|=4$，则弦$A B$的中点到直线$x+\frac{1}{2}=0$的距离等于?
fact_expressions: G: Parabola;Expression(G) = (y^2 = x);H: Line;I: Point;Coordinate(I) = (1/4, 0);PointOnCurve(I, H);A: Point;B: Point;Intersection(H, G) = {A, B};Abs(LineSegmentOf(A, B)) = 4;IsChordOf(LineSegmentOf(A, B), G);L: Line;Expression(L) = (x + 1/2 = 0)

text: 已知点$M$为抛物线$C$: $y^{2}=2 p x(p>0)$上一点，若点$M$到两定点$A(p, p)$, $F(\frac{p}{2}, 0)$的距离之和最小，则点$M$的坐标为?
fact_expressions: M: Point;PointOnCurve(M, C);C: Parabola;Expression(C) = (y^2 = 2*(p*x));p: Number;p>0;A: Point;Coordinate(A) = (p, p);F: Point;Coordinate(F) = (p/2, 0);WhenMin(Distance(M, A) + Distance(M, F))

text: 过抛物线$C$: $y^{2}=4 x$的焦点$F$的直线$l$交$C$于$A$ $B$两点，点$M(-1,2)$，若$\overrightarrow{M A} \cdot \overrightarrow{M B}=0$，则直线$l$的斜率$k$=?
fact_expressions: l: Line;C: Parabola;M: Point;A: Point;B: Point;F: Point;k: Number;Expression(C) = (y^2 = 4*x);Coordinate(M) = (-1, 2);Focus(C) = F;PointOnCurve(F, l);Intersection(l, C) = {A, B};DotProduct(VectorOf(M, A), VectorOf(M, B)) = 0;Slope(l) = k

text: 已知直线$l$: $x-y+8=0$和两点$A(2,0)$, $B(-2,-4)$，在直线$l$上求一点$P$, 使$|P A|+|P B|$最小，则$P$点坐标是?
fact_expressions: l: Line;Expression(l) = (x - y + 8 = 0);A: Point;B: Point;Coordinate(A) = (2, 0);Coordinate(B) = (-2, -4);PointOnCurve(P,l);WhenMin(Abs(LineSegmentOf(P,A))+Abs(LineSegmentOf(P,B)));P:Point

text: 已知双曲线$C$: $\frac{x^{2}}{a^{2}}-\frac{y^{2}}{b^{2}}=1(a>0, b>0)$ ,$A$为$x$轴上的异于坐标原点$O$的一点，以$A$为圆心的圆与双曲线的渐近线交于$P$、$Q$两点，若$\overrightarrow{O P}=3 \overrightarrow{O Q}$ ,且$\overrightarrow{A P} \cdot \overrightarrow{A Q}=0$，则双曲线$C$的离心率为?
fact_expressions: C: Hyperbola;b: Number;a: Number;G: Circle;O: Origin;P: Point;Q: Point;A: Point;a>0;b>0;Expression(C) = (-y^2/b^2 + x^2/a^2 = 1);PointOnCurve(A, xAxis);Negation(A = O);Center(G) = A;Intersection(G, Asymptote(C)) = {P, Q};VectorOf(O, P) = 3*VectorOf(O, Q);DotProduct(VectorOf(A, P), VectorOf(A, Q)) = 0

text: 过抛物线焦点$F$的直线与抛物线交于$A$ , $B$两点，若$A$ , $B$在抛物线准线上的射影分别为$A_{1}$、$B_{1}$则$\angle A_{1} FB_{1}$=?
fact_expressions: G: Parabola;H: Line;A1: Point;F: Point;B1: Point;A: Point;PointOnCurve(F, H);Intersection(H, G) = {A,B};Projection(A,Directrix(G))=A1;Projection(B,Directrix(G))=B1;B:Point;Focus(G)=F

text: 以椭圆$\frac{x^{2}}{8}+\frac{y^{2}}{5}=1$长轴的端点为焦点，且经过点$(3 , \sqrt{10})$的双曲线的标准方程为?
fact_expressions: G: Hyperbola;H: Ellipse;I: Point;Expression(H) = (x^2/8 + y^2/5 = 1);Coordinate(I) = (3, sqrt(10));PointOnCurve(I, G);Endpoint(MajorAxis(H))=Focus(G)

text: 已知双曲线$x^{2}-\frac{y^{2}}{m}=1$的一个焦点与抛物线$8 x+y^{2}=0$的焦点重合，则该双曲线的离心率为?
fact_expressions: G: Hyperbola;m: Number;H: Parabola;Expression(G) = (x^2 - y^2/m = 1);Expression(H) = (8*x + y^2 = 0);OneOf(Focus(G)) = Focus(H)

text: 过点$E(-\frac{p}{2}, 0)$的直线与抛物线$y^{2}=2 p x(p>0)$交于$A$、$B$两点，$F$是抛物线的焦点，若$A$为线段$E B$的中点，且$|A F|=3$，则$p$=?
fact_expressions: G: Parabola;p: Number;H: Line;E: Point;B: Point;A: Point;F: Point;p>0;Expression(G) = (y^2 = 2*(p*x));Coordinate(E) = (-p/2, 0);PointOnCurve(E, H);Intersection(H, G) = {A, B};Focus(G) = F;MidPoint(LineSegmentOf(E,B)) = A;Abs(LineSegmentOf(A, F)) = 3

text: 设点$A(-2 , \sqrt{3})$，椭圆$\frac{x^{2}}{16}+\frac{y^{2}}{12}=1$的右焦点为$F$，点$P$在椭圆上移动，当$|P A|+2|P F|$取最小值时，$P$点的坐标是?
fact_expressions: G: Ellipse;A: Point;P: Point;F: Point;Expression(G) = (x^2/16 + y^2/12 = 1);Coordinate(A) = (-2, sqrt(3));RightFocus(G) = F;PointOnCurve(P, G);WhenMin(Abs(LineSegmentOf(P, A)) + 2*Abs(LineSegmentOf(P, F)))

text: 以直线$x+2 y=0$为渐近线，且截直线$x-y-3=0$所得弦长为$\frac{8 \sqrt{3}}{3}$的双曲线的标准方程是?
fact_expressions: G: Hyperbola;H: Line;L:Line;Expression(L) = (x + 2*y = 0);Expression(H) = (x - y - 3 = 0);OneOf(Asymptote(G)) = L;Length(InterceptChord(H,G))=8*sqrt(3)/3
G: Ellipse;Expression(G) = (sqrt(x^2 + (y + 1)^2) = Abs(x - 2*y + 3)/5)

text: 已知双曲线$C$: $\frac{x^{2}}{a^{2}}-\frac{y^{2}}{b^{2}}=1(a>0, b>0)$的右焦点为$F$，左顶点为$A$，过$F$作$C$的一条渐近线的垂线，垂足为$M$，若$\tan \angle M A F=\frac{1}{2}$，则$C$的离心率为?
fact_expressions: C: Hyperbola;Expression(C) = (-y^2/b^2 + x^2/a^2 = 1);b: Number;a: Number;a>0;b>0;M: Point;A: Point;LeftVertex(C)=A;F: Point;RightFocus(C)=F;PointOnCurve(F,l);IsPerpendicular(l, OneOf(Asymptote(C)));FootPoint(l,OneOf(Asymptote(C))) = M;Tan(AngleOf(M, A, F)) = 1/2;l:Line

text: 已知椭圆的焦点是双曲线的顶点，双曲线的焦点是椭圆的长轴顶点，若两曲线的离心率分别为$e_{1}$, $e_{2}$, 则$e_{1} \cdot e_{2}$=?
fact_expressions: G: Hyperbola;H: Ellipse;Focus(H) = Vertex(G);Focus(G) = Endpoint(MajorAxis(H));e1: Number;e2: Number;Eccentricity(G) = e2;Eccentricity(H) = e1

text: 以$y=\pm x$为渐近线且经过点$(2,0)$的双曲线方程为?
fact_expressions: G: Hyperbola;H: Point;Coordinate(H) = (2, 0);Expression(Asymptote(G))=(y=pm*x);PointOnCurve(H,G)

text: 已知双曲线$\frac{x^{2}}{a^{2}}-y^{2}=1(a>0)$的离心率是$\sqrt{5}$，则抛物线$y=a x^{2}$的准线方程为?
fact_expressions: G: Hyperbola;a: Number;H: Parabola;a>0;Expression(G) = (-y^2 + x^2/a^2 = 1);Expression(H) = (y = a*x^2);Eccentricity(G) = sqrt(5)

text: 已知两点坐标$A(-4,0)$ , $B(4,0)$，若$|P A|+|P B|=10$，则点$P$轨迹方程为?
fact_expressions: A: Point;Coordinate(A) = (-4, 0);B: Point;Coordinate(B) = (4, 0);P: Point;Abs(LineSegmentOf(P, A)) + Abs(LineSegmentOf(P, B)) = 10

text: 已知双曲线$\frac{y^{2}}{4}-x^{2}=1$的两条渐近线分别与抛物线$y^{2}=2 p x(p>0)$的准线交于$A$、$B$两点，$O$为坐标原点，若$\triangle A O B$的面积为$1$，则$p$的值为?
fact_expressions: G: Hyperbola;Expression(G) = (-x^2 + y^2/4 = 1);L1:Line;L2: Line;Asymptote(G) = {L1,L2};H: Parabola;Expression(H) = (y^2 = 2*p*x);p: Number;p>0;Intersection(L1, Directrix(H)) = A;Intersection(L2, Directrix(H)) = B;A: Point;O: Origin;B: Point;Area(TriangleOf(A, O, B)) = 1

text: 已知双曲线$\frac{x^{2}}{a^{2}}-\frac{y^{2}}{b^{2}}=1$的焦点$F(2,0)$,过$F$且斜率为$1$的直线与双曲线有且只有一个交点，则双曲线的方程为?
fact_expressions: G: Hyperbola;b: Number;a: Number;H: Line;F: Point;Expression(G) = (-y^2/b^2 + x^2/a^2 = 1);Coordinate(F) = (2, 0);OneOf(Focus(G)) = F;PointOnCurve(F, H);Slope(H) = 1;NumIntersection(H, G) = 1

text: 设点$P$是椭圆$x^{2}+4 y^{2}=36$上的动点，$F$为椭圆的左焦点，则$|P F|$的最大值为?
fact_expressions: G: Ellipse;P: Point;F: Point;Expression(G) = (x^2 + 4*y^2 = 36);PointOnCurve(P, G);LeftFocus(G) = F

text: 已知椭圆一个焦点到长轴两个顶点间的距离分别是$3 \sqrt{3}$ ,$ \sqrt{3}$，则椭圆的离心率是?
fact_expressions: G: Ellipse;A:Point;B:Point;Endpoint(MajorAxis(G))={A,B};Distance(OneOf(Focus(G)),A)=3*sqrt(3);Distance(OneOf(Focus(G)),B)=sqrt(3)

text: 垂直于$x$轴的直线与抛物线$y^{2}=4 x$相交于$A$、$B$两点. 若$A B$的长为$4 \sqrt{3}$，则焦点到直线$A B$的距离为?
fact_expressions: G: Parabola;H: Line;A: Point;B: Point;Expression(G) = (y^2 = 4*x);IsPerpendicular(H,xAxis);Intersection(H, G) = {A, B};Length(LineSegmentOf(A, B)) = 4*sqrt(3)

text: 已知椭圆$C$: $\frac{x^{2}}{a^{2}}+\frac{y^{2}}{b^{2}}=1(a>b>0)$的离心率为$e$，直线$l$: $y=e x+a$与$x$轴、$y$轴分别交于点$A$、$B$、$M$是直线$l$与椭圆$C$的一个公共点，设$|A M|=e|A B|$，则该椭圆的离心率$e$=?
fact_expressions: l: Line;C: Ellipse;b: Number;a: Number;A: Point;M: Point;B: Point;e: Number;a > b;b > 0;Expression(C) = (y^2/b^2 + x^2/a^2 = 1);Eccentricity(C) = e;Expression(l)=(y=e*x+a);Intersection(l,xAxis)=A;Intersection(l,yAxis)=B;OneOf(Intersection(l,C))=M;Abs(LineSegmentOf(A, M)) = e*Abs(LineSegmentOf(A, B))

text: 平面上线段$|G H|=4$，如果三角形$GPH$上的顶点$P$永远保持$|\overrightarrow{P G}|=2|\overrightarrow{P H}|$，那么随着$P$的运动,三角形$GPH$面积的最大值等于?
fact_expressions: G: Point;H: Point;Abs(LineSegmentOf(G, H)) = 4;P: Point;Abs(VectorOf(P, G)) = 2*Abs(VectorOf(P, H))

text: 双曲线的渐近线方程是$3 x \pm 2 y=0$，则该双曲线的离心率等于?
fact_expressions: G: Hyperbola;Expression(Asymptote(G)) = (pm*2*y + 3*x = 0)

text: 已知直线$x-y-2=0$过双曲线$C$: $\frac{x^{2}}{a^{2}}-\frac{y^{2}}{b^{2}}=1(a>0, b>0)$的一个焦点，且与双曲线的一条渐近线垂直，则双曲线的实轴长为?
fact_expressions: C: Hyperbola;b: Number;a: Number;G: Line;a>0;b>0;Expression(C) = (-y^2/b^2 + x^2/a^2 = 1);Expression(G) = (x - y - 2 = 0);PointOnCurve(OneOf(Focus(C)), G);IsPerpendicular(G, OneOf(Asymptote(C)))

text: 已知$F_{1}$、$F_{2}$是双曲线$\frac{x^{2}}{a^{2}}-\frac{y^{2}}{b^{2}}=1(a>0, b>0)$的左、右焦点，$P$是其渐近线在第一象限内的点，点$Q$在双曲线上，且满足$\overrightarrow{P F_{1}} \cdot \overrightarrow{P F_{2}}=0$ , $\overrightarrow{P F_{2}}=4 \overrightarrow{P Q}$,则双曲线的离心率为?
fact_expressions: G: Hyperbola;b: Number;a: Number;P: Point;F1: Point;F2: Point;Q: Point;a>0;b>0;Expression(G) = (-y^2/b^2 + x^2/a^2 = 1);LeftFocus(G) = F1;RightFocus(G) = F2;PointOnCurve(P,Asymptote(G));Quadrant(P)=1;PointOnCurve(Q,G);DotProduct(VectorOf(P, F1), VectorOf(P, F2)) = 0;VectorOf(P,F2)=4*VectorOf(P,Q)

text: 以椭圆$x^{2}+2 y^{2}=1$中心为顶点，右顶点为焦点的抛物线的标准方程为?
fact_expressions: H: Ellipse;Expression(H) = (x^2 + 2*y^2 = 1);Vertex(G) = Center(H);Focus(G) = RightVertex(H);G: Parabola

text: 已知点$P(1,-1)$, $F$为椭圆$\frac{x^{2}}{4}+\frac{y^{2}}{3}=1$的右焦点,$M$为椭圆上一点,且使$|MP|+2|MF|$的值最小,则点$M$为?
fact_expressions: P: Point;Coordinate(P) = (1, -1);G: Ellipse;Expression(G) = (x^2/4 + y^2/3 = 1);F: Point;RightFocus(G) = F;M: Point;PointOnCurve(M, G);WhenMin(Abs(LineSegmentOf(M, P)) + 2*Abs(LineSegmentOf(M, F)))

text: 过点$M(1 , 1)$的直线$l$与曲线$C$: $\frac{x^{2}}{4}+\frac{y^{2}}{9}=1$相交于$A$ , $B$两点，若点$M$是弦$AB$的中点则直线$l$的方程为?
fact_expressions: l: Line;C: Curve;A: Point;B: Point;M: Point;Expression(C) = (x^2/4 + y^2/9 = 1);Coordinate(M) = (1, 1);PointOnCurve(M, l);Intersection(l, C) = {A, B};IsChordOf(LineSegmentOf(A, B), C);MidPoint(LineSegmentOf(A, B)) = M

text: 椭圆$\frac{x^{2}}{a^{2}}+\frac{y^{2}}{b^{2}}=1(a>b>0)$的两个焦点为$F_{1}$、$F_{2}$、$P$为椭圆上一点，$\angle F_{1} P F_{2}=60^{\circ}$,则椭圆离心率的取值范围是?

text: 已知双曲线$\frac{x^{2}}{a^{2}}-\frac{y^{2}}{b^{2}}=1(a>0, b>0)$的左、右焦点分别为$F_{1}$、$F_{2}$，点$P(x_{0},\frac{5}{2})$为双曲线上一点，若$\Delta P F_{1} F_{2}$的内切圆半径为$1$,且圆心$G$到原点$O$的距离为$\sqrt{5}$，则双曲线的离心率是?

text: 已知双曲线$C_{1}$与双曲线$C_{2}$的焦点重合，$C_{1}$的方程为$\frac{x^{2}}{3}-y^{2}=1$，若$C_{2}$的一条渐近线的倾斜角是$C_{1}$的一条渐近线的倾斜角的$2$倍，则$C_{2}$的方程为?

text: 已知双曲线的标准方程$\frac{x^{2}}{a^{2}}-\frac{y^{2}}{b^{2}}=1(a>0,b>0)$ , $F_{1}$ , $F_{2}$为其左右焦点，若$P$是双曲线右支上的一点，且$\tan \angle P F_{1} F_{2}=\frac{1}{2} $, $\tan \angle P F_{2} F_{1}=2$，则该双曲线的离心率为?

text: 已知双曲线$C$: $\frac{x^{2}}{a^{2}}-\frac{y^{2}}{b^{2}}=1(a>0, b>0)$的左. 右焦点分别为$F_{1}$、$F_{2}$，过$F_{2}$的直线$l$交双曲线的右支于$A$、$B$两点，点$M$满足$\overrightarrow{A B}+\overrightarrow{A F_{1}}=2 \overrightarrow{A M}$，且$\overrightarrow{A M} \cdot \overrightarrow{B F_{1}}=0$. 若$\cos \angle A F_{1} B=\frac{1}{3}$，则双曲线$C$的离心率是?

text: 已知点$A$是抛物线$x^{2}=8 y$的对称轴与准线的交点，点$B$为抛物线的焦点，$P$在抛物线上. 在$\triangle P A B$中，$\sin \angle P A B=m \sin \angle P B A(m \in \mathbf{R})$，当$m$取最小值时，点$P$恰好在以$A$，$B$为焦点的椭圆上，则椭圆的离心率为?

text: 已知双曲线$\frac{x^{2}}{a^{2}}-\frac{y^{2}}{b^{2}}=1$的右焦点到右准线的距离等于焦距的$\frac{1}{3}$，则离心率为?

text: 已知点$P$是直线$y=x+1$上的动点，点$Q$是抛物线$y=x^{2}$上的动点.设点$M$为线段$P Q$的中点，$O$为原点，则$|O M|$的最小值为?

text: 双曲线$C$: $\frac{x^{2}}{3}-y^{2}=1$的离心率是?若抛物线$y^{2}=2 m x$与双曲线$C$有相同的焦点，则$m$=?

text: 已知双曲线$\frac{x^{2}}{a^{2}}-\frac{y^{2}}{b^{2}}=1(b>a>0)$，焦距为$2 c$，直线$l$经过点$(a, 0)$和$(0, b)$，若$(-a, 0)$到直线$l$的距离为$\frac{2 \sqrt{2}}{3} c$，则离心率为?

text: 已知点$A$是抛物线$y=\frac{1}{4} x^{2}$的对称轴与准线的交点，点$F$为该抛物线的焦点，点$P$在拋物线上且满足$|P F|=m|P A|$,则$m$的最小值为?

text: 已知抛物线$C$: $y^{2}=2 p x(p>0)$的焦点为$F$，抛物线上的点$M(3, y_{0})(y_{0}>0)$到焦点的距离$|M F|=4$，则点$M$的坐标为?

text: 点$P$是双曲线$\frac{x^{2}}{a^{2}}-\frac{y^{2}}{b^{2}}=1(a>0, b>0)$上的点，双曲线的离心率是$\frac{5}{4}$, $F_{1}$, $F_{2}$是其焦点，$\overrightarrow{P F_{1}} \cdot \overrightarrow{P F_{2}}=0$, 若$\Delta F_{1} P F_{2}$的面积是$18$, $a+b$的值等于?

text: 已知椭圆和双曲线有共同的焦点$F_{1}$、$F_{2}$、$P$、$Q$分别是它们在第一象限和第三象限的交点，且$\angle Q F_{2} P=60^{\circ}$，记椭圆和双曲线的离心率分别为$e_{1}$, $e_{2}$，则$\frac{3}{e_{1}^{2}}+\frac{1}{e_{2}^{2}}$等于?

text: 若经过椭圆$\frac{x^{2}}{a^{2}}+\frac{y^{2}}{b^{2}}=1(a>b>0)$的焦点且垂直于$x$轴的直线被椭圆截得的线段长为$\frac{a}{2}$，则该椭圆的离心率为?

text: 已知$F$为抛物线$C$: $y^{2}=4 x$的焦点，过点$F$的直线$l$交抛物线$C$于$A$、$B$两点，若$|A B|=10$，则线段$A B$的中点$M$到直线$x+1=0$的距离为?

text: 已知抛物线$C$: $x^{2}=-4 y$的焦点为$F$，抛物线$C$上一点$A$满足$|A F|=3$，则以点$A$为圆心，$A F$为半径的圆截$x$轴所得弦长为?

text: 椭圆$\frac{x^{2}}{a^{2}}+\frac{y^{2}}{b^{2}}=1(a>b>0)$的左、右焦点分别为$F_{1}$、$F_{2}$，椭圆上的点$M$满足:$\angle F_{1} M F_{2}=\frac{2 \pi}{3}$且$\overrightarrow{M F_{1}} \cdot \overrightarrow{M F_{2}}=-2$，则$b$=?

text: 已知$F_{1}$、$F_{2}$，是双曲线$x^{2}-4 y^{2}=4$的两个焦点，$P$是双曲线上的一点，且满足$\overrightarrow{P F_{1}} \cdot \overrightarrow{P F_{2}}=0$，则$\Delta P F_{1} F_{2}$的面积为?

已知椭圆方程为$\frac{x^{2}}{16}+\frac{y^{2}}{m^{2}}=1(m>0)$，直线$y=\frac{\sqrt{2}}{2} x$与该椭圆的一个交点$M$在$x$轴上的射影

text: 顶点在原点，焦点在$x$轴上，截直线$2 x-y-4=0$所得弦长为$3 \sqrt{5}$的抛物线方程为?
fact_expressions: G: Parabola;H: Line;O: Origin;Expression(H) = (2*x - y - 4 = 0);Vertex(G) = O;PointOnCurve(Focus(G), xAxis);Length(InterceptChord(H, G)) = 3*sqrt(5)

text: 双曲线$x^{2}-4 y^{2}=4$的两准线之间的距离是?
fact_expressions: G: Hyperbola;L1: Line;L2: Line;Expression(G) = (x^2 - 4*y^2 = 4);Directrix(G) = {L1, L2}

text: 设双曲线$\frac{x^{2}}{a^{2}}-\frac{y^{2}}{b^{2}}=1(a>0, b>0)$的一条渐近线为$y=2 x$，且一个焦点与抛物线$y^{2}=4 x$的焦点相同，则此双曲线的方程为?
fact_expressions: G: Hyperbola;b: Number;a: Number;H: Parabola;a>0;b>0;Expression(G) = (-y^2/b^2 + x^2/a^2 = 1);Expression(H) = (y^2 = 4*x);Expression(OneOf(Asymptote(G)))=(y=2*x);OneOf(Focus(G))=Focus(H)

text: 已知双曲线$C$: $\frac{x^{2}}{a^{2}}-\frac{y^{2}}{b^{2}}=1(a>0, b>0)$的右焦点到渐近线的距离为$3$，且双曲线右支上的一点$P$到两焦点的距离之差是虚轴长的$\frac{4}{3}$倍，则双曲线$C$的标准方程为?
fact_expressions: C: Hyperbola;b: Number;a: Number;a>0;b>0;Expression(C) = (-y^2/b^2 + x^2/a^2 = 1);Distance(RightFocus(C),Asymptote(C))=3;P: Point;F1: Point;F2: Point;Focus(C) = {F1, F2};PointOnCurve(P, RightPart(C));Distance(P, F1) - Distance(P, F2) = (4/3)*Length(ImageinaryAxis(C))

text: 抛物线$4 x=y^{2}$的准线方程为?
fact_expressions: G: Parabola;Expression(G) = (4*x = y^2)

text: 过焦点为$F$的抛物线$y^{2}=12 x$上一点$M$向其准线作垂线，垂足为$N$，若直线$N F$的斜率为$-\frac{\sqrt{3}}{3}$，则$|M F|$=?
fact_expressions: G: Parabola;H: Line;N: Point;F: Point;M: Point;Expression(G) = (y^2 = 12*x);Focus(G)=F;PointOnCurve(M,G);PointOnCurve(M,H);IsPerpendicular(H,Directrix(G));FootPoint(H,Directrix(G))=N;Slope(LineOf(N,F)) = -sqrt(3)/3

text: 某曲线的方程为$\sqrt{(x-1)^{2}+y^{2}}+\sqrt{(x+1)^{2}+y^{2}}=2$，若直线$l$: $y=k x+1-\frac{1}{2} k$与该曲线有公共点，则实数$k$的取值范围是?
fact_expressions: l: Line;G: Curve;k: Real;Expression(G) = (sqrt(y^2 + (x - 1)^2) + sqrt(y^2 + (x + 1)^2) = 2);Expression(l) = (y = k*x + 1 - k/2);IsIntersect(l, G)

text: 已知双曲线$C$: $\frac{x^{2}}{a^{2}}-\frac{y^{2}}{b^{2}}=1(a>0, b>0)$的左、右焦点分别为$F_{1}$, $F_{2}$ , 过$ F_{1}$的直线与$C$的两条渐近线分别交于$A$、$B$两点，若$\overrightarrow{F_{1} {A}}=2 \overrightarrow{A B}$ , $\overrightarrow{F_{1} {A}}\cdot \overrightarrow{A O}=0$,则$C$的离心率为?

text: 若双曲线$x^{2}+\frac{y^{2}}{m}=1$的一条渐近线的倾斜角为$60^{\circ}$，则$m$=?
fact_expressions: G: Hyperbola;m: Number;Expression(G) = (x^2 + y^2/m = 1);Inclination(OneOf(Asymptote(G)))=ApplyUnit(60,degree)

text: 已知双曲线$x^{2}-\frac{y^{2}}{m^{2}}=1(m>0)$的一条渐近线方程为$x+\sqrt{3} y=0$, 则$m$=?
fact_expressions: G: Hyperbola;m: Number;m>0;Expression(G)=(x^2-y^2/m^2=1);Expression(OneOf(Asymptote(G)))=(x+sqrt(3)*y=0)

text: 设$F$为椭圆$\frac{x^{2}}{4}+\frac{y^{2}}{3}=1$的右焦点，过椭圆中心作一直线与椭圆交于$P$、$Q$两点，当三角形$P F Q$的面积最大时，$P F \cdot Q F$的值为?

G: Ellipse;H: Line;Expression(G) = (x^2 + 4*y^2 = 16);Expression(H) = (x - 2*y + 4 = 0)

text: 设抛物线$x^{2}=p y$的焦点与双曲线$\frac{y^{2}}{3}-x^{2}=1$的上焦点重合, 则$p$的值为?
fact_expressions: G: Hyperbola;H: Parabola;p: Number;Expression(G) = (-x^2 + y^2/3 = 1);Expression(H) = (x^2 = p*y);UpperFocus(G)=Focus(H)

text: 设抛物线$x^{2}=p y$的焦点与双曲线$\frac{y^{2}}{3}-x^{2}=1$的上焦点重合，则$p$的值为?
fact_expressions: H: Parabola;Expression(H) = (x^2 = p*y);p: Number;G: Hyperbola;Expression(G) = (-x^2 + y^2/3 = 1);Focus(H) = UpperFocus(G)

text: 与椭圆$\frac{x^{2}}{25}+\frac{y^{2}}{16}=1$有相同的焦点且过点$(-3 , \frac{7}{4})$的椭圆方程为?

text: 已知$F_{1}$、$F_{2}$为双曲线$C$: $\frac{x^{2}}{a^{2}}-\frac{y^{2}}{b^{2}}=1(a>0, b>0)$的左右焦点，点$M$在双曲线$C$上，点$I$为$\triangle M F_{1} F_{2}$的内心，且$S_{\Delta I M F_{1}}+S_{\Delta I M F_{2}}=\frac{3}{2} S_{\Delta I F_{1} F_{2}}$，$|M F_{1}|=2|M F_{2}|$，则双曲线$C$的离心率为?

text: 已知抛物线$y=a x^{2}$的准线方程为$y=-\frac{1}{2}$，则实数$a$=?

text: 设$A$ , $B$为在双曲线$x^{2}-\frac{y^{2}}{2}=1$上两点，$O$为坐标原点. 若$\overrightarrow{O A} \cdot \overrightarrow{O B}=0$,则$\triangle AOB$面积的最小值为?

text: 若抛物线$y^{2}=4 x$上一点$P(x_{0}, y_{0})$到其焦点$F$的距离等于$4$，则$x_{0}$=?

text: 已知双曲线右顶点坐标为$(2,0)$，一条渐近线方程为$2 x-y=0$，则此双曲线的标准方程为?

text: 已知$m$为实数，直线$m x+y-1=0$与椭圆$\frac{x^{2}}{m^{2}}+y^{2}=1$的交点个数为?

text: 过双曲线$\frac{x^{2}}{a^{2}}-\frac{y^{2}}{b^{2}}=1(a>0, b>0)$的右焦点$F_{2}$向其一条渐近线作垂线$l$，垂足为$P$ , $l$与另一条渐近线交于$Q$点. 若$\overrightarrow{F_{2} Q}=2 \overrightarrow{F_{2} P}$，则该双曲线的离心率为?

text: 已知直线$l$与双曲线$\frac{x^{2}}{a^{2}}-\frac{y^{2}}{b^{2}}=1(a>0, b>0)$的两条渐近线分别交于点$A$、$B$，与$x$轴交于点$C$、$O$为坐标原点，若$A$是线段$B C$的中点，且$O A=O C$，则双曲线的离心率为?

text: 已知双曲线$C$: $x^{2}-y^{2}=1$，则点$(2,0)$到$C$的渐近线的距离为?

text: 设$P$为有公共焦点$F_{1}$、$F_{2}$的椭圆$C_{1}$与双曲线$C_{2}$的一个交点，且$P F_{1} \perp P F_{2}$，若椭圆$C_{1}$的离心率为$e_{1}$，双曲线$C_{2}$的离心率为$e_{2}$，则$9 e_{1}^{2}+e_{2}^2$的最小值为?
fact_expressions: C2: Hyperbola;C1: Ellipse;P: Point;F1: Point;F2: Point;e1: Number;e2: Number;Focus(C1) = {F1, F2};Focus(C2) = {F1, F2};OneOf(Intersection(C1, C2)) = P;IsPerpendicular(LineSegmentOf(P, F1), LineSegmentOf(P, F2));Eccentricity(C1) = e1;Eccentricity(C2) = e2;Focus(C1) = Focus(C2)

text: 直线$x+2 y-2=0$经过椭圆$\frac{x^{2}}{a^{2}}+\frac{y^{2}}{b^{2}}=1(a>b>0)$的一个焦点和一个顶点，则该椭圆的方程等于?
fact_expressions: G: Ellipse;b: Number;a: Number;H: Line;a > b;b > 0;Expression(G) = (y^2/b^2 + x^2/a^2 = 1);Expression(H) = (x + 2*y - 2 = 0);PointOnCurve(OneOf(Focus(G)),H);PointOnCurve(OneOf(Vertex(G)),H)

text: 直线$x+2 y-2=0$经过椭圆$\frac{x^{2}}{a^{2}}+\frac{y^{2}}{b^{2}}=1(a>b>0)$的一个焦点和一个顶点，则该椭圆的离心率等于?
fact_expressions: H: Line;Expression(H) = (x + 2*y - 2 = 0);G: Ellipse;Expression(G) = (y^2/b^2 + x^2/a^2 = 1);b: Number;a: Number;a > b;b > 0;PointOnCurve(OneOf(Focus(G)), H);PointOnCurve(OneOf(Vertex(G)), H)

text: 直线$x+2 y-2=0$经过椭圆$\frac{x^{2}}{a^{2}}+\frac{y^{2}}{b^{2}}=1  (a>b>0)$的一个焦点和一个顶点，则该椭圆的离心率等于?
fact_expressions: G: Ellipse;b: Number;a: Number;H: Line;a > b;b > 0;Expression(G) = (y^2/b^2 + x^2/a^2 = 1);Expression(H) = (x + 2*y - 2 = 0);PointOnCurve(OneOf(Focus(G)),H);PointOnCurve(OneOf(Vertex(G)),H)

text: 已知点$P$是圆上的一个动点，过点$P$作$P Q \perp x$轴于点$Q$，设$\overrightarrow{O M}=\overrightarrow{O P}+\overrightarrow{O Q}$，则点$M$的轨迹方程是?
fact_expressions: P: Point;PointOnCurve(P, G);G: Circle;Q: Point;PointOnCurve(P, LineSegmentOf(P, Q));IsPerpendicular(LineSegmentOf(P, Q), xAxis);FootPoint(LineSegmentOf(P, Q), xAxis) = Q;O: Origin;M: Point;VectorOf(O, M) = VectorOf(O, P) + VectorOf(O, Q)

text: 中心在坐标原点，离心率为$\frac{5}{3}$的双曲线的焦点在$y$轴上，则它的渐近线方程为?
fact_expressions: G: Hyperbola;O: Origin;Eccentricity(G) = 5/3;PointOnCurve(Focus(G), yAxis);Center(G) = O

text: 已知双曲线$C$: $\frac{x^{2}}{a^{2}}-\frac{y^{2}}{b^{2}}=1  (a>0 , b>0)$的左焦点为$F$，过$F$的一条倾斜角为$30^{\circ}$的直线与$C$在第一象限交于点$A$，且$|O F|=| O A |$，$O$为坐标原点，则该双曲线的离心率为?
fact_expressions: C: Hyperbola;Expression(C) = (-y^2/b^2 + x^2/a^2 = 1);a: Number;b: Number;a>0;b>0;F: Point;LeftFocus(C) = F;G: Line;PointOnCurve(F, G) = True;Inclination(G) = ApplyUnit(30, degree);A: Point;Intersection(G,C) = A;Quadrant(A) = 1;O: Origin;Abs(LineSegmentOf(O,F)) = Abs(LineSegmentOf(O,A))

text: 已知双曲线$\frac{x^{2}}{a^{2}}-\frac{y^{2}}{b^{2}}=1(a>0, b>0)$的离心率为$\frac{5}{4}$，且过点$A(-4 \sqrt{2}, 3)$，则该双曲线的方程为?
fact_expressions: G: Hyperbola;Expression(G) = (-y^2/b^2 + x^2/a^2 = 1);b: Number;a: Number;a>0;b>0;Eccentricity(G) = 5/4;A: Point;Coordinate(A) = (-4*sqrt(2), 3);PointOnCurve(A, G)

text: 直线$y=x+1$被曲线$y=\frac{1}{2} x^{2}-1$截得的线段$A B$的长为?
fact_expressions: G: Line;H: Curve;B: Point;A: Point;Expression(G) = (y = x + 1);Expression(H) = (y = x^2/2 - 1);InterceptChord(H,G)=LineSegmentOf(A,B)

text: 已知椭圆$\frac{x^{2}}{4}+\frac{y^{2}}{2}=1$，点$A(0,1)$ , $P$为椭圆上一动点，则$|P A|$的最大值为?
fact_expressions: G: Ellipse;A: Point;P: Point;Expression(G) = (x^2/4 + y^2/2 = 1);Coordinate(A) = (0, 1);PointOnCurve(P, G)

text: 已知$A(-2,0)$, $B(2,0)$，斜率为$k$的直线$l$上存在不同的两点$M$、$N$满足$|M A|-|M B|=2 \sqrt{3}$ ,$|N A|-|N B|=2 \sqrt{3}$，且线段$M N$的中点为$(6,1)$，则$k$的值为?
fact_expressions: A: Point;Coordinate(A) = (-2, 0);B: Point;Coordinate(B) = (2, 0);l: Line;k:Number;Slope(l) = k;M: Point;N: Point;PointOnCurve(M,l) = True;PointOnCurve(N,l) = True;Negation(M = N);Abs(LineSegmentOf(M,A)) - Abs(LineSegmentOf(M,B)) = 2*sqrt(3);Abs(LineSegmentOf(N, A)) - Abs(LineSegmentOf(N, B)) = 2*sqrt(3);Coordinate(MidPoint(LineSegmentOf(M,N))) = (6,1)

text: 抛物线的焦点为椭圆$\frac{x^{2}}{9}+\frac{y^{2}}{4}=1$的左焦点，顶点在椭圆中心，则抛物线方程为?
fact_expressions: G: Parabola;H: Ellipse;Expression(H) = (x^2/9 + y^2/4 = 1);Focus(G) = LeftFocus(H);Vertex(G) = Center(H)

text: 抛物线的焦点为椭圆$\frac{x^{2}}{4}+\frac{y^{2}}{9}=1$的下焦点，顶点在椭圆中心，则抛物线方程为?
fact_expressions: G: Parabola;H: Ellipse;Expression(H) = (x^2/4 + y^2/9 = 1);Focus(G) = LowerFocus(H);Vertex(G) = Center(H)

text: 点$(0,-2)$是椭圆$\frac{x^{2}}{m}+\frac{y^{2}}{m^{2}-2}=1$的一个焦点，则实数$m$的值为?
fact_expressions: G: Ellipse;Expression(G) = (y^2/(m^2 - 2) + x^2/m = 1);m: Real;H: Point;Coordinate(H) = (0, -2);OneOf(Focus(G)) = H

text: 过抛物线$y^{2}=4 x$焦点$F$的直线交该抛物线于$A$、$B$两点,且$|A B |=4$, 若原点$O$是$\triangle A B C$的垂心,则点$C$的坐标为?
fact_expressions: G: Parabola;H: Line;A: Point;B: Point;C: Point;F: Point;Expression(G) = (y^2 = 4*x);Focus(G) = F;PointOnCurve(F, H);Intersection(H, G) = {A, B};Abs(LineSegmentOf(A, B)) = 4;O: Origin;Orthocenter(TriangleOf(A, B, C)) = O

text: 抛物线$y^{2}=x$上到直线$x-2 y+4=0$的距离最小的点的坐标是?
fact_expressions: G: Parabola;H: Line;P:Point;Expression(G) = (y^2 = x);Expression(H) = (x - 2*y + 4 = 0);PointOnCurve(P, G);WhenMin(Distance(P,H))

text: 已知椭圆$C$: $\frac{x^{2}}{a^{2}}+y^{2}=1(a>1)$的焦点为$F_{1}$、$F_{2}$，以原点为圆心，椭圆的焦距为直径的$\odot O$与椭圆$C$交于点$P$，则$S_{\Delta P F_{1} F_{2}}$=?
fact_expressions: C: Ellipse;a: Number;Q: Circle;P: Point;F1: Point;F2: Point;a>1;O: Origin;Expression(C) = (y^2 + x^2/a^2 = 1);Focus(C) = {F1, F2};Center(Q) = O ;Diameter(Q) = FocalLength(C);Intersection(Q, C) = P

G: Parabola;A: Point;B: Point;x1: Number;x2: Number;y1: Number;y2: Number;Expression(G) = (y^2 = 3*x);Coordinate(A) = (x1, y1);Coordinate(B) = (x2, y2);PointOnCurve(A, G);PointOnCurve(B, G);Slope(LineOf(A, B)) = 2;y1 = 4

text: 过抛物线$y^{2}=4 x$的焦点$F$的直线$l$(斜率$k>0$)与抛物线交于$A$、$B$两点，交准线$q$于点$M$,$|A F|=\frac{3}{2}|B M|$，则$k$=?

text: 设过点$K(-1 , 0)$的直线$l$与抛物线$C$: $y^{2}=4 x$交于$A$、$B$两点，$F$为抛物线的焦点，若$|B F|=2|A F|$，则$\cos \angle A F B$=?
fact_expressions: K: Point;Coordinate(K) = (-1, 0);PointOnCurve(K, l) = True;l: Line;C: Parabola;Expression(C) = (y^2 = 4*x);Intersection(l, C) = {A, B};A: Point;B: Point;F: Point;Focus(C) = F;Abs(LineSegmentOf(B, F)) = 2*Abs(LineSegmentOf(A, F))

text: 已知过抛物线$y^{2}=4 x$焦点$F$的直线$l$与抛物线相交于$A$、$B$两点，若$|A F|=4$，则$|B F|$=?
fact_expressions: l: Line;G: Parabola;A: Point;F: Point;B: Point;Expression(G) = (y^2 = 4*x);Focus(G) = F;PointOnCurve(F, l);Intersection(l, G) = {A, B};Abs(LineSegmentOf(A, F)) = 4

text: 已知双曲线$C$:$\frac{y^{2}}{4}-\frac{x^{2}}{4}=1$ , $P$是双曲线渐近线上第一象限的一点，$O$为坐标原点，且$|O P|=2 \sqrt{2}$，则点$P$的坐标是?
fact_expressions: C: Hyperbola;O: Origin;P: Point;Expression(C) = (-x^2/4 + y^2/4 = 1);Quadrant(P)=1;PointOnCurve(P,Asymptote(C));Abs(LineSegmentOf(O, P)) = 2*sqrt(2)

text: 双曲线的一个焦点为$(0,5)$，其渐近线方程为$y=\pm \frac{4}{3} x$，则双曲线的标准方程为?
fact_expressions: G: Hyperbola;H: Point;Coordinate(H) = (0, 5);OneOf(Focus(G)) = H;Expression(Asymptote(G)) = (y = pm*x*4/3)

text: 双曲线过点$(4, \sqrt{3})$ ,$(3, \frac{\sqrt{5}}{2})$, 则双曲线的标准方程为?

text: 抛物线$y^{2}=8 x$的焦点为$F$，点$P(x0, y0)$为该抛物线上的动点, 又已知点$A(-2,0)$,则$\frac{|P A|}{|P F|}$的取值范围是?

text: 已知圆$O$:$x^{2}+y^{2}=1$和点$A(-2,0)$，若顶点$B(b, 0)  (b \neq-2)$和常数$\lambda$满足：对圆$O$上任意一点$M$，都有$|M B|=\lambda|M A|$，则$\lambda-b$=?

text: 连接抛物线$y^{2}=4 x$的焦点$F$与点$M(0,1)$所得的线段与抛物线交于点$A$，设点$O$为坐标原点，则$\triangle O A M$的面积为?

text: 连接抛物线$y^{2}=4 x$的焦点$F$与点$M(0 , 1)$所得的线段与抛物线交于点$A$，设点$O$为坐标原点，则$\angle OAM$的面积为?

text: 已知椭圆$\frac{x^{2}}{a^{2}}+\frac{y^{2}}{b^{2}}=1(a>b>0)$左焦点为$F_{1}$，右顶点为$A$，以$F_{1} A$为直径的圆与椭圆有三个公共点，则椭圆离心率的取值范围为?

text: 已知直线$y=k x-1$与双曲线$x^{2}-y^{2}=4$的左、右支各有一个公共点，则$k$的取值范围是?

text: 已知圆$M$:$(x+1)^{2}+y^{2}=1$，圆$N$:$(x-1)^{2}+y^{2}=9$，动圆$P$与圆$M$外切并且与圆$N$内切，圆心$P$的轨迹为曲线$C$，则曲线$C$的方程为?

text: 抛物线$C$: $y^{2}=4 x$上一点$P$到点$A(3,4 \sqrt{2})$与到准线的距离和最小，则点$P$的坐标为?

text: 抛物线$C$: $y^{2}=4 x$上一点$Q$到点$B(4,1)$与到焦点$F$的距离和最小，则点$Q$的坐标是?

text: 已知双曲线$\frac{x^{2}}{3}-y^{2}=1$的左右焦点分别为$F_{1}$,$F_{2}$，过$F_{1}$且倾斜角为$60^{\circ}$的直线$l$与双曲线交于$M$、$N$两点，则$\Delta M N F_{2}$的内切圆半径为?

text: 已知双曲线$\frac{x^{2}}{4}-\frac{y^{2}}{2}=1$的左，右焦点分别为$F_{1}$、$F_{2}$，过右焦点$F_{2}$且倾斜角为$\frac{\pi}{4}$的直线$l$与该双曲线交于$M$、$N$两点 (点$M$位于第一象限)，$\Delta M F_{1} F_{2}$的内切圆半径为$R_{1}$ ,$ \Delta N F_{1} F_{2}$的内切圆半径为$R_{2}$，则$\frac{R_{1}}{R_{2}}$为?

text: 双曲线$8 k x^{2}-k y^{2}=8$的一个焦点是$(0 , 3)$，那么$k$的值为?

text: 抛物线$y^{2}=a x(a>0)$上的点$P(\frac{3}{2}, y_{0})$到焦点$F$的距离为$2$，则$a$=?

text: 设双曲线$\frac{y^{2}}{9}-\frac{x^{2}}{a^{2}}=1(a>0)$的焦点为$F_{1}$、$F_{2}$、$P$为该双曲线上的一点，若$|P F_{2}|=2$，且$\sin \angle P F_{2} F_{1}=\lambda \sin \angle P F_{1} F_{2}$，则$\lambda$=?

text: 若抛物线${y}^{2}=2 x$上的一点$M$到坐标原点$O$的距离为$\sqrt{3}$, 则点$M$到该抛物线焦点的距离为?

text: 双曲线$\frac{x^{2}}{a^{2}}-\frac{y^{2}}{b^{2}}=1(a>0, b>0)$的左、右焦点分别为$F_{1}$、$F_{2}$. 过$F_{1}$作其中一条渐近线的垂线，交双曲线的右支于点$P$，若$\angle F_{1} P F_{2}=\frac{\pi}{4}$，则双曲线的离心率为?

text: 已知$F$为椭圆$C$: $\frac{x^{2}}{a^{2}}+\frac{y^{2}}{b^{2}}=1(a>b>0)$的右焦点，$A$为椭圆$C$的左顶点，$P$是椭圆$C$上一点，且$P F$垂直于$x$轴，若直线$P A$的倾斜角为$30^{\circ}$，则椭圆$C$的离心率为?

text:
与双曲线$\frac{y^{2}}{16}-\frac{x^{2}}{9}=1$有共同的渐近线，且经过点$A(-3 , 2\sqrt {3})$的双曲线的一个焦点到一条

text: 若椭圆$C$:$ \frac{x^{2}}{8}+\frac{y^{2}}{4}=1$的右焦点为$F$，且与直线$l$: $x-\sqrt{3} y+2=0$交于$P$、$Q$两点，则$\triangle P Q F$的周长为?

text: 已知抛物线$E$: $y^{2}=4 x$，直线$l$: $y=k(x-1)(k>0)$，直线$l$与抛物线$E$相交于$A$、$B$两点，且$A B$的延长线交抛物线$E$的准线于$C$点，$S_{\triangle  O A B}=S_{\triangle O B C}$(其中$O$为坐标原点) 则$k$=?

text: 设$P$是圆$x^{2}+y^{2}=9$上的动点，$P D$垂直于$x$轴，垂足为$D$、$M$是线段$P D$上的点且满足$\overrightarrow{P M}=\frac{1}{3} \overrightarrow{P D}$，点$P$在圆上运动时，动点$M$的轨迹方程是?

text: 已知点$M$为椭圆$\frac{x^{2}}{27}+\frac{y^{2}}{26}=1$上任意一点，$A B$是圆$(x-1)^{2}+y^{2}=8$的一条直径，则$\overrightarrow{M A} \cdot \overrightarrow{M B}$的最大值与最小值的和为?

text: 已知$F_{1}$、$F_{2}$分别是双曲线$\frac{x^{2}}{a^{2}}-\frac{y^{2}}{b^{2}}=1(a, b>0)$的左，右焦点，$P$为双曲线上一点，且$\overrightarrow{P F}_{1} \cdot(\overrightarrow{O F_{1}}+\overrightarrow{O P})=0$($O$为坐标原点) ,$|\overrightarrow{P F_{1}}|=2|\overrightarrow{P F_{2}}|$ ,则双曲线的离心率为?

text: 已知点$O(0,0)$ ,$A(1,2)$，动点$P$满足$|\overrightarrow{O P}+\overrightarrow{A P}|=2$，则点$P$的轨迹方程是?
fact_expressions: O: Point;A: Point;P: Point;Coordinate(O) = (0, 0);Coordinate(A) = (1, 2);Abs(VectorOf(A, P) + VectorOf(O, P)) = 2

text: 椭圆$\frac{x^{2}}{4}+\frac{y^{2}}{2}=1$的右焦点为$F$、$M$、$N$为$y$轴上的两个动点，若$\overrightarrow{M F} \cdot \overrightarrow{N F}=0$，则$\Delta M N F$面积的最小值为?
fact_expressions: G: Ellipse;M: Point;N: Point;F: Point;Expression(G) = (x^2/4 + y^2/2 = 1);RightFocus(G) = F;PointOnCurve(M, yAxis);PointOnCurve(N, yAxis);DotProduct(VectorOf(M, F), VectorOf(N, F)) = 0

text: 设$F_{1}$、$F_{2}$是椭圆$\frac{x^{2}}{a^{2}}+\frac{y^{2}}{b^{2}}=1(a>b>0)$的左、右焦点，若椭圆上存在点$P$使得$\overrightarrow{P F_{1}} \cdot \overrightarrow{P F_{2}}=0$，则椭圆的离心率的取值范围?
fact_expressions: G: Ellipse;b: Number;a: Number;P: Point;F2: Point;F1: Point;a > b;b > 0;Expression(G) = (y^2/b^2 + x^2/a^2 = 1);LeftFocus(G) = F1;RightFocus(G) = F2;PointOnCurve(P,G);DotProduct(VectorOf(P,F1),VectorOf(P,F2))=0

text: 已知直线$l$: $2 x+4 y+3=0$, $P$为$l$上的动点，$O$为坐标原点，点$Q$在线段$O P$上，且$\frac{|\overrightarrow{O Q}|}{|\overrightarrow{O P}|}=\frac{1}{3}$，则点$Q$的轨迹方程为?
fact_expressions: l: Line;O: Origin;P: Point;Q: Point;Expression(l) = (2*x + 4*y + 3 = 0);PointOnCurve(P, l);PointOnCurve(Q, LineSegmentOf(O,P));Abs(VectorOf(O, Q))/Abs(VectorOf(O, P)) = 1/3

text: 已知$F_{1}$ ,$F_{2}$是双曲线$C$: $\frac{x^{2}}{a^{2}}-\frac{y^{2}}{b^{2}}=1(a>0, b>0)$的两个焦点，若双曲线$C$上存在点$P$满足$P F_{1} \perp P F_{2}$且$|P F_{1}|=3|P F_{2}|$，则双曲线$C$的离心率为?
fact_expressions: C: Hyperbola;b: Number;a: Number;P: Point;F1: Point;F2: Point;a>0;b>0;Expression(C) = (-y^2/b^2 + x^2/a^2 = 1);Focus(C)={F1,F2};PointOnCurve(P,C);IsPerpendicular(LineSegmentOf(P,F1),LineSegmentOf(P,F2));Abs(LineSegmentOf(P,F1))=3*Abs(LineSegmentOf(P,F2))

text: 已知椭圆$\frac{x^{2}}{4}+y^{2}=1$上任意一点$P$及点$A(0,2)$，则$|P A|$的最大值为?
fact_expressions: G: Ellipse;Expression(G) = (x^2/4 + y^2 = 1);P: Point;PointOnCurve(P, G);A: Point;Coordinate(A) = (0, 2)

text: 双曲线$x^{2}-\frac{y^{2}}{3}=1$的右焦点坐标是?焦点到渐近线的距离为?
fact_expressions: G: Hyperbola;Expression(G) = (x^2 - y^2/3 = 1)

text: 双曲线$x^{2}-\frac{y^{2}}{8}=1$的右焦点到直线$x+2 y+7=0$的距离为?
fact_expressions: G: Hyperbola;H: Line;Expression(G) = (x^2 - y^2/8 = 1);Expression(H) = (x + 2*y + 7 = 0)
G: Hyperbola;C: Circle;r: Number;Expression(G) = (x^2 - y^2 = 1);r>0;Expression(C) = (y^2 + (x - 2)^2 = r^2);Length(InterceptChord(OneOf(Asymptote(G)),C))=2*sqrt(2)

text: 已知焦点为$F$的抛物线的方程为$y^{2}=4 x$，点$Q$的坐标为$(3,4)$，点$P$在抛物线上，则点$P$到$y$轴的距离与到点$Q$的距离的和的最小值为?
fact_expressions: G: Parabola;P: Point;F: Point;Q: Point;Coordinate(Q) = (3, 4);Focus(G) = F;Expression(G) = (y^2 = 4*x);PointOnCurve(P, G)

text: 设以原点为圆心的圆与$x$轴交$A$、$B$两点，如果以$A$、$B$为焦点的椭圆$\frac{x^{2}}{a^{2}}+\frac{y^{2}}{b^{2}}=1(a>b>0)$与圆总有公共点，那么椭圆的离心率取值范围是?
fact_expressions: H: Circle;O: Origin;Center(H) = O;Intersection(H, xAxis) = {A, B};A: Point;B: Point;Focus(G) = {A, B};G: Ellipse;Expression(G) = (y^2/b^2 + x^2/a^2 = 1);a: Number;b: Number;a > b;b > 0;IsIntersect(H, G) = True

text: 椭圆$x^{2}+4 y^{2}=16$上点的纵坐标的取值范围是?
fact_expressions: G: Ellipse;Expression(G) = (x^2 + 4*y^2 = 16);P:Point;PointOnCurve(P,G)

text: 以椭圆的右焦点$F_{2}$为圆心的圆恰好过椭圆的中心，交椭圆于点$M$ , $N$，椭圆的左焦点为$F_{1}$，且直线$M F_{1}$与此圆相切，则椭圆的离心率$e$为?
fact_expressions: M: Point;N:Point;F1: Point;G: Ellipse;H: Circle;e: Number;F2:Point;Center(H)=F2;PointOnCurve(Center(G),H);Intersection(H,G)={M,N};LeftFocus(G)=F1;RightFocus(G)=F2;IsTangent(LineOf(M,F1),H);Eccentricity(G) = e

text: 已知抛物线$C$: $y^{2}=2 p x(p>0)$的焦点为$F$，直线$l$: $y=x+m$与$C$交于$M$、$N$两点，若$|M F|=2$ ,$|N F|=3$，则$|M N|$=?
fact_expressions: C: Parabola;Expression(C) = (y^2 = 2*p*x);p: Number;p>0;F: Point;Focus(C) = F;l: Line;Expression(l) = (y = m + x);m: Number;Intersection(l, C) = {M, N};M: Point;N: Point;Abs(LineSegmentOf(M, F)) = 2;Abs(LineSegmentOf(N, F)) = 3

text: 已知直线$y=x+\frac{p}{2}$与抛物线$C$: $x^{2}=2 p y(p>0)$相交于$A$、$B$两点，且$|A B|=8$，则抛物线$C$的准线方程为?
fact_expressions: C: Parabola;p: Number;G: Line;A: Point;B: Point;p>0;Expression(C) = (x^2 = 2*(p*y));Expression(G) = (y = p/2 + x);Intersection(G, C) = {A, B};Abs(LineSegmentOf(A, B)) = 8

text: 抛物线顶点在坐标原点，以$y$轴为对称轴，过焦点且与$y$轴垂直的弦长为$16$，则抛物线方程为?
fact_expressions: G: Parabola;O: Origin;Vertex(G) = O;SymmetryAxis(G) = yAxis;L: LineSegment;PointOnCurve(Focus(G), L) = True;IsPerpendicular(L, yAxis) = True;IsChordOf(L, G) = True;Length(L) = 16

text: 已知椭圆$E$: $\frac{x^{2}}{a^{2}}+\frac{y^{2}}{b^{2}}=1(a>b>0)$的右焦点为$F(c, 0)$，若点$F$到直线$b x-a y=0$的距离为$\frac{\sqrt{3}}{3} c$，则$E$的离心率为?
fact_expressions: E: Ellipse;b: Number;a: Number;G: Line;F: Point;c:Number;a > b;b > 0;Expression(E) = (y^2/b^2 + x^2/a^2 = 1);Expression(G) = (-a*y + b*x = 0);Coordinate(F) = (c, 0);RightFocus(E) = F;Distance(F, G) = (sqrt(3)/3)*c

text: 设$F_{1}$、$F_{2}$分别为双曲线$C$: $x^{2}-\frac{y^{2}}{24}=1$的左、右焦点，$P$为双曲线$C$在第一象限上的一点，若$\frac{|P F_{1}|}{|P F_{2}|}=\frac{5}{4}$，则$\triangle P F_{1} F_{2}$内切圆的面积为?
fact_expressions: F1: Point;F2: Point;LeftFocus(C) = F1;RightFocus(C) = F2;C: Hyperbola;Expression(C) = (x^2 - y^2/24 = 1);P: Point;PointOnCurve(P, C) = True;Quadrant(P) = 1;Abs(LineSegmentOf(P, F1))/Abs(LineSegmentOf(P, F2)) = 5/4

text: 已知抛物线$y^{2}=8 x$的焦点为$F$、$P$是抛物线上一点，若$|P F|=3$，则$P$点的横坐标为?
fact_expressions: G: Parabola;P: Point;F: Point;Expression(G) = (y^2 = 8*x);Focus(G) = F;PointOnCurve(P, G);Abs(LineSegmentOf(P, F)) = 3

text: 已知$F_{1}(-c, 0)$, $F_{2}(c, 0)$是椭圆$C$: $\frac{x^{2}}{a^{2}}+\frac{y^{2}}{b^{2}}=1(a>b>0)$的左、右焦点，若椭圆$C$上存在一点$P$使得$\overrightarrow{P F_{1}} \cdot \overrightarrow{P F_{2}}=3 c^{2}$，则椭圆$C$的离心率$e$的取值范围是?
fact_expressions: C: Ellipse;Expression(C) = (y^2/b^2 + x^2/a^2 = 1);b: Number;a: Number;a > b;b > 0;c: Number;F1: Point;F2: Point;Coordinate(F1) = (-c, 0);Coordinate(F2) = (c, 0);LeftFocus(C) = F1;RightFocus(C) = F2;P: Point;PointOnCurve(P, C);DotProduct(VectorOf(P, F1), VectorOf(P, F2)) = 3*c^2;e: Number;Eccentricity(C) = e

text: 已知双曲线$x^{2}-3 y^{2}=3$，则双曲线的渐近线方程为?
fact_expressions: G: Hyperbola;Expression(G) = (x^2 - 3*y^2 = 3)

text: 过椭圆$\frac{x^{2}}{a^{2}}+\frac{y^{2}}{b^{2}}=1(a>b>0)$的中心做一直线交椭圆于$P$、$Q$两点，$F$是椭圆的一个焦点，则$\triangle P F Q$的周长的最小值为?
fact_expressions: G: Ellipse;Expression(G) = (y^2/b^2 + x^2/a^2 = 1);b: Number;a: Number;a > b;b > 0;PointOnCurve(Center(G), H) = True;H: Line;Intersection(H, G) = {P, Q};P: Point;Q: Point;F: Point;OneOf(Focus(G)) = F

text: 与双曲线$\frac{x^{2}}{16}-\frac{y^{2}}{4}=1$共焦点，且过点$(3 \sqrt{2} , 2)$的双曲线方程为?
fact_expressions: G: Hyperbola;Z: Hyperbola;H: Point;Expression(G) = (x^2/16 - y^2/4 = 1);Coordinate(H) = (3*sqrt(2), 2);PointOnCurve(H, Z);Focus(G) = Focus(Z)

text: 过抛物线$y^{2}=2 p x(p>0)$的焦点$F$作直线$l$，交抛物线于$A$、$B$两点，交其准线于$C$点，若$\overrightarrow{C B}=3 \overrightarrow{B F}$，则直线$l$的斜率为?
fact_expressions: G: Parabola;Expression(G) = (y^2 = 2*p*x);p: Number;p>0;F: Point;Focus(G) = F;l: Line;PointOnCurve(F, l);A: Point;B: Point;Intersection(l, G) = {A, B};C: Point;Intersection(l, Directrix(G)) = C;VectorOf(C, B) = 3*VectorOf(B, F)

text: 过抛物线$y^{2}=2 p x(p>0)$的焦点$F$作两条互相垂直的弦$A B$ , $C D$，若$|A B|+|C D|$的最小值为$16$，则抛物线的方程为?
fact_expressions: F: Point;Focus(G) = F;G: Parabola;Expression(G) = (y^2 = 2*p*x);p: Number;p>0;A: Point;B: Point;C: Point;D: Point;IsChordOf(LineSegmentOf(A, B), G);IsChordOf(LineSegmentOf(C, D), G);PointOnCurve(F, LineSegmentOf(A, B));PointOnCurve(F, LineSegmentOf(C, D));IsPerpendicular(LineSegmentOf(A, B), LineSegmentOf(C, D));Min(Abs(LineSegmentOf(A, B)) + Abs(LineSegmentOf(C, D))) = 16

text: 试写出一个中心为坐标原点，焦点在坐标轴上，渐近线方程为$y=\pm 2 x$的双曲线方程?
fact_expressions: G: Hyperbola;O:Origin;Expression(Asymptote(G)) = (y = pm*(2*x));Center(G)=O;PointOnCurve(Focus(G),axis)

text: 已知直线$x=1$与抛物线$C$: $y^{2}=2 p x(p>0)$交于点$M$，与$x$轴交于点$N$，点$A$、$B$都在抛物线$C$上，且直线$A B$的斜率为$2$，点$N$到直线$M A$，$M B$的距离相等，则$p$的值为?
fact_expressions: C: Parabola;p: Number;G: Line;B: Point;A: Point;M: Point;N: Point;p>0;Expression(C) = (y^2 = 2*p*x);Expression(G) = (x = 1);Intersection(G, C) = M;Intersection(G,xAxis)=N;PointOnCurve(A, C);PointOnCurve(B, C);Slope(LineOf(A,B)) = 2;Distance(N,LineOf(M,A))=Distance(N,LineOf(M,B))

text: 已知双曲线$\frac{x^{2}}{a^{2}}-y^{2}=1$的一条渐近线方程为$x-2 y=0$，则该双曲线的离心率$e$=?
fact_expressions: G: Hyperbola;a: Number;e: Number;Expression(G) = (-y^2 + x^2/a^2 = 1);Expression(OneOf(Asymptote(G))) = (x - 2*y = 0);Eccentricity(G) = e

text: 经过椭圆$\frac{x^{2}}{a^{2}} +\frac{y^{2}}{b^{2}}=1(a>b>0)$的一个焦点和短轴端点的直线与原点的距离为$\frac{b}{2}$，则该椭圆的离心率为?
fact_expressions: G: Ellipse;b: Number;a: Number;H: Line;O:Origin;a > b;b > 0;Expression(G) = (y^2/b^2 + x^2/a^2 = 1);PointOnCurve(OneOf(Focus(G)),H);PointOnCurve(Endpoint(MinorAxis(G)),H);Distance(OneOf(Focus(G)),H)=b/2

text: 直线$l$经过点$A(t, 0)$，且与曲线$y=x^{2}$相切，若直线$l$的倾斜角为$45^{\circ}$，则$t$=?
fact_expressions: l: Line;G: Curve;A: Point;Expression(G) = (y = x^2);Coordinate(A) = (t, 0);Inclination(l) = ApplyUnit(45, degree);PointOnCurve(A,l);IsTangent(l, G);t:Number

text: 已知过抛物线$C$: $y^{2}=4 x$的焦点$F$且斜率为$-1$的直线$l$交抛物线$C$于$A$、$B$两点，则$|A B|$=?
fact_expressions: C: Parabola;Expression(C) = (y^2 = 4*x);F: Point;Focus(C) = F;PointOnCurve(F, l) = True;Slope(l) = -1;l: Line;Intersection(l, C) = {A, B};A: Point;B: Point

text: 抛物线$C$: $y^{2}=4 x$的准线与$x$轴交于点$M$，过焦点$F$作倾斜角为$60^{\circ}$的直线与$C$交于$A$、$B$两点，则$\tan \angle A M B$=?
fact_expressions: C: Parabola;Expression(C) = (y^2 = 4*x);Intersection(Directrix(C), xAxis) = M;M: Point;F: Point;Focus(C) = F;L: Line;Inclination(L) = ApplyUnit(60,degree);PointOnCurve(F,L) = True;Intersection(L,C) = {A,B};A: Point;B: Point

text: 斜率为$2$的直线过抛物线$C$: $y^{2}=4 x$的焦点，且与$C$交于$A$、$B$两点，则$|A B|$=?
fact_expressions: Slope(G) = 2;G: Line;C: Parabola;Expression(C) = (y^2 = 4*x);PointOnCurve(Focus(C), G) =  True;Intersection(G, C) = {A, B};A: Point;B: Point

text: 斜率为$\sqrt{3}$的直线过抛物线$C$: $y^{2}=4 x$的焦点，且与$C$交于$A$、$B$两点，则$|A B|$=?
fact_expressions: Slope(G) = sqrt(3);G: Line;C: Parabola;Expression(C) = (y^2 = 4*x);PointOnCurve(Focus(C), G) = True;Intersection(G, C) = {A, B};A: Point;B: Point

text: 若双曲线$C$: $\frac{x^{2}}{m}-\frac{y^{2}}{9}=1(m>0)$的一条渐近线方程为$y=\frac{1}{3} x$，则$m$=?
fact_expressions: C: Hyperbola;Expression(C) = (-y^2/9 + x^2/m = 1);m: Number;m>0;Expression(OneOf(Asymptote(C))) = (y = x/3)

text: 已知$k \in[-2,-1]$，则双曲线$x^{2}+k y^{2}=1$的离心率的取值范围是?
fact_expressions: G: Hyperbola;k: Number;Expression(G) = (k*y^2 + x^2 = 1);In(k,[-2,-1])

text: 已知椭圆$C$: $\frac{x^{2}}{6}+\frac{y^{2}}{3}=1$上有一点$P(2,1)$，若直线$l$:$ y=-x+b$交椭圆$C$于不同的两点$A$,$B$，且$P A \perp P B$，则$b$=?
fact_expressions: l: Line;C: Ellipse;P: Point;A: Point;B: Point;b:Number;Expression(C) = (x^2/6 + y^2/3 = 1);PointOnCurve(P,C);Coordinate(P) = (2, 1);Expression(l)=(y=-x+b);Intersection(l, C) = {A,B};IsPerpendicular(LineSegmentOf(P, A), LineSegmentOf(P, B));Negation(A=B)

text: 已知$P$为椭圆$\frac{x^{2}}{10}+y^{2}=1$上一个动点，直线$l$过圆$x^{2}+(y-6)^{2}=2$的圆心与圆相交于$A$、$B$两点，则$\overrightarrow{P A} \cdot \overrightarrow{P B}$的最大值为?
fact_expressions: l: Line;G: Ellipse;H:Circle;P: Point;A: Point;B: Point;Expression(G) = (x^2/10 + y^2 = 1);Expression(H) = (x^2 + (y - 6)^2 = 2);PointOnCurve(P, G);PointOnCurve(Center(H),l);Intersection(l, H) = {A, B}

text: 椭圆$\frac{x^{2}}{a^{2}}+\frac{y^{2}}{b^{2}}=1(a>b>0)$的左顶点为$A$，右焦点为$F$，上顶点为$B$，下顶点为$C$，若直线$A B$与直线$C F$的交点为 $(3a,16)$，则椭圆的标准方程为?
fact_expressions: G: Ellipse;b: Number;a: Number;B: Point;A: Point;F: Point;C: Point;a > b;b > 0;Expression(G) = (y^2/b^2 + x^2/a^2 = 1);LeftVertex(G) = A;RightFocus(G) = F;UpperVertex(G) = B;LowerVertex(G) = C;T:Point;Coordinate(T)=(3*a,16);Intersection(LineOf(A,B),LineOf(C,F))=T

text: 已知椭圆$E$的中心为原点，焦点在$x$轴上，椭圆上一点到焦点的最小距离为$2 \sqrt{2}-2$，离心率为$\frac{\sqrt{2}}{2}$，则椭圆$E$的方程为?
fact_expressions: E: Ellipse;O: Origin;Center(E) = O;PointOnCurve(Focus(E), xAxis);K: Point;PointOnCurve(K, E);Min(Distance(K, Focus(E))) = 2*sqrt(2) - 2;Eccentricity(E) = sqrt(2)/2

text: 有椭圆$\Gamma$: $\frac{x^{2}}{a^{2}}+\frac{y^{2}}{b^{2}}=1(a>b>0)$, $A$ , $B$为椭圆$\Gamma$长轴的端点，$C$、$D$为椭圆$\Gamma$短轴的端点，动点$M$满足$\frac{|M A|}{|M B|}=2$, $\Delta M A B$的面积的最大值为$8$，$\triangle M C D$的面积的最小值为$1$，则椭圆$\Gamma$的离心率为?
fact_expressions: Gamma: Ellipse;M: Point;A: Point;B: Point;C: Point;D: Point;a:Number;b:Number;a>b;b>0;Expression(Gamma) = (x^2/a^2+y^2/b^2=1);Endpoint(MajorAxis(Gamma))={A,B};Endpoint(MinorAxis(Gamma))={C,D};Abs(LineSegmentOf(M, A))/Abs(LineSegmentOf(M, B)) = 2;Max(Area(TriangleOf(M, A, B))) = 8;Min(Area(TriangleOf(M, C, D))) = 1
G: Ellipse;Expression(G) = (x^2/b^2 + y^2/a^2 = 1);b: Number;a: Number;a > b;b > 0;P: Point;PointOnCurve(P, G);F1: Point;F2: Point;Focus(G) = {F1, F2};Distance(P, F1) + Distance(P, F2) = 6

text: 已知双曲线$\frac{x^{2}}{4}-\frac{y^{2}}{12}=1$的离心率为$e$，焦点为$F$的抛物线$y^{2}=2 p x$与直线$y=k(x-\frac{p}{2})$交于$A$、$B$两点，且$\frac{|A F|}{|F B|}=e$，则$k$的值为?
fact_expressions: G: Hyperbola;H: Parabola;p: Number;I: Line;A: Point;F: Point;B: Point;k:Number;e:Number;Expression(G) = (x^2/4 - y^2/12 = 1);Expression(H) = (y^2 = 2*(p*x));Expression(I) = (y = k*(-p/2 + x));Eccentricity(G) = e;Focus(H)=F;Intersection(H, I) = {A, B};Abs(LineSegmentOf(A, F))/Abs(LineSegmentOf(F, B)) = e

text:
中心在原点，焦点在$x$轴的双曲线的一条渐近线方程是$y=\frac{3}{4} x$，焦点到渐近线的距离为$6$，
则双曲线方程是?
fact_expressions: G: Hyperbola;O: Origin;Center(G) = O;PointOnCurve(Focus(G), xAxis);Expression(OneOf(Asymptote(G))) = (y = (3/4)*x);Distance(Focus(G), Asymptote(G)) = 6

text: 已知双曲线$\frac{x^{2}}{a^{2}}-\frac{y^{2}}{b^{2}}=1$的两条渐近线与抛物线$y^{2}=4 x$分别相交于异于原点$O$的两点$A$, $B$, $F$为抛物线$y^{2}=4 x$的焦点，已知$\angle A F B=\frac{2 \pi}{3}$，则该双曲线的离心率为?
fact_expressions: G: Hyperbola;Expression(G) = (-y^2/b^2 + x^2/a^2 = 1);a: Number;b: Number;L1: Line;L2: Line;Asymptote(G) = {L1, L2};H: Parabola;Expression(H) = (y^2 = 4*x);O: Origin;A: Point;Intersection(L1, H) = A;B: Point;Intersection(L2, H) = B;Negation(O=A);Negation(O=B);F: Point;Focus(H) = F;AngleOf(A, F, B) = (2*pi)/3

C1: Hyperbola;Expression(C1) = (x^2/a1^2 - y^2/b1^2 = 1);a1: Number;b1: Number;a1>0;b1>0;C2: Hyperbola;Expression(C2) = (y^2/a2^2 - x^2/b2^2 = 1);a2: Number;b2: Number;a2>0;b2>0;Asymptote(C1) = Asymptote(C2);Eccentricity(C1) = 2

text: 已知$F_{1}$、$F_{2}$是椭圆$C$:$ \frac{x^{2}}{3}+\frac{y^{2}}{4}=1$的两个焦点，过$F_{1}$的直线与椭圆$C$交于$M$，$N$两点，则$\Delta F_{2} M N$的周长为?
fact_expressions: C: Ellipse;G: Line;F2: Point;M: Point;N: Point;F1: Point;Expression(C) = (x^2/3 + y^2/4 = 1);Focus(C) = {F1, F2};PointOnCurve(F1, G);Intersection(G, C) = {M,N}

text: 已知双曲线$\frac{x^{2}}{a^{2}}-y^{2}=1  (a>0)$的右焦点与抛物线$y^{2}=8 x$焦点重合，则此双曲线的渐近线方程是?
fact_expressions: G: Hyperbola;a: Number;H: Parabola;a>0;Expression(G) = (-y^2 + x^2/a^2 = 1);Expression(H) = (y^2 = 8*x);RightFocus(G) = Focus(H)

text: 已知$F_{1}$、$F_{2}$分别是双曲线$E$: $\frac{x^{2}}{a^{2}}-\frac{y^{2}}{b^{2}}=1(a>0, b>0)$的左、右焦点，过点$F_{1}$的直线$l$与$E$仅有一个公共点，且$l$与$\odot O$: $x^{2}+y^{2}=2 a^{2}$相切，则该双曲线的离心率为?
fact_expressions: F1: Point;F2: Point;LeftFocus(E) = F1;RightFocus(E) = F2;E: Hyperbola;Expression(E) = (-y^2/b^2 + x^2/a^2 = 1);b: Number;a: Number;a>0;b>0;l: Line;PointOnCurve(F1, l);NumIntersection(l, E) = 1;O1: Circle;Expression(O1) = (x^2 + y^2 = 2*a^2);IsTangent(l,O1) = True

text: $P$是双曲线$\frac{x^{2}}{a^{2}}-\frac{y^{2}}{b^{2}}=1(a>0, b>0)$右支上的一点，$F_{1}$、$F_{2}$分别是左、右焦点，且焦距为$2 c$，则$\Delta P F_{1} F_{2}$的内切圆的圆心的横坐标为?

text: 双曲线$x^{2}-y^{2}=1$左支上一点$(a , b)$到其渐近线$y=x$的距离是$\sqrt {2}$，则$a+b$的值为?
fact_expressions: G: Hyperbola;H: Point;a: Number;b: Number;Expression(G) = (x^2 - y^2 = 1);Coordinate(H) = (a, b);PointOnCurve(H, LeftPart(G));Expression(L) = (y = x);Distance(H, L) = sqrt(2);OneOf(Asymptote(G)) = L;L:Line

text: 已知双曲线$\frac{x^{2}}{a^{2}}-\frac{y^{2}}{b^{2}}=1(a>0, b>0)$的一个焦点与抛物线$y^{2}=4 x$的焦点重合，且焦点到渐近线的距离为$\frac{\sqrt{3}}{2}$，那么双曲线的离心率为?

text: 设$P$为曲线$C$: $x=\sqrt{4-4 y^{2}}$上一点，$A(-\sqrt{3}, 0)$,$B(\sqrt{3}, 0)$,$|P B|=1$，则$\triangle P A B$的内切圆的半径为?
fact_expressions: C: Curve;A: Point;B: Point;P: Point;Expression(C) = (x = sqrt(4 - 4*y^2));Coordinate(A) = (-sqrt(3), 0);Coordinate(B) = (sqrt(3), 0);PointOnCurve(P, C);Abs(LineSegmentOf(P, B)) = 1

text: 若双曲线$C$: $\frac{x^{2}}{2}-\frac{y^{2}}{\lambda}=1$的离心率不大于$\sqrt{2 \lambda-5}$，则$C$的虚轴长的取值范围为?
fact_expressions: C: Hyperbola;Expression(C) = (x^2/2 - y^2/lambda = 1);lambda: Number;Negation(Eccentricity(C) > sqrt(2*lambda - 5))
G: Hyperbola;Expression(G) = (3*x^2 - y^2 = 12)

text: 已知椭圆的中心在原点，焦点在$y$轴上，若其离心率为$\frac{1}{2}$，焦距为$8$，则该椭圆的方程是?

text: 已知抛物线$C$: $x^{2}=4 y$的焦点为$F$、$A$为$C$上一点，线段$F A$的延长线交$x$轴于$B$点，若点$A$到$l$: $y=-1$的距离$d$等于$A$到$B$的距离，则$|F B|$=?

text: 已知双曲线$C$: $\frac{x^{2}}{a^{2}}-\frac{y^{2}}{4}=1$的一条渐近线方程为$2 x+3 y=0$, $F_{1}$ , $F_{2}$分别是双曲线$C$的左、右焦点，点$P$在双曲线$C$上，且$|P F_{1}|=7$，则$|P F_{2}|$=?

text: 已知定点$A(-3,0)$ , $B(3,0)$，动点$P$在抛物线$y^{2}=2 x$上移动，则$\overrightarrow{P A} \cdot \overrightarrow{P B}$的最小值等于?

text: 已知点$F_{1}(-4 , 0)$和$F_{2}(4 , 0)$，一曲线上的动点$P$到$F_{1}$、$F_{2}$的距离的差的绝对值是$6$，该曲线方程是?

text: 虚轴长为$2$，离心率$e=3$的双曲线两焦点为$F_{1}$、$F_{2}$，过$F_{1}$作直线交双曲线于$A$、$B$两点，且$|A B|=8$，则$\triangle A B F_{2}$的周长为?

text: 若双曲线的渐近线方程为$y=\pm 3 x$，它的一个焦点与抛物线$y^{2}=4 \sqrt{10} x$的焦点重合，则双曲线的标准方程为?

text: 若双曲线$C$: $x^{2}-\frac{y^{2}}{m}=1$的离心率不大于$\sqrt{2 m-8}$，则$C$的虚轴长的取值范围为?

text: 已知$P$是双曲线$\frac{x^{2}}{4}-y^{2}=1$的右支 (在第一象限内) 上的任意一点，$A_{1}$、$A_{2}$分别是其左右顶点，$O$是坐标原点，直线$PA_{1}$ , $PO $, $PA_{2}$的斜率分别为$k_{1}$ , $k_{2}$ , $k_{3}$，则斜率$k_{1} k_{2} k_{3}$的取值范围是?

text: 已知椭圆和双曲线有相同的焦点$F_{1}$、$F_{2}$，它们的离心率分别为$e_{1}$, $e_{2}$ , $P$是它们的一个公共点，且$\angle F_{1} P F_{2}=\frac{2 \pi}{3}$. 若$e_{1} e_{2}=\sqrt{3}$，则$e_{2}$=?

text: 若抛物线$y^{2}=4 x$的焦点为$F$，过$F$且斜率为$1$的直线交抛物线于$A$、$B$两点，动点$P$在曲线$y^{2}=-4 x(y \geq 0)$上，则$\triangle P A B$的面积的最小值为?

text: 已知双曲线$x^{2}-\frac{y^{2}}{3}=1$的左右焦点为$F_{1}$、$F_{2}$，过$F_{2}$的直线与双曲线右支交于$A$、$B$两点，则$\triangle A F_{1} F_{2} , \triangle B F_{1} F_{2}$的内切圆面积之和的取值范围是?

text: 已知$F_{1}$、$F_{2}$分别是$\frac{x^{2}}{a^{2}}+\frac{y^{2}}{b^{2}}=1(a>b>0)$的左、右焦点，点$A$是椭圆上位于第一象限内的一点，$O$为坐标原点，且满足$\overrightarrow{O A} \cdot \overrightarrow{O F_{2}}=|\overrightarrow{O F_{2}}|^{2}$，若直线$O A$的方程是$y=\frac{\sqrt{2}}{2} x$，则椭圆的离心率等于?

text: 设$F_{1}(-c , 0)$ , $F_{2}(c, 0)$是椭圆$\frac{x^{2}}{a^{2}}+\frac{y^{2}}{b^{2}}=1(a>b>0)$的两个焦点，$P$是以$|F_{1}F_{2}|$为直径的圆与椭圆的一个交点，且$\angle PF_{1} F_{2}=5 \angle PF_{2} F_{1}$，则该椭圆的离心率为?

text: 已知$F_{1}$、$F_{2}$分别是椭圆$\frac{x^{2}}{a^{2}}+\frac{y^{2}}{b^{2}}=1$的左、右焦点，$P$是以$F_{1} F_{2}$为直径的圆与该椭圆的一个交点，且$\angle PF_{1} F_{2}=2 \angle PF_{2} F_{1}$，则这个椭圆的离心率是?

text: 已知点$P$为双曲线$\frac{x^{2}}{a^{2}}-\frac{y^{2}}{b^{2}}=1(a>0 , b>0)$上任一点，点$P$到双曲线两条渐近线的距离分别为$d_{1}$,$d_{2}$，若$3 a^{2}+b^{2} \leq 8 d_{1} d_{2}$，则该双曲线离心率的取值范围为?

text: 已知椭圆$C$: $\frac{x^{2}}{4}+\frac{y^{2}}{3}=1$的右顶点为$A$, 点$M(2,4)$, 过椭圆$C$上任意一点$P$作直线$M A$的垂线, 垂足为$H$, 则$2|P M|+|P H|$的最小值为?

text: 已知椭圆$C$:$\frac{x^{2}}{a^{2}}+\frac{y^{2}}{b^{2}}=1(a>b>0)$ , $F_{1}$ , $F_{2}$分别为椭圆的左、右焦点，若椭圆$C$上存在点$P(x_{0}, y_{0})(x_{0} \geq 0)$使得$\angle P F_{1} F_{2}=60^{\circ}$，则椭圆的离心率的取值范围为?

text: 已知双曲线左右焦点分别为$F_{1}$, $F_{2}$，双曲线右支上一点$P$使得$|P F_{1}|=3|P F_{2}|$，则双曲线的离心率范围是?

text: 已知椭圆$C$: $\frac{x^{2}}{4}+\frac{y^{2}}{3}=1$, $F$为椭圆$C$的右焦点，过原点$O$且斜率不为$0$的直线$l$与椭圆$C$交于不同的两点$P$、$Q$，则$\Delta P Q F$面积最大值为?

text: 直线$y=b$与双曲线$\frac{x^{2}}{a^{2}}-\frac{y^{2}}{b^{2}}=1(a>0, b>0)$的左、右支分别交于$B$、$C$两点，若$O B \perp O C$ , $O$为坐标原点，则双曲线的渐近线方程为?

text: 已知椭圆$\frac{x^{2}}{16}+\frac{y^{2}}{7}=1$的左、右焦点分别为$F_{1}$、$F_{2}$、$O$为坐标原点，椭圆上一点$P$满足$|O P|=3$，则$\Delta F_{1} P F_{2}$的面积为?

text: 已知点$P(1,2)$在抛物线$E$:$ y^{2}=2 p x(p>0)$上，过点$M(1,0)$的直线$l$交抛物线$E$于$A$、$B$两点，若$\overrightarrow{A M}=3 \overrightarrow{M B}$，则直线$l$的倾斜角的正弦值为?

text: 已知点$P(1,2)$在抛物线$E$: $y^{2}=2 p x(p>0)$上，过点$M(1,0)$且斜率大于零的直线$l$交抛物线$E$于$A$、$B$两点，若$\overrightarrow{A M}=3 \overrightarrow{M B}$，则直线$l$的倾斜角为?

text: 抛物线$x^{2}=8 y$的准线与$y$轴交于点$A$, 点$B$在抛物线对称轴上，过$A$可作直线交抛物线于点$M$、$N$，使得$\overrightarrow{B M}\cdot \overrightarrow{M N}=-\frac{1}{2} \overrightarrow{M N}^{2}$，则$|O B|$的取值范围是?

text: 设$O$为坐标原点，$F_{1}$、$F_{2}$是$\frac{x^{2}}{a^{2}}-\frac{y^{2}}{b^{2}}=1(a>0, b>0)$的焦点，若在双曲线上存在点$P$，满足$\angle F_{1} P F_{2}=60^{\circ}$ ,$|O P|=\sqrt{7} a$，则该双曲线的离心率为?

text: 双曲线$C$: $\frac{x^{2}}{a^{2}}-\frac{y^{2}}{b^{2}}=1(a>0, b>0)$的焦点到其渐近线的距离为$2$，且$C$的焦距与椭圆$\frac{y^{2}}{25}+\frac{x^{2}}{20}=1$的焦距相等，则双曲线$C$的渐近线方程是?

text: 若直线$y=a x-1(a \in R)$与焦点在$x$轴上的椭圆$\frac{x^{2}}{5}+\frac{y^{2}}{m}=1$总有公共点，则$m$的取值范围是?

text: 直线$y=k x+1$与焦点在$x$轴上的椭圆$\frac{x^{2}}{9}+\frac{y^{2}}{m}=1$总有公共点，则实数$m$的取值范围为?

text: 已知$F_{1}$、$F_{2}$是双曲线$\Gamma$: $\frac{x^{2}}{a^{2}}-\frac{y^{2}}{b^{2}}=1(a>0, b>0)$的左、右焦点，$A$、$B$分别在双曲线的左右两支上，且满足$\overrightarrow{A B}=\lambda \overrightarrow{F_{1} A}$（$\lambda$ 为常数)，点$C$在$x$轴上，$\overrightarrow{C B}=3 \overrightarrow{F_{2} A}$，$\frac{\overrightarrow{B F_{2}} \cdot \overrightarrow{B F_{1}}}{|\overrightarrow{B F_{1}}|}=\frac{\overrightarrow{B F_{2}} \cdot \overrightarrow{B C}}{|\overrightarrow{B C}|}$，则双曲线$\Gamma$的离心率为?
fact_expressions: Gamma: Hyperbola;a: Number;b: Number;lambda:Number;A: Point;B: Point;F1: Point;C: Point;F2: Point;a>0;b>0;Expression(Gamma) = (x^2/a^2 - y^2/b^2 = 1);LeftFocus(Gamma) = F1;RightFocus(Gamma) = F2;PointOnCurve(A,LeftPart(Gamma));PointOnCurve(B,RightPart(Gamma));VectorOf(A,B)=lambda*VectorOf(F1,A);PointOnCurve(C, xAxis);VectorOf(C, B) = 3*VectorOf(F2, A);DotProduct(VectorOf(B, F2), VectorOf(B, F1))/Abs(VectorOf(B, F1)) = DotProduct(VectorOf(B, F2), VectorOf(B, C))/Abs(VectorOf(B, C))

text: 过双曲线$E$: $\frac{x^{2}}{a^{2}}-\frac{y^{2}}{b^{2}}=1(a>0, b>0)$的右顶点$A$作斜率为$-1$的直线，该直线与$E$的渐近线交于$B$、$C$两点，若$\overrightarrow{B C}+2 \overrightarrow{B A}=\overrightarrow{0}$，则双曲线$E$的渐近线方程为?

text: 已知双曲线$C$: $\frac{x^{2}}{a^{2}}-\frac{y^{2}}{b^{2}}=1  (a>0 , b>0)$的左、右焦点分别是$F_{1}$、$F_{2}$、$M$是$C$右支上一点，设$\angle F_{1} M F_{2}=\theta$. 若$\overrightarrow{M F_{1}} \cdot \overrightarrow{M F_{2}}=4 b^{2}$，则$\cos \theta$=?

text: 已知双曲线的顶点到渐近线的距离为$2$，焦点到渐近线的距离为$6$，则该双曲线的离心率为?

text: 已知双曲线$C$: $\frac{x^{2}}{a^{2}}-\frac{y^{2}}{b^{2}}=1(a>0, b>0)$的右焦点为$F$，直线$y=k x(k \neq 0)$与双曲线$C$交于$A$、$B$两点，若$\angle A F B=90^{\circ}$，且$\triangle O A F$的面积为$4 a^{2}$，则双曲线$C$的离心率为?

text: 若椭圆$C$: $m x^{2}+n y^{2}=1(m>0 , n>0 , m \neq n)$与直线$l$: $x+y-1=0$交于$A$、$B$两点，过原点与线段$A B$中点的直线斜率为$\frac{\sqrt{2}}{2}$，则$\frac{m}{n}$=?

text: 已知$C$、$F$分别是椭圆$\Gamma$: $\frac{x^{2}}{a^{2}}+\frac{y^{2}}{b^{2}}=1$的左顶点和左焦点，$A$、$B$是椭圆的下、上顶点，设$A F$和$B C$交于点$D$，若$\overrightarrow{C D}=2 \overrightarrow{D B}$，则椭圆$\Gamma$的离心率为?
fact_expressions: Gamma:Ellipse;A: Point;F: Point;B: Point;C: Point;D: Point;Expression(Gamma) = (x^2/a^2+y^2/b^2=1);LeftVertex(Gamma)=C;LeftFocus(Gamma)=F;LowerVertex(Gamma)=A;UpperVertex(Gamma)=B;Intersection(LineSegmentOf(A,F),LineSegmentOf(B,C))=D;VectorOf(C, D) = 2*VectorOf(D, B)

text: 已知椭圆$E$: $\frac{x^{2}}{a^{2}}+\frac{y^{2}}{b^{2}}=1(a>b>0)$ , $F_{1}(-c, 0)$ , $F_{2}(c, 0)$分别为其左、右焦点，以$F_{1} F_{2}$为直径的圆与椭圆$E$在第一象限交于点$P$，在第三象限交于点$Q$. 若$\triangle P Q F_{2}$的面积为$\frac{\sqrt{3}}{2} c^{2}$，则$\frac{c^{2}}{a^{2}+b^{2}}$=?
fact_expressions: E: Ellipse;b: Number;a: Number;G: Circle;F1: Point;F2: Point;P: Point;Q: Point;c: Number;a > b;b > 0;Expression(E) = (y^2/b^2 + x^2/a^2 = 1);Coordinate(F1) = (-c, 0);Coordinate(F2) = (c, 0);LeftFocus(E) = F1;RightFocus(E) = F2;IsDiameter(LineSegmentOf(F1, F2), G);Intersection(G, E) = {P, Q};Quadrant(P) = 1;Quadrant(Q) = 3;Area(TriangleOf(P, Q, F2)) = c^2*(sqrt(3)/2)

text: 若从圆$x^{2}+y^{2}=1$上任意一点$P$向$y$轴作垂线段，则线段中点$M$的轨迹方程为?
fact_expressions: G: Circle;H: LineSegment;Expression(G) = (x^2 + y^2 = 1);PointOnCurve(P,G);IsPerpendicular(H,yAxis);M:Point;MidPoint(H)=M;P:Point

text: 已知双曲线$C$: $\frac{x^{2}}{2}-\frac{y^{2}}{b^{2}}=1(a>0, b>0)$的离心率为$e$，若$e \in(\sqrt{5}, \sqrt{10})$，则$C$的焦点到一条渐近线的距离的取值范围为?

text: 已知抛物线$C$: $y^{2}=2 p x(p>0)$的焦点为$F$，准线为$l$，过$l$上一点$P$作抛物线$C$的两条切线，切点分别为$A$、$B$，若$|P A|=3$,$|P B|=4$，则$|P F|$=?

text: 点$P$为双曲线$\frac{x^{2}}{a^{2}}-\frac{y^{2}}{b^{2}}=1(a>0, b>0)$上一点，$F_{1}$、$F_{2}$为焦点，如果$\angle P F_{1} F_{2}=75^{\circ}$, $\angle P F_{2} F_{1}=15^{\circ}$, 则双曲线的离心率为?

text: 过点$P(0 ,-a)$作直线$l$与抛物线$C$: $x^{2}=4 ay(a>0)$相交于$A$ , $B$两点，$F$为$C$的焦点，若$|F A|=2| F B|$，则直线$l$的斜率为?

text: 点$P$是椭圆$\frac{x^{2}}{5} + \frac{y^{2}}{4}=1$上一点以点$P$以及焦点$F_{1}$ , $F_{2}$为顶点的三角形的面积等于$1$, 则$P$点的坐标为?

text:
已知椭圆$\frac{x^{2}}{a^{2}}+\frac{y^{2}}{b^{2}}=1  (a>b>0)$和圆$O$:$x^{2}+y^{2}=b^{2}$，过椭圆上一点$P$引圆$O$的两条切线，

text: 过椭圆$C$: $\frac{x^{2}}{a^{2}}+\frac{y^{2}}{b^{2}}=1(a>b>0)$长轴的一个顶点作圆$x^{2}+y^{2}=b^{2}$的两条切线,切点分别为$A$、$B$, 若$\angle A O B=90^{\circ}$($O$是坐标原点), 则椭圆$C$的离心率为?

text: 抛物线$y^{2}=2 p x(p>0)$的焦点为$F$、$A$、$B$为抛物线上的两点，以$A B$为直径的圆过点$F$，过$A B$的中点$M$作抛物线的准线的垂线$M N$，垂足为$N$，则$\frac{|M N|}{|AB|}$的最大值为?

text: 已知点$M$是抛物线$y^{2}=8 x$上的一动点，$F$为抛物线的焦点，$A$是圆$C$: $x^{2}+y^{2}-8 x-2 y+16=0$上一动点，则$|M A|+|M F|$的最小值为?

text: 已知双曲线$E$: $\frac{x^{2}}{a^{2}}-\frac{y^{2}}{b^{2}}=1(a>0, b>0)$，过其右焦点$F$的直线交$E$于$A$、$B$两点，交$y$轴于$P$点.且$\overrightarrow{P A}=3 \overrightarrow{A F}$, $\overrightarrow{P B}=-\frac{7}{3} \overrightarrow{B F}$，则$E$的离心率为?

text: 已知点$A(3,1)$，在抛物线$y^{2}=2 x$上找一点$P$，使得$|P F|+|P A|$取最小值（$F$为抛物线的焦点），此时点$P$的坐标是?

text: 已知动点$M$到定点$(8,0)$的距离等于$M$到$(2,0)$的距离的$2$倍，那么点$M$的轨迹方程?

text: 焦点在$y$轴上的双曲线的渐近线方程为$y=\pm \frac{\sqrt{5}}{2} x$，则该双曲线的离心率为?

text: 若焦点在$x$轴上的双曲线的渐近线方程为$y=\pm \frac{\sqrt{3}}{2} x$，则该双曲线的离心率是?
fact_expressions: G: Hyperbola;PointOnCurve(Focus(G), xAxis);Expression(Asymptote(G)) = (y = pm*x*(sqrt(3)/2))

text: 双曲线$\frac{x^{2}}{a^{2}}-\frac{y^{2}}{b^{2}}=1(a>0 , b>0)$的渐近线均与$x^{2}+y^{2}-4 x+1=0$相切，则该双曲线离心率等于?

text: 已知点$P$为椭圆$\frac{x^{2}}{45}+\frac{y^{2}}{20}=1$上且位于在第三象限内一点，且它与两焦点连线互相垂直，若点$P$到直线$4 x-3 y-2 m+1=0$的距离不大于$3$，则实数$m$的取值范围是?

text: 已知经过点$(1,0)$的直线$l$与抛物线$y^{2}=4 x$相交于$A$、$B$两点，点$C(-1 ,-1)$，且$C A \perp C B$，则$\triangle A B C$的面积为?
fact_expressions: H: Point;Coordinate(H) = (1, 0);l: Line;PointOnCurve(H, l);G: Parabola;Expression(G) = (y^2 = 4*x);A: Point;B: Point;Intersection(l, G) = {A, B};C: Point;Coordinate(C) = (-1, -1);IsPerpendicular(LineSegmentOf(C, A), LineSegmentOf(C, B))

text: 已知抛物线$C$: $y^{2}=4 x$的焦点为$F$，准线与$x$轴交于点$M$，点$N$在抛物线$C$上，记$|\overrightarrow{M N}|=\lambda|\overrightarrow{N F}|$. 当$\lambda$取最大值时，直线$O N$的方程为?
fact_expressions: C: Parabola;N: Point;O: Origin;M: Point;F: Point;Expression(C) = (y^2 = 4*x);Focus(C) = F;Intersection(Directrix(C), xAxis) = M;PointOnCurve(N, C);lambda:Number;Abs(VectorOf(M,N))=lambda*Abs(VectorOf(N,F));WhenMax(lambda)

text: 若直线$y=k x+2$与抛物线$y^{2}=x$只有一个交点，则实数$k$的值为?
fact_expressions: H: Line;Expression(H) = (y = k*x + 2);G: Parabola;Expression(G) = (y^2 = x);NumIntersection(H, G) = 1;k: Real

text: 直线$l$: $y=k(x+1)$与抛物线$y^{2}=x$只有一个公共点，则实数$k$的值为?
fact_expressions: l: Line;G: Parabola;k: Real;Expression(G) = (y^2 = x);Expression(l) = (y = k*(x + 1));NumIntersection(l,G)=1

text: 已知直线$y=\frac{\sqrt{3}}{3} x-2$与双曲线$\frac{x^{2}}{12}-\frac{y^{2}}{3}=1$的右支交于$A$、$B$两点，且在双曲线的右支上存在点$C$，使$\overrightarrow{O A}+\overrightarrow{O B}=t \overrightarrow{O C}$，则$t$的值?

text: 双曲线$x^{2}-4 y=1$的虚轴长为?
fact_expressions: G: Hyperbola;Expression(G) = (x^2 - 4*y = 1)

text: 已知$F$是抛物线$C$: $y^{2}=4 x$的焦点，$A$、$B$是$C$上的两个点，线段$A B$的中点为$M(2,2)$，则$\triangle A B F$的面积等于?

text: 已知$F$是抛物线$C$: $y^{2}=4 x$的焦点，$A$、$B$是$C$上的两个点，线段$A B$的中点为$M(2 , 2)$，则$\Delta ABF$的面积等于?

text: 已知双曲线$\frac{x^{2}}{a^{2}}-y^{2}=1(a>0)$的一条准线方程为$x=\frac{3}{2}$，则$a$等于?，该双曲线的离心率为?

text: 已知双曲线$\frac{x^{2}}{a^{2}}-y^{2}=1(a>0)$的一条准线方程为$x=\frac{3}{2}$，则$a$等于?该双曲线的离心率为?

text: 已知点$F_{1}$、$F_{2}$分别是双曲线$\frac{x^{2}}{16}-\frac{y^{2}}{9}=1$的左、右焦点，$P$为双曲线右支上一点，$I$是$\triangle P F_{1} F_{2}$的内心，且$S_{\triangle I P F_2}=S_{\triangle I P F_1}-\lambda S_{\triangle I F 1 F 2}$，则$\lambda$=?

text: 已知抛物线方程为$x^{2}=12 y$，过抛物线的焦点作倾斜角为$60^{\circ}$的直线与抛物线相交于$A$、$B$两点，则$|A B|$=?

text: 已知定点$B(3,0)$，点$A$在圆$x^{2}+y^{2}=1$上运动，$M$是线段$A B$上的中点，则点$M$的轨迹方程为?

text: 已知椭圆$E$:$\frac{x^{2}}{a^{2}}+\frac{y^{2}}{b^{2}}=1(a>b>0)$的右焦点为$F$，离心率为$\frac{\sqrt{3}}{2}$，过原点$O$且倾斜角为$\frac{\pi}{3}$的直线$l$与椭圆$E$相交于$A$, $B$两点，若$\triangle AFB$的周长为$4+\frac{8 \sqrt{13}}{13}$ ,则椭圆方程为?

text:
已知$P$为抛物线$y^{2}=4 x$上的动点，过$P$分别作$y$轴与直线$x-y+4=0$的垂线，垂足分别为$A$、$B$，
则$PA$+$PB$的最小值为?

text: 过双曲线$\frac{x^{2}}{4}-\frac{y^{2}}{3}=1$的左焦点$F_{1}$的直线交双曲线的左支于$A$、$B$两点，右焦点$F_{2}$，则$|A F_{2}| + |B F_{2}|-|A B|$的值是?

text:
已知$\triangle ABC$的顶点$B$、$C$在椭圆$\frac{x^{2}}{3}+y^{2}=1$上，顶点$A$与椭圆的焦点$F_{1}$重合，且椭圆的另外一
个焦点$F_{2}$在$BC$边上，则$\triangle ABC$的周长是?

text: 已知抛物线$C$: $y=\frac{1}{4} x^{2}$的焦点为$F$，过$F$且倾斜角为$\frac{\pi}{4}$的直线$l$交抛物线$C$于$A$、$B$两点，则线段$A B$的中点到抛物线$C$的准线的距离是?

text: 已知点$P$是抛物线$C$: $y^{2}=2 p x$上一点，$C$的焦点为$F(1 , 0)$，点$A$的坐标为$(4 , 2)$，则$|P F|+|P A|$的最小值为?

text: 倾斜角为$45^{\circ}$的直线$l$经过抛物线$y^{2}=4 x$的焦点$F$，且与抛物线交于$A$、$B$两点，则$A B$的长为?

text: 已知椭圆$\frac{x^{2}}{a^{2}}+ \frac{y^{2}}{b^{2}}=1(a>b>0)$的左焦点$F_{1}$, $O$为坐标原点,点$P$在椭圆上, 点$Q$在椭圆的右准线上, 若$\overrightarrow{PQ}=2 \overrightarrow{F_{1}O}$, $\overrightarrow{F_{1}Q}= \lambda(\frac{\overrightarrow{F_{1}P}}{|\overrightarrow{F_{1}P}|}+ \frac{\overrightarrow{F_{1} O}}{| \overrightarrow{F_{1}O}|})(\lambda>0)$,则椭圆的离心率为?

text: 已知椭圆$\frac{x^{2}}{a^{2}}+\frac{y^{2}}{b^{2}}=1(a>b>0)$的左焦点$F_{1}$、$O$为坐标原点，点$P$在椭圆上 (且不为椭圆的右顶点)，点$Q$在椭圆的右准线上，若$\overrightarrow{P Q}=2 \overrightarrow{F_{1} O}$,$\overrightarrow{F_{1} Q}=\lambda(\frac{\overrightarrow{F_{1} P}}{|\overrightarrow{F_{1} P}|}+\frac{\overrightarrow{F_{1} O}}{|\overrightarrow{F_{1} O}|})(\lambda>0)$,则椭圆的离心率为?
fact_expressions: C:Ellipse;a:Number;b:Number;lambda:Number;F1:Point;P:Point ;Q:Point;O:Origin;a>b ;b>0;Expression(C)=(x^2/a^2+y^2/b^2=1);LeftFocus(C)=F1;PointOnCurve(P,C);PointOnCurve(Q,RightDirectrix(C));VectorOf(P,Q)=2*VectorOf(F1,O);VectorOf(F1,Q) = lambda * (VectorOf(F1,P)/Abs(VectorOf(F1,P))+VectorOf(F1,O)/Abs(VectorOf(F1,O)));lambda>0;Negation(RightVertex(C)=P)

text: 已知椭圆$\frac{x^{2}}{a^{2}}+\frac{y^{2}}{b^{2}}=1(a>b>0)$的左焦点$F_{1}$、$O$为坐标原点,点$P$在椭圆上，点$Q$在椭圆的右准线上，若$\overrightarrow{P Q}=2 \overrightarrow{F_{1} O}$, $\overrightarrow{F_{1} Q}=\lambda(\frac{\overrightarrow{F_{1} P}}{|\overrightarrow{F_{1} P}|}+\frac{\overrightarrow{F_{1} O}}{| \overrightarrow{F_{1} O}|})(\lambda>0)$,则椭圆的离心率为?

text: 已知直线$y=a x+1$与双曲线$3 x^{2}-y^{2}=1$交于$A$、$B$两点，则$a$的取值范围是?
