text: 已知抛物线$y^{2}=2 p x(p>0)$的焦点坐标为$(1,0)$，则该抛物线上一点到焦点的距离的取值范围是?
fact_expressions: G: Parabola;Expression(G) = (y^2 = 2*(p*x));p: Number;p>0;Coordinate(Focus(G)) = (1, 0);H: Point;PointOnCurve(H, G)

text: 已知直线$y=k x(k \neq 0)$与双曲线$\frac{x^{2}}{a^{2}}-\frac{y^{2}}{b^{2}}=1(a>0, b>0)$交于$A$、$B$两点，以$A B$为直径的圆恰好经过双曲线的右焦点$F$，若三角形$A B F$的面积为$4 a^{2}$，则双曲线的渐近线方程为?
fact_expressions: G: Hyperbola;b: Number;a: Number;H: Circle;I: Line;k: Number;A: Point;B: Point;F:Point;a>0;b>0;Negation(k=0);Expression(G) = (-y^2/b^2 + x^2/a^2 = 1);Expression(I) = (y = k*x);Intersection(I, G) = {A, B};IsDiameter(LineSegmentOf(A,B),H);PointOnCurve(F,H);RightFocus(G)=F;Area(TriangleOf(A,B,F))=4*a^2

text: 若双曲线$\frac{x^{2}}{a^{2}}-\frac{y^{2}}{b^{2}}=1(a>0, b>0)$的左，右焦点为$F_{1}$、$F_{2}$，直线$y=k x(k>0)$与双曲线交于$M$、$N$两点，且$|O M|=|O F_{2}|$,$O$为坐标原点，又$S_{\Delta M F_{2} N}=\frac{(|M F_{2}|+|N F_{2}|)^{2}}{16}$，则该双曲线的离心率为?
fact_expressions: G: Hyperbola;b: Number;a: Number;H: Line;k: Number;O: Origin;M: Point;F1:Point;F2: Point;N: Point;a>0;b>0;Expression(G) = (-y^2/b^2 + x^2/a^2 = 1);k>0;Expression(H) = (y = k*x);LeftFocus(G) =F1;RightFocus(G)=F2;Intersection(H, G) = {M, N};Abs(LineSegmentOf(O, M)) = Abs(LineSegmentOf(O, F2));Area(TriangleOf(M,F2,N))=(Abs(LineSegmentOf(M,F2))+Abs(LineSegmentOf(N,F2)))^2/16

text: 已知抛物线$y^{2}=2 p x(p>0)$的焦点为$F$，点$P$在抛物线上，点$Q(\frac{9}{2} p, 0)$. 若$|Q F|=2|P F|$，且$\Delta P Q F$的面积为$8 \sqrt{3}$，则$p$=?
fact_expressions: G: Parabola;Expression(G) = (y^2 = 2*(p*x));p: Number;p>0;F: Point;Focus(G) = F;P: Point;PointOnCurve(P, G);Q: Point;Coordinate(Q) = (9*p/2, 0);Abs(LineSegmentOf(Q, F)) = 2*Abs(LineSegmentOf(P, F));Area(TriangleOf(P, Q, F)) = 8*sqrt(3)

text: 若直线$x-y=1$与椭圆$\frac{x^{2}}{3}+\frac{y^{2}}{2}=1$交于$A$，$B$两点，则线段$A B$的中点坐标是?
fact_expressions: H: Line;Expression(H) = (x - y = 1);G: Ellipse;Expression(G) = (x^2/3 + y^2/2 = 1);Intersection(H,G) = {A,B};A: Point;B: Point

C: Ellipse;G: Line;F2: Point;A: Point;B: Point;F1: Point;Coordinate(F2) = (1, 0);Coordinate(F1)=(-1, 0) ;Focus(C) = {F1,F2};PointOnCurve(F2, G);Intersection(G, C) = {A, B};Abs(LineSegmentOf(A, F2)) = (3/2)*Abs(LineSegmentOf(B, F2));Abs(LineSegmentOf(B, F1)) = 2*Abs(LineSegmentOf(B, F2))

text: 设$P$是抛物线$y^{2}=4 x$上的一个动点，$F$为抛物线的焦点，记点$P$到点$A(-1,1)$的距离与点$P$到直线$x=-1$的距离之和的最小值为$M$，若$B(3,2)$，记$|PB|+|PF|$的最小值为$N$，则$M+N$=?
fact_expressions: G: Parabola;H: Line;A: Point;B: Point;P: Point;F: Point;M:Number;N:Number;Expression(G) = (y^2 = 4*x);Expression(H) = (x = -1);Coordinate(A) = (-1, 1);Coordinate(B) = (3, 2);PointOnCurve(P, G);Focus(G) = F;Min(Distance(P,A)+Distance(P,H))=M;Min(Abs(LineSegmentOf(P, B)) + Abs(LineSegmentOf(P, F))) = N

text: 设椭圆$C$: $\frac{x^{2}}{36}+\frac{y^{2}}{9}=1$的左、右焦点分别为$F_{1}$ , $F_{2}$ , $A$是$C$上任意一点，则$\Delta A F_{1} F_{2}$的周长为?
fact_expressions: C: Ellipse;A: Point;F1: Point;F2: Point;Expression(C) = (x^2/36 + y^2/9 = 1);LeftFocus(C)=F1;RightFocus(C)=F2;PointOnCurve(A, C)

text: 已知抛物线的顶点为坐标原点，对称轴为$x$轴，且与圆$x^{2}+y^{2}=4$相交的公共弦长为$2 \sqrt{3}$，则抛物线的方程为?
fact_expressions: G: Parabola;O: Origin;H: Circle;Vertex(G) = O;SymmetryAxis(G) = xAxis;Expression(H) = (x^2 + y^2 = 4);Length(InterceptChord(G, H)) = 2*sqrt(3)

text: 椭圆$\frac{x^{2}}{a^{2}}+\frac{y^{2}}{b^{2}}=1(a>b>0)$的左焦点为$F$, $A(-a, 0)$, $B(0, b)$是两个顶点，如果$F$到直线$A B$的距离等于$\frac{b}{\sqrt{7}}$，则椭圆的离心率为?
fact_expressions: G: Ellipse;b: Number;a: Number;B: Point;A: Point;F: Point;a > b;b > 0;Expression(G) = (y^2/b^2 + x^2/a^2 = 1);Coordinate(A) = (-a, 0);Coordinate(B) = (0, b);LeftFocus(G) = F;In(A, Vertex(G));In(B, Vertex(G));Distance(F, LineOf(A, B)) = b/sqrt(7)
x: Number;y: Number;sqrt(y^2 + (x - sqrt(3))^2) + sqrt(y^2 + (x + sqrt(3))^2) = 4

text: 若抛物线$x^{2}=2 p y(p>0)$的准线经过双曲线$y^{2}-x^{2}=1$的一个焦点，则$p$=?
fact_expressions: H: Parabola;Expression(H) = (x^2 = 2*p*y);p: Number;p>0;G: Hyperbola;Expression(G) = (-x^2 + y^2 = 1);PointOnCurve(OneOf(Focus(G)), Directrix(H)) = True

text: 抛物线$y^{2}=a x$上的点$P(\frac{3}{2}, y_{0})$到该抛物线焦点$F$的距离为$2$，设$O$为坐标原点，则$\triangle P O F$的面积为?
fact_expressions: G: Parabola;Expression(G) = (y^2 = a*x);a: Number;P: Point;Coordinate(P) = (3/2, y0);y0: Number;Focus(G) = F;F: Point;Distance(P, F) = 2;O: Origin;PointOnCurve(P, G) = True

text: 已知抛物线$y^{2}=4 x$的焦点为$F$，直线$m$为抛物线在第一象限内一点$P$处的切线，过$P$作平行于$x$轴的直线$n$，过焦点$F$平行于$m$的直线交$n$于点$M$ ,若$|P M |=4$，则点$P$的坐标为?
fact_expressions: m: Line;G: Parabola;n: Line;P: Point;M: Point;F: Point;Expression(G) = (y^2 = 4*x);Focus(G) = F;Quadrant(P) = 1;TangentOnPoint(P, G) = m;PointOnCurve(P,n);IsParallel(xAxis, n);C:Line;PointOnCurve(F,C);IsParallel(C,m);Intersection(C,n)=M;Abs(LineSegmentOf(P,M))=4

G: ConicSection;H: Line;A: Point;B: Point;x1:Number;x2:Number;y1:Number;y2:Number;Slope(H)=2;Intersection(H,G)={A,B};Coordinate(A) = (x1, y1);Coordinate(B) = (x2, y2);Abs(LineSegmentOf(A,B))=2*sqrt(5);IsChordOf(LineSegmentOf(A,B),G)

text: 已知椭圆方程$C$为$\frac{x^{2}}{16}+\frac{y^{2}}{8}=1$ ,$ F_{1}$ , $F_{2}$为椭圆的两个焦点，点$P$在$C$上且$\angle F_{1} P F_{2}=\frac{\pi}{3}$. 则三角形$F_{1} P F_{2}$的面积为?
fact_expressions: C: Ellipse;F1: Point;P: Point;F2: Point;Expression(C) = (x^2/16+y^2/8=1);Focus(C)={F1,F2};PointOnCurve(P, C);AngleOf(F1, P, F2) = pi/3

text: 已知点$P$是椭圆$\frac{x^{2}}{4}+y^{2}=1$与双曲线$x^{2}-\frac{y^{2}}{2}=1$的一个交点，$F_{1}$、$F_{2}$是椭圆的左右焦点，则$\cos \angle F_{1} P F_{2}$=?
fact_expressions: G: Hyperbola;H: Ellipse;F1: Point;P: Point;F2: Point;Expression(G) = (x^2 - y^2/2 = 1);Expression(H) = (x^2/4 + y^2 = 1);LeftFocus(H) = F1;RightFocus(H) = F2;OneOf(Intersection(H, G)) = P

text: 抛物线$x^{2}=8 y$的焦点坐标为?
fact_expressions: G: Parabola;Expression(G) = (x^2 = 8*y)

text: 已知$F_{1}(-c, 0)$,$ F_{2}(c, 0)(c>0)$分别为双曲线$C$: $\frac{x^{2}}{a^{2}}-\frac{y^{2}}{b^{2}}=1(a>0, b>0)$的左、右焦点，过$F_{1}$的直线与圆$x^{2}+y^{2}=a^{2}$相切于点$M$，与$C$的右支交于点$N$，$O$为坐标原点，若$|O N|=c$，则$C$的离心率为?
fact_expressions: C: Hyperbola;a: Number;b: Number;c:Number;G: Circle;H: Line;F1: Point;O: Origin;N: Point;M: Point;a>0;b>0;Expression(C) = (-y^2/b^2 + x^2/a^2 = 1);Expression(G) = (x^2 + y^2 = a^2);Coordinate(F1) = (-c, 0);Coordinate(F2) = (c, 0);LeftFocus(C)=F1;RightFocus(C) = F2;PointOnCurve(F1, H);TangentPoint(H, G) = M;Intersection(H,RightPart(C))=N;Abs(LineSegmentOf(O, N)) = c;F2:Point;c>0

text: 已知抛物线$y^{2}=8 x$的焦点$F$，过$F$的直线与抛物线交于$A$ , $B$两点，则$|F A|+4|F B|$的最小值是?
fact_expressions: G: Parabola;H: Line;F: Point;A: Point;B: Point;Expression(G) = (y^2 = 8*x);Focus(G) = F;PointOnCurve(F,H);Intersection(H,G)={A,B}

text: 设椭圆$\frac{x^{2}}{25}+\frac{y^{2}}{9}=1$的两个焦点分别为$F_{1}$、$F_{2}$，若点$P$椭圆上，且$\cos \angle F_{1} PF_{2}=\frac{1}{2}$，则$|PF_{1}|\cdot| P F_{2} |$=?
fact_expressions: G: Ellipse;F1: Point;P: Point;F2: Point;Expression(G) = (x^2/25 + y^2/9 = 1);Focus(G)={F1,F2};PointOnCurve(P, G);Cos(AngleOf(F1, P, F2)) = 1/2

text: 已知$F_{1}$、$F_{2}$为椭圆$C$: $\frac{x^{2}}{4}+\frac{y^{2}}{3}=1$的左、右焦点，点$P$在椭圆$C$上移动时，$I$为$\Delta P F_{1} F_{2}$的内心，则$|I O|$的取值范围 ($O$为坐标原点) 为?
fact_expressions: C: Ellipse;P: Point;F1: Point;F2: Point;I: Point;O: Origin;Expression(C) = (x^2/4 + y^2/3 = 1);LeftFocus(C) = F1;RightFocus(C) = F2;PointOnCurve(P, C);Incenter(TriangleOf(P, F1, F2)) = I

text: 与双曲线$\frac{x^{2}}{5}-\frac{y^{2}}{3}=1$有公共渐近线，且焦距为$8$的双曲线方程为?
fact_expressions: G: Hyperbola;Expression(G) = (x^2/5 - y^2/3 = 1);Z: Hyperbola;Asymptote(G) = Asymptote(Z);FocalLength(Z) = 8

text: 已知双曲线$\frac{x^{2}}{a^{2}}-\frac{y^{2}}{b^{2}}=1$的右焦点为$F$，过$F$做斜率为$2$的直线$l$, 直线$l$与双曲线的右支有且只有一个公共点，则双曲线的离心率范围?
fact_expressions: l: Line;G: Hyperbola;b: Number;a: Number;F: Point;Expression(G) = (-y^2/b^2 + x^2/a^2 = 1);RightFocus(G) = F;Slope(l)=2;PointOnCurve(F,l);NumIntersection(l, RightPart(G)) = 1

text: 已知$P$是抛物线$y=x^{2}$上任意一点，则当$P$点到直线$x+y+2=0$的距离最小时，$P$点与该抛物线的准线的距离是?
fact_expressions: G: Parabola;H: Line;P: Point;Expression(G) = (y = x^2);Expression(H) = (x + y + 2 = 0);PointOnCurve(P, G);WhenMin(Distance(P, H))

text:
已知焦点在$x$轴上的双曲线的渐近线过椭圆$\frac{x^{2}}{4}+\frac{y^{2}}{16}=1$和椭圆$\frac{a x^{2}}{16}+\frac{y^{2}}{4}=1  (a \leq 1)$的交
点，则双曲线的离心率的取值范围是?

text: 以椭圆$x^{2}+\frac{y^{2}}{5}=1$中心为顶点，右顶点为焦点的抛物线的标准方程为?
fact_expressions: G: Parabola;H: Ellipse;Expression(H) = (x^2 + y^2/5 = 1);Vertex(G) = Center(H);Focus(G) = RightVertex(H)

text: 抛物线$y^{2}=8 x$与曲线$x y=k(k>0)$交于点$M$，若$M$到抛物线焦点$F$的距离为$4$，则$k$=?

text: 一个动点到点$F(0 ,-4)$距离比到直线$y-3=0$的距离多$1$，则动点的轨迹方程为?
fact_expressions: G: Line;F: Point;Expression(G) = (y - 3 = 0);Coordinate(F) = (0, -4);P:Point;Distance(P,F)=Distance(P,G)+1

text: 若双曲线$E$: $\frac{x^{2}}{a^{2}}-\frac{y^{2}}{b^{2}}=1(a>0, b>0)$的左、右焦点为$F_{1}$、$F_{2}$，若在其渐近线上存在一点$P$，使得 $||P F_{1}|-| P F_{2}||=2 b$，则双曲线$E$的离心率的取值范围为?

text: 若抛物线$y^{2}=8 x$的准线和圆$x^{2}+y^{2}+6 x+m=0$相切，则实数$m$的值是?

text: 若直线$y=x+k$与曲线$x=\sqrt{1-y^{2}}$恰有一个公共点，则$k$的取值范围是?

text: 已知椭圆$\frac{x^{2}}{8}+\frac{y^{2}}{4}=1$的上顶点为$A$，左焦点为$F$、$C$为$O A$的中点 ($O$为坐标原点)，点$P$为第一象限中的一点，且$|C P|=\frac{\sqrt{3}}{2}|O C|$，则点$P$的轨迹方程为?

text: 设双曲线$\frac{x^{2}}{a^{2}}-\frac{y^{2}}{b^{2}}=1(a>0, b>0)$的左、右顶点分别为$A_{1}$、$A_{2}$，若点$P$为双曲线左支上的一点，且直线$P A_{1}$, $P A_{2}$的斜率分别为$-1$，$-\frac{1}{3}$，则双曲线的渐近线方程为?

text: 已知双曲线$C$: $\frac{x^{2}}{a^{2}}-\frac{y^{2}}{b^{2}}=1(a>0, b>0)$的右焦点为点$F$，点$B$是虚轴的一个端点，点$P$为双曲线$C$左支上一个动点，若$\triangle B P F$周长的最小值等于实轴长的$4$倍，则双曲线$C$的渐近线方程为?

text: 若斜率为$2$的直线经过抛物线$x^{2}=4 y$的焦点，且与抛物线相交于$A$、$B$两点，则$|A B|$=?

text: 以双曲线$C$: $\frac{x^{2}}{a^{2}}-\frac{y^{2}}{b^{2}}=1(a>0, b>0)$的右顶点$A$为圆心，$\sqrt{2} a$为半径作圆，与双曲线右支交于$P$、$Q$二点，若$\angle P A Q=\frac{\pi}{2}$，则双曲线$C$的离心率为?

text: 已知点$A$、$B$是双曲线$x^{2}-\frac{y^{2}}{2}=1$上的两点，$O$为原点，若$ \overrightarrow{O A} \cdot \overrightarrow{O B}=0$, 则点$O$到直线$A B$的距离为?

text: 若双曲线$E$的两条渐近线方程为$y=\pm 2 x$，且$E$的两焦点坐标为$(0, \pm \sqrt{5})$，则双曲线$E$的标准方程为?

text: 已知$F$是椭圆$E$: $\frac{x^{2}}{16}+\frac{y^{2}}{12}=1$的左焦点，$P$是椭圆$E$上的动点，$A(1, \sqrt{3})$为一个定点，则$|P A|+|P F|$的最大值为?

text: 已知椭圆$E$的中心在原点、对称轴为两坐标轴,且一个焦点为$F(0,1)$, 离心率为$e=\frac{1}{2}$,则该椭圆的方程是?

text: 过抛物线$C$: $y^{2}=2 p x(p>0)$的焦点$F$的直线交抛物线$C$于$A$、$B$两点. 若$|A F|=6 $,$|B F|=3$，则$p$的值为?

text: 已知椭圆$\frac{y^{2}}{a^{2}}+x^{2}=1(a>1)$的离心率$e=\frac{2 \sqrt{5}}{5}$, $P$为椭圆上的一个动点，则$P$与定点$B(-1,0)$连线距离的最大值为?

text: 已知椭圆$C$:$\frac{x^{2}}{16}+\frac{y^{2}}{12}=1$ ,过点$P(0,6)$的直线$l$与椭圆$C$交于$A$、$B$两点，若$A$是线段$P B$的中点，则点$A$的坐标为?

text: 过点$M(1,2)$作直线$l$交椭圆$\frac{x^{2}}{25}+\frac{y^{2}}{16}=1$于$A$、$B$两点，若点$M$恰为线段$A B$的中点，则直线$l$的方程为?

text: 已知抛物线$C$: $y^{2}=2 p x(p>0)$的焦点为$F$，过点$(-1,0)$的直线与$C$交于$A$、$B$两点，若$4|F A|+|F B|$的最小值为$19$，则抛物线$C$的标准方程为?

text: 已知椭圆$C$: $\frac{x^{2}}{2}+y^{2}=1$的左, 右顶点分别为$A$、$B$，点$P$在椭圆$C$上 (与$A$、$B$不重合)，直线$A P$与$y$轴交于点$M$，过点$A$作$A N \| B P$，直线$A N$与$y$轴交于点$N$，若点$S(t, 0)$满足$\overrightarrow{S M} \cdot \overrightarrow{S N}=5$，则$t$=?

text: 已知双曲线$E$: $\frac{x^{2}}{a^{2}}-\frac{y^{2}}{b^{2}}=1(a>0, b>0)$的右焦点为$F$，点$M$、$N$在双曲线$E$的一条渐近线上，$|F M|=|F N|=\sqrt{3} a$且$\overrightarrow{F M} \cdot \overrightarrow{F N}=a^{2}$，则双曲线$E$的离心率是?

text: 已知双曲线$C$: $\frac{x^{2}}{a^{2}}-\frac{y^{2}}{b^{2}}=1(a>0, b>0)$的左右焦点分别为$F_{1}$、$F_{2}$、$P$为双曲线$C$上一点，$Q$为双曲线$C$渐近线上一点，$P$、$Q$均位于第一象限，且$2 \overrightarrow{Q P}=\overrightarrow{P F_{2}}$，$\overrightarrow{Q F_{1}} \cdot \overrightarrow{Q F_{2}}=0$，则双曲线$C$的离心率为?

text: 已知$F_{1}$、$F_{2}$分别是椭圆$\frac{x^{2}}{16}+\frac{y^{2}}{12}=1$的左、右焦点，点$P$是椭圆上的任意一点，则$\frac{|PF_{1}-PF_{2}|}{P F_{1}}$的取值范围是?

text: 若点$P$在双曲线$\frac{x^{2}}{16}-\frac{y^{2}}{12}=1$上，它的横坐标与双曲线的右焦点的横坐标相同，则点$P$与双曲线的左焦点的距离为?

text: 已知双曲线$C$: $\frac{x^{2}}{9}-\frac{y^{2}}{16}=1 $, $F_{1} $, $F_{2}$分别为双曲线的左、右焦点，$P$为双曲线上的第一象限内的点，点$I$为$\Delta P F_{1} F_{2}$的内心，$\Delta I F_{1} F_{2}$的面积的取值范围是?

text: 已知直线$l$: $x=m y+1$过抛物线$C$: $y^{2}=2 p x$的焦点$F$，交抛物线$C$于$A$、$B$两点，若$\overrightarrow{A F}=2 \overrightarrow{F B}$，则直线$l$的斜率为?
fact_expressions: l: Line;Expression(l)=(x=m*y+1);m: Number;C: Parabola;Expression(C) = (y^2 = 2*p*x);p: Number;F: Point;Focus(C)=F;PointOnCurve(F,l);A: Point;B: Point;Intersection(l,C)={A,B};VectorOf(A, F) = 2*VectorOf(F, B)

text: 直线$y=x+1$与双曲线$\frac{x^{2}}{2}-\frac{y^{2}}{3}=1$相交于$A$,$B$两点，则$|A B|$=?
fact_expressions: G: Hyperbola;H: Line;A: Point;B: Point;Expression(G) = (x^2/2 - y^2/3 = 1);Expression(H) = (y = x + 1);Intersection(H, G) = {A,B}
G: Ellipse;P: Point;F2: Point;F1: Point;Expression(G) = (x^2/169 + y^2/144 = 1);PointOnCurve(P, G);Focus(G)={F1,F2};Abs(LineSegmentOf(P, F1)) = 4

text: 设抛物线$y^{2}=8 x$的准线方程为?
fact_expressions: G: Parabola;Expression(G) = (y^2 = 8*x)

text: 抛物线$y^{2}=2 x$的准线方程为?
fact_expressions: G: Parabola;Expression(G) = (y^2 = 2*x)

text: 已知抛物线$y=ax^{2}$的准线方程为$y=1$，则$a$的值为?
fact_expressions: G: Parabola;Expression(G) = (y = a*x^2);a: Number;Expression(Directrix(G)) = (y = 1)

text: 渐近线方程为$y=\pm \sqrt{3} x$且过点$P(\sqrt{3}, 2 \sqrt{3})$的双曲线方程为?
fact_expressions: G: Hyperbola;Expression(Asymptote(G)) = (y = pm*sqrt(3)*x);P: Point;Coordinate(P) = (sqrt(3), 2*sqrt(3));PointOnCurve(P, G) = True

text: 已知抛物线$C$: $y^{2}=2 p x(p>0)$的焦点为$F$，点$M(x_{0}, 2 \sqrt{2})(x_{0}>\frac{p}{2})$是抛物线$C$上一点，以$M$为圆心的圆与线段$M F$相交于点$A$，且被直线$x=\frac{p}{2}$截得的弦长为$\sqrt{3}|M A|$，若$|M A|=2$，则$|A F|$=?
fact_expressions: C: Parabola;p: Number;G: Circle;H: Line;M: Point;F: Point;A: Point;p>0;x0: Number;x0 > p/2;Expression(C) = (y^2 = 2*(p*x));Expression(H) = (x = p/2);Coordinate(M) = (x0, 2*sqrt(2));Focus(C) = F;PointOnCurve(M, C);Center(G) = M;Intersection(G, LineSegmentOf(M, F)) = A;Length(InterceptChord(H, G)) = sqrt(3)*Abs(LineSegmentOf(M, A));Abs(LineSegmentOf(M, A)) = 2

text: 已知离心率为$2$的双曲线$\frac{x^{2}}{m}+\frac{y^{2}}{n}=1(m, n \in R)$的焦点与椭圆$\frac{x^{2}}{5}+\frac{y^{2}}{4}=1$的焦点重合，则$\frac{m}{n}$=?
fact_expressions: G: Hyperbola;m: Real;n: Real;H: Ellipse;Expression(G) = (y^2/n + x^2/m = 1);Expression(H) = (x^2/5 + y^2/4 = 1);Eccentricity(G)=2;Focus(G)=Focus(H)

text: 已知抛物线$M$: $y^{2}=16 x$的焦点为$F$、$P$为抛物线$M$上一点. 若$|P F|=5$，则$P$点的坐标为?
fact_expressions: M: Parabola;P: Point;F: Point;Expression(M) = (y^2 = 16*x);Focus(M)=F;PointOnCurve(P, M);Abs(LineSegmentOf(P, F)) = 5

text: 双曲线$\frac{x^{2}}{a^{2}}-\frac{y^{2}}{b^{2}}=1$的一个焦点是$(5,0)$, 一条渐近线是$3 y-4 x=0$，那么双曲线的方程是?
fact_expressions: G: Hyperbola;b: Number;a: Number;H: Point;Expression(G) = (-y^2/b^2 + x^2/a^2 = 1);Coordinate(H) = (5, 0);OneOf(Focus(G))=H;Expression(OneOf(Asymptote(G)))=(3*y-4*x=0)

text: 已知直线$l_{1}$: $2 x-y+6=0$和直线$l_{2}$: $x=-1$, $F$是抛物线$C$: $y^{2}=4 x$的焦点，点$P$在抛物线$C$上运动，当点$P$到直线$l_{1}$和直线$l_{2}$的距离之和最小时，直线$PF$被抛物线所截得的线段长是?
fact_expressions: l1: Line;Expression(l1) = (2*x -y + 6 = 0);l2: Line;Expression(l2) = (x = -1);C: Parabola;Expression(C) = (y^2 = 4*x);F: Point;Focus(C) = F;P: Point;PointOnCurve(P, C);WhenMin(Distance(P, l1) + Distance(P, l2))

text: 已知点$P$在抛物线$y^{2}=16 x$上, 且点$P$到$y$轴的距离$6$, 则点$P$到焦点的距离为?
fact_expressions: G: Parabola;P: Point;Expression(G) = (y^2 = 16*x);PointOnCurve(P, G);Distance(P, yAxis) = 6

text: 动点$P(x, y)(x \geq 0)$到点$F(1,0)$的距离与点$P$到$y$轴的距离差为$1$，则点$P$的轨迹方程为?
fact_expressions: P: Point;F: Point;x1:Number;y1:Number;x1>=0;Coordinate(P) = (x1, y1);Coordinate(F) = (1, 0);Distance(P,F)-Distance(P,yAxis)=1

text: 抛物线$y^{2}=4 x$的准线方程是?焦点坐标是?
fact_expressions: G: Parabola;Expression(G) = (y^2 = 4*x)

text: 双曲线$x^{2}-\frac{y^{2}}{b^{2}}=1(b>0)$的右焦点到左准线的距离为$\frac{5}{2}$，则$b$=?
fact_expressions: G: Hyperbola;Expression(G) = (x^2 - y^2/b^2 = 1);b: Number;b>0;Distance(RightFocus(G), LeftDirectrix(G)) = 5/2

text: 已知椭圆$\frac{x^{2}}{6}+\frac{y^{2}}{2}=1$的右焦点为$F$，上顶点为$A$，点$P$在圆$x^{2}+y^{2}=8$上，点$Q$在椭圆上，则$2|P A|+|P Q|-|Q F|$的最小值是?
fact_expressions: G: Ellipse;H: Circle;P: Point;A: Point;Q: Point;F: Point;Expression(G) = (x^2/6 + y^2/2 = 1);Expression(H) = (x^2 + y^2 = 8);RightFocus(G) = F;UpperVertex(G) = A;PointOnCurve(P, H);PointOnCurve(Q, G)
query_expressions: Min(2*Abs(LineSegmentOf(P, A)) + Abs(LineSegmentOf(P, Q)) - Abs(LineSegmentOf(Q, F)))

text: 已知椭圆$C$: $\frac{x^{2}}{2}+y^{2}=1$, 点$P$是椭圆$C$上的一个动点,满足$\overrightarrow{O P} \cdot \overrightarrow{P F_{2}} \geq-1$($O$为坐标原点,$F_{2}$为椭圆的右焦点),则点$P$的横坐标的取值范围是?
fact_expressions: C: Ellipse;Expression(C) = (x^2/2 + y^2 = 1);P: Point;PointOnCurve(P,C) = True;DotProduct(VectorOf(O,P),VectorOf(P,F2)) >= -1;O: Origin;F2: Point;RightFocus(C) = F2

text: 已知双曲线$\frac{x^{2}}{2}-\frac{y^{2}}{b^{2}}=1(b>0)$的左、右焦点分别是$F_{1}$、$F_{2}$，其一条渐近线方程为$y=x$，则$b$=?若点$P( \sqrt{3} , y_{0})$在双曲线上，则$\overrightarrow{PF_{1}} \cdot \overrightarrow{PF_{2}}$=?
fact_expressions: G: Hyperbola;Expression(G) = (x^2/2 - y^2/b^2 = 1);b: Number;b>0;F1: Point;F2: Point;LeftFocus(G) = F1;RightFocus(G) = F2;Expression(OneOf(Asymptote(G))) = (y = x);y0: Number;P: Point;Coordinate(P) = (sqrt(3), y0);PointOnCurve(P, G)

text: 设抛物线$y^{2}=4 x$的焦点为$F$，过点$(2,0)$的直线交抛物线于$A$、$B$两点，与抛物线准线交于点$C$，若$\frac{S_{\triangle A C F}}{S_{\triangle B C F}}=\frac{2}{5}$，则$AF$=?
fact_expressions: G: Parabola;Expression(G) = (y^2 = 4*x);F: Point;Focus(G) = F;K: Point;Coordinate(K) = (2, 0);H: Line;PointOnCurve(K, H);A: Point;B: Point;Intersection(H, G) = {A, B};C: Point;Intersection(H, Directrix(G)) = C;Area(TriangleOf(A, C, F))/Area(TriangleOf(B, C, F)) = 2/5

text: $F_{1}$ , $F_{2}$分别是双曲线$C$: $\frac{x^{2}}{a^{2}}-\frac{y^{2}}{b^{2}}=1(a>0, b>0)$的左、右焦点，双曲线$C$的离心率$e=\frac{2 \sqrt{3}}{3}$，点$P$在双曲线$C$的右支上，满足$\overrightarrow{P F_{2}} \cdot \overrightarrow{F_{1} {F}_{2}}=0$，$|\overrightarrow{P F_{2}}|=\frac{2 \sqrt{3}}{3}$，则双曲线的虚轴长为?
fact_expressions: F1:Point;F2:Point;C: Hyperbola;Expression(C) = (-y^2/b^2 + x^2/a^2 = 1);LeftFocus(C)=F1;RightFocus(C)=F2;b: Number;a: Number;a>0;b>0;e:Number;Eccentricity(C)=e;P: Point;PointOnCurve(P,RightPart(C));DotProduct(VectorOf(P,F2),VectorOf(F1,F2)) =0;Abs(VectorOf(P, F2)) = (2*sqrt(3))/3;e=2*sqrt(3)/3

text: 已知点$M$、$N$是抛物线$y=4 x^{2}$上不同的两点，$F$为抛物线的焦点，且满足$\angle M F N=135^{\circ}$，弦$M N$的中点$P$到直线$l$: $y=-\frac{1}{16}$的距离记为$d$, $|M N|^{2}=\lambda \cdot d^{2}$，则$\lambda$的最小值为?
fact_expressions: G: Parabola;Expression(G) = (y = 4*x^2);M: Point;N: Point;PointOnCurve(M, G);PointOnCurve(N, G);Negation(M=N);F: Point;Focus(G) = F;AngleOf(M, F, N) = ApplyUnit(135, degree);IsChordOf(LineSegmentOf(M, N), G);P: Point;MidPoint(LineSegmentOf(M, N)) = P;l: Line;Expression(l) = (y=-1/16);d: Number;Distance(P, l) = d;lambda: Number;Abs(LineSegmentOf(M, N))^2 = (d^2)*lambda

text: 已知直线$l$: $y=1$与$y$轴交于点$M$、$Q$为直线$l$上异于点$M$的动点，记点$Q$的横坐标为$n$，若曲线$C$:$ \frac{x^{2}}{2}+y^{2}=1$上存在点$N$，使得$\angle M Q N=45^{\circ}$，则$n$的取值范围是?(用区间表示)
fact_expressions: l: Line;C: Curve;M: Point;Q: Point;N: Point;n:Number;Expression(C) = (x^2/2 + y^2 = 1);Expression(l)=(y=1);Intersection(l,yAxis)=M;PointOnCurve(Q,l);Negation(Q=M);XCoordinate(MidPoint(Q)) = n;PointOnCurve(N, C);AngleOf(M, Q, N) = ApplyUnit(45, degree)

text: 已知$F_{1}$、$F_{2}$分别是双曲线$\frac{x^{2}}{a^{2}}-\frac{y^{2}}{b^{2}}=1(a>0, b>0)$的左右焦点，若在双曲线的右支上存在一点$M$，使得$(\overrightarrow{O M}+\overrightarrow{O F_{2}}) \overrightarrow{F_{2} M}=0$(其中$O$为坐标原点)，且$|\overrightarrow{M F_{1}}|=\sqrt{3}|\overrightarrow{M F_{2}}|$，则双曲线离心率为?
fact_expressions: G: Hyperbola;b: Number;a: Number;O: Origin;M: Point;F2: Point;F1: Point;a>0;b>0;Expression(G) = (-y^2/b^2 + x^2/a^2 = 1);LeftFocus(G) = F1;RightFocus(G) = F2;PointOnCurve(M, RightPart(G));DotProduct((VectorOf(O, F2) + VectorOf(O, M)),VectorOf(F2, M)) = 0;Abs(VectorOf(M, F1)) = sqrt(3)*Abs(VectorOf(M, F2))

text: 已知直线$a x+b y+c-1=0 ,(b c>0)$经过圆$x^{2}+y^{2}-2 y-15=0$的圆心，则$\frac{1}{b}+\frac{9}{c}$的最小值为?
fact_expressions: H: Line;b: Number;a: Number;c: Number;b*c>0;Expression(H) = (a*x + b*y + c - 1 = 0);G: Circle;Expression(G) = (-2*y + x^2 + y^2 - 15 = 0);PointOnCurve(Center(G),H) = True

text: 曲线$y=\sqrt{1-\frac{x^{2}}{4}}$与直线$y=2 x+m$有且只有一个公共点，则实数$m$的取值范围是?
fact_expressions: H: Curve;G: Line;m: Real;Expression(H) = (y = sqrt(1 - x^2/4));Expression(G) = (y = m + 2*x);NumIntersection(H, G) = 1

text: 已知椭圆$C$:$ \frac{x^{2}}{64}+\frac{y^{2}}{28}=1$的左焦点为$F_{1}$，椭圆$C$上的一点$P$到左焦点的距离为$6$，点$M$是线段$P F_{1}$的中点，$O$为坐标原点，则$|O M|$=?
fact_expressions: C: Ellipse;P: Point;F1: Point;O: Origin;M: Point;Expression(C) = (x^2/64 + y^2/28 = 1);LeftFocus(C) = F1;PointOnCurve(P, C);Distance(P,LeftFocus(C))=6;MidPoint(LineSegmentOf(P,F1)) = M

text: 已知圆$x^{2}+y^{2}=R^{2}$与双曲线$\frac{x^{2}}{4}-\frac{y^{2}}{9}=1$无公共点，则$R$取值范围为?
fact_expressions: H: Circle;Expression(H) = (x^2 + y^2 = R^2);R: Number;G: Hyperbola;Expression(G) = (x^2/4 - y^2/9 = 1);NumIntersection(H, G) = 0

text: 过双曲线$\frac{x^{2}}{4}-\frac{y^{2}}{5}=1$的左焦点$F_{1}$，作圆$x^{2}+y^{2}=4$的切线交双曲线右支于点$P$，切点为$T$ , $P F_{1}$的中点为$M$，则$|M O| -| M T |$=?
fact_expressions: G: Hyperbola;Expression(G) = (x^2/4 - y^2/5 = 1);F1: Point;LeftFocus(G) = F1;H: Circle;Expression(H) = (x^2 + y^2 = 4);L1: Line;TangentOfPoint(F1, H) = L1;Intersection(L1, RightPart(G)) = P;P: Point;TangentPoint(L1, H) = T;T: Point;MidPoint(LineSegmentOf(P, F1)) = M;M: Point;O: Origin

text: 已知点$P$为双曲线$\frac{x^{2}}{a^{2}}-\frac{y^{2}}{b^{2}}=1(a>0, b>0)$右支上一点，点$F_{1}$、$F_{2}$分别为双曲线的左右焦点，点$I$是$\triangle P F_{1} F_{2}$的内心 (三角形内切圆的圆心)，若恒有$S_{\Delta I P F_{1}}-S_{\Delta I P F_{2}} \leq \frac{\sqrt{2}}{2} S_{\Delta I F1 F_{2}}$成立，则双曲线的离心率取值范围是?
fact_expressions: G: Hyperbola;a: Number;b: Number;P: Point;F1: Point;F2: Point;I: Point;a>0;b>0;Expression(G) = (-y^2/b^2 + x^2/a^2 = 1);PointOnCurve(P, RightPart(G));LeftFocus(G) = F1;RightFocus(G) = F2;Incenter(TriangleOf(P, F1, F2)) = I;Center(InscribedCircle(TriangleOf(P, F1, F2))) = I;Area(TriangleOf(I, P, F1)) - Area(TriangleOf(I, P, F2)) <= (sqrt(2)/2)*Area(TriangleOf(I, F1, F2))

text: 若双曲线的渐近线方程为$y=\pm \frac{3}{2} x$，则满足条件的一个双曲线的方程为?
fact_expressions: G: Hyperbola;Expression(Asymptote(G)) = (y = pm*(3/2)*x)

text: 如果$M$是椭圆$C_{1}$:$ \frac{x^{2}}{16}+\frac{y^{2}}{9}=1$上的动点，$N$是椭圆$C_{2}$: $\frac{x^{2}}{64}+\frac{y^{2}}{36}=1$上的动点，那么$\Delta O M N$面积的最大值为?

text: 已知$F$为抛物线$C$: $y^{2}=4 x$的焦点，过$F$作两条互相垂直的直线$l_{1}$ , $l_{2}$，直线$l_{1}$与$C$交于$A$、$B$两点，直线$l_{2}$与$C$交于$D$、$E$两点，则$\frac{1}{|A B|}+\frac{1}{|D E|}$的值为?

text: 若椭圆$\frac{x^{2}}{m}+\frac{y^{2}}{n}=1(m>n>0)$的离心率为$\frac{1}{2}$，有一个焦点与抛物线$y^{2}=4 x$的焦点重合，则$m n$=?

text: 抛物线$y^{2}=2 p x(p>0)$焦点为$F$，原点为$O$，过抛物线焦点垂直于$x$轴的直线与抛物线交于点$P$，若$P O=3 \sqrt{5}$，则$p$的值为?

text: 已知抛物线$C$的方程为$x^{2}=2 p y(p>0)$，其焦点为$F$,$A B$为过焦点$F$的抛物线$C$的弦，过$A$、$B$分别作抛物线的切线$l_{1}$,$l_{2}$，设$l_{1}$，$l_{2}$相交于点$P$. 则$\overrightarrow{P A} \cdot \overrightarrow{P B}$=?

text: 已知直线$l$与抛物线$C$: $y^{2}=4 x$相交于$A$、$B$两点（$A$点在第一象限) , $\overrightarrow{O A} \cdot \overrightarrow{O B}=-4 $, $M$坐标为$(4,0)$，当$\triangle A B M$的面积最小时，线段$O A$的长度为?

text: 已知$F_{1}$、$F_{2}$分别为双曲线$C$: $\frac{x^{2}}{a^{2}}-\frac{y^{2}}{b^{2}}=1(a>0, b>0)$的左右焦点，点$P$是双曲线$C$上一点，且$|P F_{1}|=2|P F_{2}|$，若线段$P F_{1}$的中点$Q$恰好在直线$y=\frac{b}{a} x$上，则双曲线的离心率为?
fact_expressions: C: Hyperbola;G: Line;a: Number;b: Number;P: Point;F1: Point;F2: Point;Q: Point;Expression(G) = (y = x*(b/a));LeftFocus(C) = F1;RightFocus(C) = F2;Expression(C) = (x^2/a^2 - y^2/b^2 = 1);PointOnCurve(P, C);Abs(LineSegmentOf(P, F1)) = 2*Abs(LineSegmentOf(P, F2));MidPoint(LineSegmentOf(P, F1)) = Q;PointOnCurve(Q, G);a > 0;b > 0

text: 过点$A(6,1)$作直线与双曲线$x^{2}-4 y^{2}=16$相交于两点$B$、$C$, 且$A$为线段$B C$的中点则直线的方程（表示为一般式）为?
fact_expressions: G: Hyperbola;H: Line;B: Point;C: Point;A: Point;Expression(G) = (x^2 - 4*y^2 = 16);Coordinate(A) = (6, 1);PointOnCurve(A, H);Intersection(H, G) = {B, C};MidPoint(LineSegmentOf(B,C))=A

text: 已知抛物线$y^{2}=4 x$，焦点记为$F$，过点$F$作直线$l$交抛物线于$A$、$B$两点，则$|A F|-\frac{2}{|B F|}$的最小值为?
fact_expressions: l: Line;G: Parabola;A: Point;F: Point;B: Point;Expression(G) = (y^2 = 4*x);Focus(G) = F;PointOnCurve(F, l);Intersection(l, G) = {A, B}
F1: Point;F2: Point;P: Point;t:Number;Coordinate(F1) = (0, -3);Coordinate(F2) = (0, 3);Abs(LineSegmentOf(P,F1))+Abs(LineSegmentOf(P,F2))=t+9/t;t>0

text: 若过点$(\sqrt{2}, 2)$的双曲线的渐近线为$y=\pm 2 x$，则该双曲线的标准方程是?
fact_expressions: G: Hyperbola;H: Point;Coordinate(H) = (sqrt(2), 2);PointOnCurve(H,G) = True;Expression(Asymptote(G)) = (y = pm*2*x)

text: 已知抛物线$E$: $y^{2}=4 x$，过点$M(2,0)$的直线$l$与$E$交于$A$、$B$两点，与$E$的准线交于点$C$，且点$A$在第一象限，若$\frac{|C B|}{|A B|}=\frac{2}{3}$，则直线$l$的斜率为?
fact_expressions: E: Parabola;Expression(E) = (y^2 = 4*x);M: Point;Coordinate(M) = (2, 0);l: Line;B: Point;A: Point;PointOnCurve(M,l) = True;Intersection(l, E) = {A, B};C: Point;Intersection(Directrix(E) , l) = C;Quadrant(A) = 1 ;Abs(LineSegmentOf(C, B))/Abs(LineSegmentOf(A, B)) = 2/3

text: 设双曲线的渐近线方程为$2 x \pm 3 y=0$，则双曲线的离心率为?
fact_expressions: G: Hyperbola;Expression(Asymptote(G)) = (2*x + pm*3*y = 0)

text: 已知双曲线$C$: $\frac{x^{2}}{a^{2}}-\frac{y^{2}}{b^{2}}=1 (b>a>0)$的左、右焦点为$F_{1}$ , $F_{2}$ , $P$$(2, \sqrt{2})$为双曲线$C$上一点，且$\frac{|P F_{1}|}{|P F_{2}|}=3$，若线段$P F_{1}$与双曲线$C$交于另一点$A$，则$\Delta P A F_{2}$的面积为?
fact_expressions: C: Hyperbola;a, b: Number;b > a;a > 0;Expression(C) = (x^2/a^2 - y^2/b^2 = 1);F1: Point;F2: Point;LeftFocus(C) = F1;RightFocus(C) = F2;P: Point;Coordinate(P) = (2, sqrt(2));PointOnCurve(P, C);Abs(LineSegmentOf(P, F1))/Abs(LineSegmentOf(P, F2)) = 3;A: Point;Intersection(LineSegmentOf(P, F1), C) = {P, A}

text: 设椭圆的两焦点分别为$(0 ,-2)$,$(0 , 2)$，两准线间的距离为$13$，则椭圆的方程为?

text: 已知双曲线$C$: $x^{2}-\frac{y^{2}}{8}=1$的左右焦点分别是$F_{1}$、$F_{2}$，过$F_{2}$的直线$l$与$C$的左右两支分别交于$A$、$B$两点，且$|A F_{1}|=|B F_{1}|$，则$|A B|$=?

text: 已知双曲线$C$: $\frac{x^{2}}{a^{2}}-\frac{y^{2}}{b^{2}}=1(a>0, b>0)$过点$(-2,0)$，过左焦点$F_{1}$的直线与双曲线的左支交于$A$、$B$两点，右焦点为$F_{2}$，若$\angle A F_{2} B=45^{\circ}$，且$|A F_{2}|=8$，则$\triangle A B F_{2}$的面积为?

text: 已知点$F$、$A$分别为椭圆$\frac{x^{2}}{a^{2}}+\frac{y^{2}}{b^{2}}=1(a>b>0)$的左焦点和右顶点，过$F$作$x$轴的垂线交椭圆于点$P$，且$\triangle A F P$的内切圆半径为$\frac{\sqrt{a^{2}-b^{2}}}{2}$，则椭圆的离心率为?

text: 在$Rt \triangle ABC$中，$ AB=AC=1$，如果椭圆经过$A$ , $B$两点，它的一个焦点为$C$，另一个焦点在$A B$上，则这个椭圆的离心率为?

text: 设$P(x, y)$为椭圆$\frac{x^{2}}{16}+\frac{y^{2}}{12}=1$在第一象限上的点，则$\frac{x}{4-x}+\frac{3 y}{6-y}$的最小值为?

text: 已知直线$l$: $k x-y+1=0$与抛物线$C$: $y^{2}=4 x$交于$A$、$B$两点，$O$为坐标原点，抛物线$C$的准线与$x$轴的交点为$P$，若$\overrightarrow{O A} \cdot \overrightarrow{O B}<0$，则$\overrightarrow{P A} \cdot \overrightarrow{P B}$取最小值时的直线的方程为?

text: 双曲线$C$: $\frac{x^{2}}{a^{2}}-\frac{y^{2}}{b^{2}}=1(a>0, b>0)$, $P$为双曲线$C$上的一点，若点$P$到双曲线$C$的两条渐近线的距离之积为$1$，则双曲线的半焦距$c$的取值范围?

text: 已知$F$是双曲线$C$: $\frac{x^{2}}{a^{2}}-\frac{y^{2}}{b^{2}}=1(a>0 , b>0)$的左焦点，$B_{1} B_{2}$是双曲线的虚轴，$M$是$O B_{1}$的中点，过$F$、$M$的直线交双曲线$C$于点$A$，且$F M=2 MA$，则双曲线$C$的离心率是?

text: 已知双曲线$\frac{x^{2}}{a^{2}}-\frac{y^{2}}{b^{2}}=1(a>0, b>0)$的一条渐近线的斜率为$\sqrt{2}$，且右焦点与抛物线$y^{2}=4 \sqrt{3} x$的焦点重合，则该双曲线的方程为?

text: 曲线$x^{2}+y^{2}+2 x=0$与曲线$y+|x|=0$的交点个数是?
fact_expressions: Z: Curve;Expression(Z) = (2*x + x^2 + y^2 = 0);G: Curve;Expression(G) = (y + Abs(x) = 0)

text: 已知椭圆的长轴长是$8$，离心率是$\frac{3}{4}$，则此椭圆的标准方程是?

text: 若双曲线$\frac{x^{2}}{a^{2}}-\frac{y^{2}}{16}=1(a>0)$经过点$(2,0)$，则该双曲线渐近线的方程为?

text: 已知抛物线方程为$y^{2}=4 x$，直线$x=a$与抛物线交于$A$、$B$两点，抛物线的焦点$F$为$\triangle O A B$($O$为坐标原点) 的垂心，则实数$a$的值为?

text: 若抛物线$y=\frac{1}{4} x^{2}$上一点$M$到焦点$F$的距离为$4$，则点$M$的纵坐标的值为?

text: 椭圆$\frac{y^{2}}{16}+\frac{x^{2}}{9}=1$的焦点为$F_{1}$、$F_{2}$、$P$为椭圆上不同于长轴端点的一点，则$\Delta P F_{1} F_{2}$的周长为?

text: 已知椭圆$C$: $\frac{x^{2}}{4}+\frac{y^{2}}{3}=1$ , $A$ , $B$是椭圆$C$上的两个不同的点，设$P(1, \frac{1}{2})$，若$\overrightarrow{A P}=\overrightarrow{P B}$，则直线$A B$的方程为?

text: 设双曲线$C$: $x^{2}-\frac{y^{2}}{24}=1$的左焦点和右焦点分别是$F_{1}$、$F_{2}$，点$A$是$C$右支上的一点，则$|A F_{1}|+\frac{8}{|A F_{2} |}$的最小值为?

text: 过点$P(1,1)$作一条直线与椭圆$\frac{x^{2}}{4}+\frac{y^{2}}{2}=1$交于$M$、$N$两点，且$P$恰为线段$M N$的中点，则该直线的方程为?

text: 已知双曲线$C$: $\frac{x^{2}}{a^{2}}-\frac{y^{2}}{b^{2}}=1(a>0, b>0)$的右顶点、右焦点为$A$、$F$，过点$A$的直线$l$与$C$的一条渐近线交于点$Q$，直线$Q F$与$C$的一个交点为$B$，$\overrightarrow{A Q} \cdot \overrightarrow{A B}=\overrightarrow{A Q} \cdot \overrightarrow{F B}$，且$\overrightarrow{B Q}=4 \overrightarrow{F Q}$，则双曲线的离心率$e$为?

text:

text: 若椭圆$\frac{x^{2}}{m}+y^{2}=1(m>1)$与双曲线$\frac{x^{2}}{n}-y^{2}=1(n>0)$有相同的焦点$F_{1}$、$F_{2}$、$P$是两曲线的一个交点，则$\Delta F_{1} P F_{2}$的面积是?

text: 已知椭圆$\frac{x^{2}}{m^{2}}+\frac{y^{2}}{9}=1(m>0)$和双曲线$\frac{x^{2}}{n^{2}}-\frac{y^{2}}{4}=1(n>0)$有相同的焦点$F_{1}$、$F_{2}$，点$P$为椭圆和双曲线的一个交点，则$|P F_{1}| \cdot|P F_{2}|$的值是?

text: 已知双曲线$x^{2}-\frac{y^{2}}{3}=1$的左、右焦点分别为$F_{1}$、$F_{2}$，双曲线左支上点$A$满足$A F_{1} \perp A F_{2}$，则$\triangle A F_{1} F_{2}$的面积为?

text: 已知双曲线$E$: $\frac{x^{2}}{a^{2}}-y^{2}=1(a>0)$的左、右焦点分别为$F_{1}$、$F_{2}$、$M$在$E$的左支上，$\angle F_{1} M F_{2} \in[\frac{\pi}{6}, \frac{\pi}{3}]$，则$\overrightarrow{M F_{1}} \cdot \overrightarrow{M F_{2}}$的取值范围为?

text: 过抛物线$y^{2}=4 x$的焦点$F$的直线交抛物线于点$A$、$B$，交其准线$l$于点$C$，且$|A F|>|B F|$，若$|B C|=2|B F|$，则$|A F|$=?

text: 设$F_{1}$、$F_{2}$分别是双曲线$\frac{x^{2}}{a^{2}}-\frac{y^{2}}{b^{2}}=1(a>0, b>0)$的左, 右焦点，若双曲线右支上存在一点$P$，使$(\overrightarrow{O P}+\overrightarrow{O F_{2}}) \cdot \overrightarrow{F_{2} P}=0$ , $O$为坐标原点，且$|\overrightarrow{PF_{1}}|=\sqrt{3}|\overrightarrow{P F_{2}}|$，则该双曲线的离心率为?

text: 已知椭圆$C$: $\frac{x^{2}}{a^{2}}+\frac{y^{2}}{3}=1$的右焦点为$F$、$O$为坐标原点，$C$上有且只有一个点$P$满足$|O F|=|F P|$，则$C$的方程为?

text: 已知抛物线$C$: $y^{2}=4 x$的焦点$F$到直线$l$: $y=\sqrt{3} x+b$的距离为$\sqrt{3}$，且直线$l$与抛物线$C$交于$A$、$B$两点，则$|A F|+|B F|$=?

text: 已知抛物线$C$: $x^{2}=8 y$的焦点为$F$、$O$为坐标原点，点$P$在抛物线$C$上，且$P F \perp O F$，则$|\overrightarrow{O F}-\overrightarrow{P F}|$=?

text: 已知点$A$、$B$、$F_{1}$、$F_{2}$分别是椭圆$\frac{x^{2}}{a^{2}}+y^{2}=1(a>1)$的右顶点、下顶点、左焦点和右焦点，点$M$、$N$是椭圆上任意两点，若$\Delta M A B$的面积最大值为$\sqrt{2}+1$，则$\frac{|N F_{1}| \cdot|N F_{2}|}{|N F_{1}|+9|N F_{2}|}$的最大值为?

text: 若常数$a>0$, 椭圆$x^{2}+a^{2} y^{2}=2 a^{2}$的长轴长是短轴长的$3$倍，则实数$a$的值为?

fact_expressions: G: Hyperbola;b: Number;a: Number;M: Point;F1: Point;F2: Point;a>0;b>0;lambda:Number;lambda>=1/3;lambda<=1/2;Expression(G) = (-y^2/b^2 + x^2/a^2 = 1);LeftFocus(G) = F1;RightFocus(G) = F2;PointOnCurve(M, G);Abs(LineSegmentOf(M, F1)) = lambda*Abs(LineSegmentOf(M, F2));AngleOf(F1, M, F2) = ApplyUnit(60, degree)

text: 已知$F_{1}$、$F_{2}$为双曲线$\frac{x^{2}}{4}-\frac{y^{2}}{8}=1$的左、右焦点，点$P$在双曲线上，满足$P F_{1}=2 P F_{2}$，则$\triangle P F_{1} F_{2}$的面积为?
fact_expressions: F1: Point;F2: Point;G: Hyperbola;Expression(G) = (x^2/4 - y^2/8 = 1);LeftFocus(G) = F1;RightFocus(G) = F2;P: Point;PointOnCurve(P, G);LineSegmentOf(P, F1) = 2*LineSegmentOf(P, F2)

text: 设$F_{1}$、$F_{2}$分别为双曲线$\frac{x^{2}}{a^{2}}-\frac{y^{2}}{b^{2}}=1(a>0 , b>0)$的左、右焦点，若在右支上存在点$A$，使得点$F_{2}$到直线$A F_{1}$的距离为$2 a$，则该双曲线的离心率的取值范围是?
fact_expressions: G: Hyperbola;Expression(G) = (-y^2/b^2 + x^2/a^2 = 1);b: Number;a: Number;a>0;b>0;F1: Point;F2: Point;LeftFocus(G) = F1;RightFocus(G) = F2;A: Point;PointOnCurve(A, RightPart(G));Distance(F2, LineOf(A, F1)) = 2*a

text: 已知中心在坐标原点,离心率为$\frac{4}{5}$的椭圆的一个焦点是$(0,4)$,则此椭圆的准线方程为?
fact_expressions: G: Ellipse;O: Origin;Center(G) = O;Eccentricity(G) = 4/5;Coordinate(OneOf(Focus(G)))=(0,4)

text: 经过椭圆$\frac{x^{2}}{2}+y^{2}=1$中心的直线与椭圆相交于$M$、$N$两点（点$M$在第一象限)，过点$M$作$x$轴的垂线，垂足为点$E$. 设直线$N E$与椭圆的另一个交点为$P$. 则$\cos \angle N M P$的值是?
fact_expressions: G: Ellipse;H: Line;E: Point;N: Point;M: Point;P: Point;l:Line;Expression(G) = (x^2/2 + y^2 = 1);PointOnCurve(Center(G),H);Intersection(H,G)={M,N};Quadrant(M)=1;PointOnCurve(M,l);IsPerpendicular(l,xAxis);FootPoint(l,xAxis)=E;OneOf(Intersection(LineOf(N,E),G))=P

text: 已知点$F$为抛物线$C$: $y^{2}=2 p x(p>0)$的焦点，过点$F$的直线$l$交$C$于$A$、$B$两点，与$C$的准线交于点$M$，若$\overrightarrow{A B}+\overrightarrow{A M}=\overrightarrow{0}$，则$|A B|$的值等于?
fact_expressions: l: Line;C: Parabola;p: Number;A: Point;B: Point;M: Point;F: Point;p>0;Expression(C) = (y^2 = 2*(p*x));Focus(C) = F;PointOnCurve(F, l);Intersection(l, C) = {A, B};Intersection(l,Directrix(C)) = M;VectorOf(A, B) + VectorOf(A, M) = 0

text: 过抛物线$y^{2}=2 x$的焦点$F$作直线$l$交抛物线于$A$、$B$两点，若$\frac{1}{|A F|}-\frac{1}{|B F|}=1$，则直线$l$的倾斜角$\theta$=?
fact_expressions: l: Line;G: Parabola;A: Point;F: Point;B: Point;theta: Number;Expression(G) = (y^2 = 2*x);Focus(G) = F;PointOnCurve(F, l);Intersection(l, G) = {A, B};-1/Abs(LineSegmentOf(B, F)) + 1/Abs(LineSegmentOf(A, F)) = 1;Inclination(l) = theta

text: 已知点$A(-1,0)$是抛物线$y^{2}=2 p x$的准线与$x$轴的交点，$F$为抛物线的焦点，$P$是抛物线上的动点，则$\frac{|P F|}{|P A|}$最小值为?
fact_expressions: G: Parabola;p: Number;A: Point;P: Point;F: Point;Expression(G) = (y^2 = 2*p*x);Coordinate(A) = (-1, 0);Intersection(Directrix(G), xAxis) = A;Focus(G) = F;PointOnCurve(P, G)

text: 已知$A(-1,0)$, $B(1,0)$，且$\overrightarrow{M A} \cdot \overrightarrow{M B}=0$，则动点$M$的轨迹方程是?
fact_expressions: A: Point;Coordinate(A) = (-1, 0);B: Point;Coordinate(B) = (1, 0);M: Point;DotProduct(VectorOf(M, A), VectorOf(M, B)) = 0

text: 已知椭圆$E$: $\frac{x^{2}}{2 m}+\frac{y^{2}}{m}=1(m>0)$的右焦点为$F$，过点$F$的直线交椭圆$E$于$A$、$B$两点，若$A B$的中点坐标为$(1,-1)$，则椭圆$E$的方程为?
fact_expressions: E: Ellipse;m: Number;G: Line;A: Point;B: Point;F: Point;m>0;Expression(E) = (x^2/(2*m) + y^2/m = 1);Coordinate(MidPoint(LineSegmentOf(A, B))) = (1, -1);RightFocus(E) = F;PointOnCurve(F, G);Intersection(G, E) = {A, B}

text: 若双曲线的焦点在$y$轴上，离心率$e=2$, 则其渐近线方程为?
fact_expressions: G: Hyperbola;PointOnCurve(Focus(G), yAxis);Eccentricity(G)=e;e=2;e:Number

text: 已知$A$、$B$、$P$是双曲线$\frac{x^{2}}{a^{2}}-\frac{y^{2}}{b^{2}}=1( a>0, b>0)$上的不同三点，且$A$、$B$两点连线经过坐标原点，若直线$P A$, $P B$的斜率乘积$k_{P A} \cdot k_{P B}=\frac{2}{3}$，则该双曲线的离心率$e$=?
fact_expressions: G: Hyperbola;b: Number;a: Number;A: Point;P: Point;B: Point;O:Origin;e: Number;a>0;b>0;Expression(G) = (-y^2/b^2 + x^2/a^2 = 1);PointOnCurve(A, G);PointOnCurve(B, G);PointOnCurve(P, G);Negation(A=B);Negation(A=P);Negation(B=P);PointOnCurve(O,LineSegmentOf(A,B));Slope(LineOf(P, B)) = k2;Slope(LineOf(P,A))=k1;k1:Number;k2:Number;k1*k2=2/3;Eccentricity(G) = e

text: 以椭圆$\frac{x^{2}}{25}+\frac{y^{2}}{16}=1$的中心为顶点,以椭圆的左准线为准线的抛物线与椭圆右准线交于$A$ , $B$两点,则$|A B|$=?
fact_expressions: G: Parabola;H: Ellipse;A: Point;B: Point;Expression(H) = (x^2/25 + y^2/16 = 1);Vertex(G)=Center(H);LeftDirectrix(H)=Directrix(G);Intersection(RightDirectrix(H),G)={A,B}

text: 已知椭圆$\frac{x^{2}}{9}+\frac{y^{2}}{5}=1$的左右焦点为$F_{1}$、$F_{2}$、$P$为椭圆上一点，$O$是坐标原点，$M$是$P F_{1}$的中点，若$|P F_{1}|=4$，则$|O M|$=?

text: 双曲线以$F_{1}(-3 , 0)$ , $F_{2}(3 , 0)$为焦点，且虚轴长为实轴长$\sqrt{2}$倍，则该双曲线的标准方程是?

text: 若抛物线$C$顶点在原点，焦点在$y$轴上，且过点$(2,1)$，则$C$的标准方程是?
fact_expressions: C: Parabola;O: Origin;Vertex(C) = O;PointOnCurve(Focus(C), yAxis);G: Point;Coordinate(G) = (2, 1);PointOnCurve(G, C)

text: 已知平面内两定点$A(-5,0)$ , $B(5,0)$，动点$M$满足 $||M A|-| M B||=6$，则点$M$的轨迹方程是?
fact_expressions: A: Point;B: Point;Coordinate(A) = (-5, 0);Coordinate(B) = (5, 0);M: Point;Abs(Abs(LineSegmentOf(M, A)) - Abs(LineSegmentOf(M, B))) = 6

text: 椭圆$x^{2}+4 y^{2}=4$的焦点坐标为?
fact_expressions: G: Ellipse;Expression(G) = (x^2 + 4*y^2 = 4)

text: 已知椭圆$\frac{x^{2}}{a^{2}}+\frac{y^{2}}{b^{2}}=1(a>b>0)$的左顶点为$A$，上顶点为$B$，右焦点为$F$. 设线段$A B$的中点为$M$，若$2 \overrightarrow{M A} \cdot \overrightarrow{M F}+\overrightarrow{B F}^2 \geq 0$，则该椭圆离心率的取值范围为?

text: 设抛物线$y=4 x^{2}$的焦点为$F$，则点$F$的坐标为？
fact_expressions: G: Parabola;F: Point;Expression(G) = (y = 4*x^2);Focus(G) = F

text: 若抛物线$y^{2}=2 p x(p>0)$的焦点恰好是双曲线$\frac{x^{2}}{12-m}-\frac{y^{2}}{m+4}=1$的右焦点，则实数$p$的值为?

text: 已知抛物线$y^{2}=4 x$上一点$P$到焦点的距离是它到$y$轴的距离的$2$倍，则点$P$到焦点的距离为?
fact_expressions: G: Parabola;P: Point;Expression(G) = (y^2 = 4*x);PointOnCurve(P,G);Distance(P, Focus(G)) = Distance(P, yAxis)*2

text: 已知双曲线$\frac{x^{2}}{4}-\frac{y^{2}}{b^{2}}=1(b>0)$的离心率为$\frac{\sqrt{5}}{2}$ , $F_{1}$ , $F_{2}$是双曲线的两个焦点，$A$为左顶点、$B(0, b)$，点$P$在线段$AB$上，则$\overrightarrow{P F_{1}} \cdot \overrightarrow{P F_{2}}$的最小值为?

text: 已知双曲线$x^{2}-y^{2}=k$的一个焦点是抛物线$y^{2}=16 x$的焦点，则$k$的值是?

text: 曲线$x y=2$上的点到直线$x+y+\sqrt{2}=0$的距离的最小值为?

text: 直线$l$: $y=2 x+10$过双曲线$\frac{x^{2}}{a^{2}}-\frac{y^{2}}{b^{2}}=1(a>0, b>0)$一个焦点且与其一条渐近线平行，则双曲线方程为?

text: 设点$F$、$B$分别为椭圆$C$: $\frac{x^{2}}{a^{2}}+\frac{y^{2}}{3}=1(a>\sqrt{3})$的右焦点和上顶点，$O$为坐标原点，且$\triangle O F B$的周长为$3+\sqrt{3}$，则实数$a$的值为?

text: 已知椭圆$C$: $\frac{x^{2}}{4}+y^{2}=1$上两点$A$、$B$，若$A B$的中点为$D$，直线$O D$的斜率等于$1$，则直线$A B$的斜率等于?

text: 过抛物线$x^{2}=4 y$的焦点$F$作倾斜角为$30^{\circ}$的直线，与抛物线分别交于$A$、$B$两点，则$|A B|$=?

text: 已知点$Q(m , 0)$, $P$是椭圆$\frac{x^{2}}{4}+y^{2}=1$的动点. 若点$P$恰在椭圆的右顶点时，线段$PQ$的长度取到最小，则实数$m$的取值范围为?

text: 设圆$x^{2}+y^{2}-4 x+2 y-11=0$的圆心为$A$，点$P$在圆上，则线段$PA$的中点$M$的轨迹方程是?

text: 已知双曲线$\frac{x^{2}}{3}-y^{2}=1$则该曲线的虚轴长为?

text: 已知抛物线$y^{2}=2 p x(p>0)$上一点$M(1, m)$到其焦点的距离为$5$，双曲线$x^{2}-\frac{y^{2}}{a}=1$的左顶点为$A$，若双曲线一条渐近线与直线$AM$垂直，则实数$a$=?

text: 已知抛物线$y^{2}=2 p x(p>0)$上一点$M(1 , m)$到其焦点的距离为$5$，双曲线$x^{2}-\frac{y^{2}}{a}=1$的左顶点为$A$，若双曲线的一条渐近线与直线$A M$垂直，则实数$a$=?

text: 已知$A$、$B$两点的坐标分别是$(-2,0) $,$(2,0)$，直线$A M$ ,$B M$相交于点$M$，且直线$A M$的斜率与直线$B M$的斜率的差是$4$，则点$M$的轨迹方程为?

text: 已知双曲线$\frac{x^{2}}{m}-y^{2}=1$和椭圆$\frac{x^{2}}{12}+\frac{y^{2}}{4}=1$焦点相同，则该双曲线的方程为?

text: 设双曲线$\frac{x^{2}}{a^{2}}-\frac{y^{2}}{b^{2}}=1(a>0, b>0)$的右焦点是$F$，左、右顶点分别是$A_{1}$、$A_{2}$，过$F$做$x$轴的垂线交双曲线于$B$、$C$两点，若$A_{1} B \perp A_{2} C$，则双曲线的离心率为?

text: 已知双曲线$\frac{x^{2}}{a^{2}}-\frac{y^{2}}{b^{2}}=1(a>0, b>0)$的焦距为$2 c$，焦点到双曲线的渐近线的距离为$\frac{c}{2}$，则双曲线的离心率为?

text: 已知抛物线$C$: $y^{2}=2 p x(p>0)$的焦点$F$为椭圆$\frac{4 x^{2}}{9}+\frac{y^{2}}{b^{2}}=1$的右顶点，直线$l$是抛物线$C$的准线，点$A$在抛物线$C$上，过$A$作$A B \perp l$，垂足为$B$，若直线$B F$的斜率$k_{B F}=-\sqrt{3}$，则$\triangle A F B$的面积为?

text: 若双曲线$\frac{x^{2}}{8}-\frac{y^{2}}{b^{2}}=1$与椭圆$\frac{x^{2}}{2}+y^{2}=1$共准线，则双曲线的离心率为?

text: 已知直线$l_{1}$: $2 x-y+2=0$和直线$l_{2}$:$ x=-1$，抛物线$y^{2}=4 x$上一动点$P$到直线$l_{1}$和直线$l_{2}$的距离之和的最小值是?
fact_expressions: G: Parabola;l1:Line;l2:Line;P:Point;Expression(G) = (y^2 = 4*x);Expression(l1)=(2*x-y+2=0);Expression(l2)=(x=-1);PointOnCurve(P,G)

text: 已知点$Q$在椭圆$\frac{x^{2}}{16}+\frac{y^{2}}{8}=1$上运动，过点$Q$作圆$(x-1)^{2}+y^{2}=1$的两条切线，切点分别为$A$、$B$，则$|A B|$的最小值为?
fact_expressions: G: Ellipse;H: Circle;A: Point;B: Point;Q: Point;l1: Line;l2: Line;Expression(G) = (x^2/16 + y^2/8 = 1);Expression(H) = (y^2 + (x - 1)^2 = 1);PointOnCurve(Q, G);TangentOfPoint(Q, H) = {l1, l2};TangentPoint(l1,H)=A;TangentPoint(l2,H)=B

text: 直线$y=x+b$与抛物线$x^{2}=2 y$交于$A$、$B$两点，$O$为坐标原点，且$O A \perp O B$，则$b$=?
fact_expressions: H: Line;Expression(H) = (y = b + x);b: Number;G: Parabola;Expression(G) = (x^2 = 2*y);Intersection(H, G) = {A, B};A: Point;B: Point;O: Origin;IsPerpendicular(LineSegmentOf(O, A), LineSegmentOf(O, B)) = True

text: 已知点$P$为椭圆$\frac{x^{2}}{4}+y^{2}=1$上一点，$A B$为圆$x^{2}+(y+2)^{2}=1$的任一条直径，则$\overrightarrow{P A} \cdot \overrightarrow{P B}$的最大值为?
fact_expressions: G: Ellipse;Expression(G) = (x^2/4 + y^2 = 1);P: Point;PointOnCurve(P, G);H: Circle;Expression(H) = (x^2 + (y + 2)^2 = 1);A: Point;B: Point;IsDiameter(LineSegmentOf(A, B), H)

text: 若双曲线$\frac{y^{2}}{a^{2}}-\frac{x^{2}}{b^{2}}=1(a>0, b>0)$的一条渐近线方程是$x-2 y=0$，则它的离心率等于?
fact_expressions: G: Hyperbola;Expression(G) = (-x^2/b^2 + y^2/a^2 = 1);a: Number;b: Number;a>0;b>0;Expression(OneOf(Asymptote(G))) = (x - 2*y = 0)

text: 已知$F$为双曲线$\frac{x^{2}}{a^{2}}-\frac{y^{2}}{b^{2}}=1(a>0, b>0)$的左焦点，过点$F$作直线$l$与圆$x^{2}+y^{2}=a^{2}$相切于点$A$，且与双曲线右支相交于点$B$，若$\overrightarrow{F A}=\frac{1}{3} \overrightarrow{F B}$，则双曲线的离心率为?
fact_expressions: F: Point;G: Hyperbola;Expression(G) = (-y^2/b^2 + x^2/a^2 = 1);b: Number;a: Number;a>0;b>0;LeftFocus(G) = F;PointOnCurve(F, l) = True;l: Line;H: Circle;Expression(H) = (x^2 + y^2 = a^2);IsTangent(l, H) = True;TangentPoint(l, H) = A;A: Point;Intersection(l, RightPart(G)) = B;B: Point;VectorOf(F, A) = VectorOf(F, B)/3

text: 已知$F$为双曲线$\frac{x^{2}}{a^{2}}-\frac{y^{2}}{b^{2}}=1(a>0, b>0)$的左焦点，过点$F$作直线$l$与圆$x^{2}+y^{2}=a^{2}$相切于点$A$，且与双曲线的右支相交于点$B$，若$\overrightarrow{F A}=\frac{1}{3} \overrightarrow{F B}$，则双曲线的渐近线方程为?
fact_expressions: l: Line;G: Hyperbola;b: Number;a: Number;H: Circle;F: Point;A: Point;B: Point;a>0;b>0;Expression(G) = (-y^2/b^2 + x^2/a^2 = 1);Expression(H) = (x^2 + y^2 = a^2);LeftFocus(G) = F;PointOnCurve(F, l);TangentPoint(l, H) = A;Intersection(l, RightPart(G)) = B;VectorOf(F, A) = (1/3)*VectorOf(F, B)

text: 已知点$P$在双曲线$x^{2}-y^{2}=1$的右支上,且点$P$到直线$y=x$的距离为$\sqrt{2}$, 则点$P$的坐标是?
fact_expressions: G: Hyperbola;H: Line;P: Point;Expression(G) = (x^2 - y^2 = 1);Expression(H) = (y = x);PointOnCurve(P, RightPart(G));Distance(P, H) = sqrt(2)

text: 已知抛物线$y^{2}=4 x$的焦点为$F$，准线为直线$l$，过抛物线上一点，$P$作$P E \perp l$于$E$，若直线$E F$的倾斜角为$150^{\circ}$，则$|P F|$=?
fact_expressions: l: Line;G: Parabola;E: Point;F: Point;P: Point;Expression(G) = (y^2 = 4*x);Focus(G) = F;Directrix(G) = l;PointOnCurve(P, G);PointOnCurve(P, LineSegmentOf(P, E));IsPerpendicular(LineSegmentOf(P, E), l);FootPoint(LineSegmentOf(P, E), l) = E;Inclination(LineOf(E, F)) = ApplyUnit(150, degree)

text: 已知双曲线$\frac{x^{2}}{a^{2}}-\frac{y^{2}}{b^{2}}=1(a>0, b>0)$的左焦点为$F$，右顶点为$A$，点$B(0, b)$，线段$A B$的中点为$P$，且$|P F|=\sqrt{6}|O P|$($O$为坐标原点)，则双曲线的离心率为?
fact_expressions: G: Hyperbola;Expression(G) = (-y^2/b^2 + x^2/a^2 = 1);a: Number;b: Number;a>0;b>0;F: Point;LeftFocus(G) = F;A: Point;RightVertex(G) = A;B: Point;Coordinate(B) = (0, b);P: Point;MidPoint(LineSegmentOf(A, B)) = P;Abs(LineSegmentOf(P, F)) = sqrt(6)*Abs(LineSegmentOf(O, P));O: Origin

text: 已知双曲线$\frac{x^{2}}{4}-y^{2}=1$，则其渐近线方程为?离心率为?
fact_expressions: G: Hyperbola;Expression(G) = (x^2/4 - y^2 = 1)

G: Parabola;H: Line;P: Point;Q: Point;Expression(G) = (y^2 = 2*x);Coordinate(P)=(x1,y1);Coordinate(Q)=(x2,y2);PointOnCurve(Focus(G), H);Intersection(H, G)={P,Q};x1:Number;x2:Number;y1:Number;y2:Number;x1+x2=3

text: 已知点$P(0,1)$及椭圆$\frac{x^{2}}{4}+\frac{y^{2}}{1}=1$ , $Q$是椭圆上的动点，则$|P Q|$的最大值为?
fact_expressions: G: Ellipse;P: Point;Q: Point;Expression(G) = (x^2/4 + y^2/1 = 1);Coordinate(P) = (0, 1);PointOnCurve(Q, G)

text: 过双曲线$\frac{x^{2}}{a^{2}}-\frac{y^{2}}{b^{2}}=1$的一个焦点$F$作其渐近线的平行线$l$，直线$l$与$y$轴交于点$P$，若线段$O P$的中点为双曲线的虚轴端点 ($O$为坐标原点)，则双曲线的离心率为?

text: 已知椭圆$\frac{x^{2}}{a^{2}}+\frac{y^{2}}{b^{2}}=1(a>b>0)$，直线$l$过左焦点且倾斜角为$\frac{\pi}{3}$，以椭圆的长轴为直径的圆截$l$所得的弦长等于椭圆的焦距，则椭圆的离心率为?

text: 若圆$x^{2}+y^{2}=a^{2}  (a>0)$与椭圆$\frac{x^{2}}{9}+\frac{y^{2}}{4}=1$有公共点，则实数$a$的取值范围是?
fact_expressions: H: Circle;Expression(H) = (x^2 + y^2 = a^2);a: Real;a>0;G: Ellipse;Expression(G) = (x^2/9 + y^2/4 = 1);IsIntersect(H, G)

text: 椭圆$\frac{x^{2}}{49}+\frac{y^{2}}{24}=1$上一点$P$与椭圆的两个焦点$F_{1}$, $F_{2}$的连线互相垂直，则$\triangle PF_{1} F_{2}$的面积为?
fact_expressions: G: Ellipse;P: Point;F1: Point;F2:Point;Expression(G) = (x^2/49 + y^2/24 = 1);Focus(G)={F1,F2};PointOnCurve(P,G);IsPerpendicular(LineSegmentOf(P,F1),LineSegmentOf(P,F2))

text: 若抛物线$y^{2}=2 p x  (p>0)$的准线经过点$(-1,1)$, 则抛物线焦点坐标为?
fact_expressions: G: Parabola;Expression(G) = (y^2 = 2*(p*x));p: Number;p>0;H: Point;Coordinate(H) = (-1, 1);PointOnCurve(H, Directrix(G))

text: 设$P$是双曲线$E$: $\frac{x^{2}}{a^{2}}-\frac{y^{2}}{b^{2}}=1$上任意一点，过$P$作渐近线$l_{1}$: $y=\frac{b}{a} x$和$l_{2}$: $y=-\frac{b}{a} x$的平行线分别交于点$R$、$Q$. 则$|P R| \cdot|P Q|$=?

text: 已知$M$、$N$为抛物线$y^{2}=4 x$上两个不同的点，$F$为抛物线的焦点.若线段$M N$的中点的纵坐标为$2$,$|M F|+|N F|=10$,则直线$M N$的方程为?

text: 已知椭圆$\frac{x^{2}}{3}+y^{2}=1$的上顶点为$A$，左顶点为$B$，则直线$A B$的斜率为?
fact_expressions: G: Ellipse;A: Point;B: Point;Expression(G) = (x^2/3 + y^2 = 1);UpperVertex(G) = A;LeftVertex(G) = B

text: 双曲线$C$与标准型的椭圆$C^{\prime}$有公共的焦点,$C$的实轴长为$C^{\prime}$长轴长的一半,$C^{\prime}$的离心率比$C$的离心率小$\frac{\sqrt{11}}{6}$, 且$C^{\prime}$的焦距是$2 \sqrt{11}$, 则此双曲线的方程为?
fact_expressions: C: Hyperbola;C1: Ellipse;Focus(C) = Focus(C1);Length(RealAxis(C)) = (1/2)*Length(MajorAxis(C1));Eccentricity(C1) = Eccentricity(C) - sqrt(11)/6;FocalLength(C1) = 2*sqrt(11)

text: 已知双曲线$\frac{x^{2}}{a^{2}}-\frac{y^{2}}{b^{2}}=1(a>b>0)$的右焦点为$F$，左右顶点分别为$A$、$B$，点$P$为该双曲线上一点，若$|O P|=|O F|$, $\overrightarrow{P A} \cdot \overrightarrow{P B}+\overrightarrow{O F} \cdot \overrightarrow{O A}=0$，则双曲线的离心率为?

text: 已知抛物线$y^{2}=4 x$的焦点为$F$，抛物线上一点$P$，若$|P F|=5$，则$\triangle POF$的面积为?

text: 已知抛物线$y^{2}=8 x$的焦点为$F$，抛物线上一点$P$，若$|P F|=5$，则$\triangle P O F$的面积为?

text: 已知$A$、$B$为椭圆$E$: $\frac{x^{2}}{a^{2}}+\frac{y^{2}}{b^{2}}=1(a>b>0)$的左、右顶点，点$P$在$E$上，在$\triangle A P B$中，$\tan \angle P A B=\frac{1}{2}$ , $\tan \angle P B A=\frac{2}{9}$，则椭圆$E$的离心率为?

text: 过点$P(1,3)$作两条互相垂直的直线$l_{1}$和$l_{2}$，它们分别与$x$轴，$y$轴交于$A$、$B$两点，则线段$A B$中点的轨迹方程为?

text: 过点$M(4 , 0)$的直线$l$与双曲线$\frac{x^{2}}{a^{2}}-\frac{y^{2}}{b^{2}}=1(a>b>0)$两渐近线分别交于不同两点$A$、$B$、$O$为原点，若该双曲线的离心率为$2$，则$\overrightarrow{O A} \cdot \overrightarrow{O B}$的取值范围为?
fact_expressions: l: Line;G: Hyperbola;b: Number;a: Number;M: Point;O: Origin;A: Point;B: Point;a > b;b > 0;Expression(G) = (-y^2/b^2 + x^2/a^2 = 1);Coordinate(M) = (4, 0);PointOnCurve(M,l);L1:Line;L2:Line;Asymptote(G)={L1,L2};Intersection(l,L1)=A;Intersection(l,L2)=B;Negation(A=B);Eccentricity(G) = 2

text: 若方程$\frac{x^{2}}{5-k}+\frac{y^{2}}{k-3}=1$表示双曲线，则$k$的取值范围为?

text: 以椭圆$\frac{x^{2}}{25}+\frac{y^{2}}{9}=1$的焦点为焦点，离心率为$2$的双曲线方程为?

text: 已知$F_{1}$、$F_{2}$分别为双曲线$E$: $\frac{y^{2}}{a^{2}}-\frac{x^{2}}{b^{2}}=1(a>0, b>0)$的两个焦点，$E$上的点$P$到原点的距离为$b$，且$\sin \angle P F_{2} F_{1}=3 \sin \angle P F_{1} F_{2}$，则双曲线$E$的渐近线方程为?

text: 椭圆$\frac{x^{2}}{a^{2}}+\frac{y^{2}}{b^{2}}=1(a>b>0)$的左、右焦点分别为$F_{1}$ , $F_{2}$ ,过$F_{2}$作$x$轴的垂线与椭圆的一个交点为$P$，若$\angle F_{1} PF_{2}=45^{\circ}$，则椭圆的离心率$e$=?

text: 若直线$l$过抛物线$y^{2}=4(x+1)$的焦点，并且与$x$轴垂直，则$l$被抛物线截得的线段长为?

text: 椭圆$\frac{x^{2}}{4}+\frac{y^{2}}{3}=1$的两个焦点为$F_{1}$、$F_{2}$，过$F_{1}$作垂直于$x$轴的直线与椭圆相交，一个交点为$P$，则$|P F_{2}|$=?

text: 抛物线$C$: $y^{2}=4 x$的焦点为$F$，过准线上一点$N$作$N F$的垂线交$y$轴于点$M$，若抛物线$C$上存在点$E$，满足$2 \overrightarrow{N E}=\overrightarrow{N M}+\overrightarrow{N F}$，则$\Delta M N F$的面积为?

text: 点$A$、$B$为椭圆$E$: $\frac{x^{2}}{a^{2}}+\frac{y^{2}}{b^{2}}=1(a>b>0)$长轴的端点，$C$、$D$为椭圆$E$短轴的端点，动点$M$满足$\frac{|M A|}{|M B|}=2$，若$\triangle M A B$面积的最大值为$8$，$\Delta M C D$面积的最小值为$1$，则椭圆的离心率为?

text: 若抛物线$y^{2}=4 x$上一点$M$到焦点的距离为$3$，则点$M$到$y$轴的距离为?

text: 设抛物线$y^{2}=2 p x(p>0)$的焦点为$F$，准线为$l$，点$A(0,2)$. 若线段$F A$的中点$B$在抛物线上，则$F$到$l$的距离为?$|F B|$=?

text: 已知$F$是双曲线$C$:$ \frac{x^{2}}{a^{2}}-\frac{y^{2}}{b^{2}}=1  (a>0 , b>0)$的左焦点，点$Q$在直线$l_{1}$: $y=-\frac{b}{a} x$上，点$P$在直线$l_{2}$: $y=\frac{b}{a} x$上，$O$为坐标原点，$2 \overrightarrow{F Q}=\overrightarrow{F P}$，$\overrightarrow{F P} \cdot \overrightarrow{O Q}=0$，$\Delta F O P$的面积为$\sqrt{3}$，则双曲线$C$的标准方程为?

text: 已知三角形$A B C$的三个顶点都在椭圆$\frac{x^{2}}{a^{2}}+\frac{y^{2}}{b^{2}}=1(a>b>0)$上，且$A B \perp x$轴，$A C \| x$轴，则$\frac{|A C| \cdot|A B|}{|B C|^{2}}$的最大值为?

text: 已知双曲线$C$: $\frac{x^{2}}{a^{2}}-\frac{y^{2}}{b^{2}}=1(a>0, b>0)$的左、右焦点分别为$F_{1}$、$F_{2}$，点$M$在$C$的左支上，过点$M$作$C$的一条渐近线的垂线，垂足为$N$，则当$|M F_{2}|+|M N|$取最小值$10$时，$\Delta F_{1} N F_{2}$面积的最大值为?
fact_expressions: C: Hyperbola;b: Number;a: Number;F1: Point;N: Point;F2: Point;M: Point;a>0;b>0;Expression(C) = (-y^2/b^2 + x^2/a^2 = 1);LeftFocus(C) = F1;RightFocus(C) = F2;PointOnCurve(M, LeftPart(C));L:Line;PointOnCurve(M, L);IsPerpendicular(L,OneOf(Asymptote(C)));FootPoint(L,OneOf(Asymptote(C)))=N;Min(Abs(LineSegmentOf(M,F2))+Abs(LineSegmentOf(M,N)))=10

text: 过点$P(-2,0)$的直线$l$与抛物线$C$: $y^{2}=8 x$相交于$A$、$B$两点，若$A$、$B$在第一象限，且点$A$为线段$P B$的中点，则直线$l$的斜率为?
fact_expressions: l: Line;C: Parabola;B: Point;P: Point;A: Point;Expression(C) = (y^2 = 8*x);Coordinate(P) = (-2, 0);PointOnCurve(P, l);Intersection(l, C) = {A, B};Quadrant(A) = 1;Quadrant(B) = 1;MidPoint(LineSegmentOf(P,B)) = A

text: 已知椭圆$\frac{x^{2}}{a^{2}}+\frac{y^{2}}{b^{2}}=1(a>b>0)$短轴端点为$A$，$B$. 点$P$是椭圆上除$A$ , $B$外任意一点，则直线$PA$，$PB$的斜率之积为?
fact_expressions: P: Point;A: Point;G: Ellipse;a: Number;b: Number;B: Point;a > b;b > 0;Expression(G) = (y^2/b^2 + x^2/a^2 = 1);Endpoint(MinorAxis(G)) = {A, B};PointOnCurve(P, G);Negation(P = A);Negation(P = B)

text: 动点$P$到点$F(2,0)$的距离与它到直线$x+2=0$的距离相等,则点$P$的轨迹方程是?
fact_expressions: G: Line;F: Point;P: Point;Expression(G) = (x + 2 = 0);Coordinate(F) = (2, 0);Distance(P, F) = Distance(P, G)

text: 经过双曲线$x^{2}-\frac{y^{2}}{3}=1$的左焦点$F_{1}$作倾斜角为$\frac{\pi}{6}$的直线$A B$，分别交双曲线的左、右支为点$A$、$B$. 求弦长$A B$=?
fact_expressions: G: Hyperbola;Expression(G) = (x^2 - y^2/3 = 1);F1: Point;LeftFocus(G) = F1;PointOnCurve(F1, LineOf(A, B)) = True;Inclination(LineOf(A, B)) = pi/6;A: Point;B: Point;Intersection(LineOf(A, B), LeftPart(G)) = A;Intersection(LineOf(A, B), RightPart(G)) = B;IsChordOf(LineSegmentOf(A, B), G) = True

text: 已知$A$、$B$为坐标平面上的两个定点，且$| A B |=2$，动点$P$到$A$、$B$两点距离之和为常数$2$，则点$P$的轨迹是?
fact_expressions: A: Point;B: Point;Abs(LineSegmentOf(A, B)) = 2;P: Point;Distance(P, A) + Distance(P, B) = 2

text: 双曲线$2 m x^{2}-m y^{2}=2$的一条准线是$y=1$，则$m$的值为?
fact_expressions: G: Hyperbola;Expression(G) = (2*(m*x^2) - m*y^2 = 2);m: Number;Expression(OneOf(Directrix(G))) = (y = 1)

text: 设$F_{1}$、$F_{2}$分别为双曲线$\frac{x^{2}}{a^{2}}-\frac{y^{2}}{b^{2}}=1(a>0, b>0)$的左、右焦点，点$P$在双曲线的右支上，且$|P F_{2}|=|F_{1} F_{2}|$, $F_{2}$到直线$P F_{1}$的距离等于双曲线的实轴长，该双曲线的渐近线方程为?
fact_expressions: G: Hyperbola;Expression(G) = (-y^2/b^2 + x^2/a^2 = 1);b: Number;a: Number;a>0;b>0;F1: Point;F2: Point;LeftFocus(G) = F1;RightFocus(G) = F2;P: Point;PointOnCurve(P, RightPart(G));Abs(LineSegmentOf(P, F2)) = Abs(LineSegmentOf(F1, F2));Distance(F2, LineOf(P, F1)) = Length(RealAxis(G))

text: 5. 直线 $l$ 过抛物线 $y^{2}=4 x$ 的焦点 $F$ 交抛物线于 $A$，$B$ 两个点，则 $\frac{1}{|F A|}+\frac{1}{|F B|}=$？
fact_expressions: l: Line;E: Parabola;F: Point;A: Point;B: Point;Expression(E) = (y^2 = 4*x);Focus(E) = F;PointOnCurve(F, l);Intersection(l, E) = {A, B}

text: 已知曲线$C$:$|x|+|y|=m(m>0)$, 曲线$C$与椭圆$\frac{x^{2}}{9}+\frac{y^{2}}{4}=1$有四个不同的交点，则实数$m$的取值范围是?
fact_expressions: G: Ellipse;C: Curve;m: Real;Expression(G) = (x^2/9 + y^2/4 = 1);m>0;Expression(C) = (Abs(x) + Abs(y) = m);NumIntersection(C, G) = 4

text: 已知$F_{1}$、$F_{2}$分别是双曲线$\Gamma$: $\frac{x^{2}}{2}-\frac{y^{2}}{14}=10$的左右焦点，过$F_{1}$的直线$l$与双曲线$\Gamma$左右两支分别交于$P$、$Q$两点，且$|P Q|=|Q F_{2}|$，则$\cos \angle P F_{1} F_{2}$=?
fact_expressions: l: Line;Gamma: Hyperbola;P: Point;Q: Point;F2: Point;F1: Point;Expression(Gamma) = (x^2/2 - y^2/14 = 10);LeftFocus(Gamma) = F1;RightFocus(Gamma) = F2;PointOnCurve(F1, l);Intersection(l,LeftPart(Gamma))=P;Intersection(l,RightPart(Gamma))=Q;Abs(LineSegmentOf(P, Q)) = Abs(LineSegmentOf(Q, F2))

text: 已知抛物线$y^{2}=4 x$，过点$N(2,0)$的直线交抛物线于$A$、$B$两点，$\frac{|A N|}{|B N|}=2$，则线段$A B$长为?
fact_expressions: G: Parabola;Expression(G) = (y^2 = 4*x);N: Point;Coordinate(N) = (2, 0);H: Line;PointOnCurve(N, H);A: Point;B: Point;Intersection(H, G) = {A, B};Abs(LineSegmentOf(A, N))/Abs(LineSegmentOf(B, N)) = 2

text: 已知椭圆$\Gamma$:$\frac{x^{2}}{a^{2}}+\frac{y^{2}}{b^{2}}=1(a>b>0)$的左、右焦点分别为$F_{1}$、$F_{2}$，点$A$、$B$在椭圆$\Gamma$上，$\overrightarrow{A F_{1}} \cdot \overrightarrow{F_{1} F_{2}}=0$且$\overrightarrow{A F_{2}}=\lambda \overrightarrow{F_{2} B}$，则当$\lambda \in[2,3]$时，椭圆的离心率的取值范围为?
fact_expressions: Gamma: Ellipse;a: Number;b: Number;A: Point;F1: Point;F2: Point;B: Point;a > b;b > 0;lambda:Number;In(lambda,[2,3]);Expression(Gamma) = (x^2/a^2 + y^2/b^2 = 1);LeftFocus(Gamma) = F1;RightFocus(Gamma) = F2;PointOnCurve(A, Gamma);PointOnCurve(B, Gamma);DotProduct(VectorOf(A,F1),VectorOf(F1,F2))=0;VectorOf(A,F2)=lambda*VectorOf(F2,B)

text: 斜率为$1$的直线与椭圆$\frac{x^{2}}{2}+y^{2}=1$相交于$A$、$B$两点，则$|A B|$的最大值为?
fact_expressions: G: Ellipse;H: Line;A: Point;B: Point;Expression(G) = (x^2/2 + y^2 = 1);Slope(H)=1;Intersection(H, G) = {A, B}

text: 直线$x+y+2=0$分别与$x$轴，$y$轴交于$A$、$B$两点，点$P$在抛物线$y^{2}=4 x$上，则$\triangle A B P$面积的最小值为?
fact_expressions: G: Parabola;H: Line;A: Point;B: Point;P: Point;Expression(G) = (y^2 = 4*x);Expression(H) = (x + y + 2 = 0);Intersection(H,xAxis) = A;Intersection(H,yAxis) = B;PointOnCurve(P, G)

text: 以直线$3 x-4 y-12=0$与$y$轴的交点为焦点的抛物线标准方程为?
fact_expressions: C:Parabola;H: Line;Expression(H) = (3*x - 4*y - 12 = 0);Intersection(H,yAxis)=Focus(C)

text: 椭圆$\frac{x^{2}}{9}+\frac{y^{2}}{3}=1$的左、右焦点分别是$F_{1}$、$F_{2}$、$P$是椭圆上一点，若$P F_{1}=2 P F_{2}$，则$P$到左准线的距离是?
fact_expressions: G: Ellipse;P: Point;F1: Point;F2: Point;Expression(G) = (x^2/9 + y^2/3 = 1);LeftFocus(G)=F1;RightFocus(G)=F2;PointOnCurve(P,G);LineSegmentOf(P, F1) = 2*LineSegmentOf(P, F2)

text: 如果直线$x+y+a=0$与圆$x^{2} + (y + \sqrt{2})^{2}=1$有公共点，则实数$a$的取值范围是?
fact_expressions: G: Circle;H: Line;a: Real;Expression(G) = (x^2 + (y + sqrt(2))^2 = 1);Expression(H) = (a + x + y = 0);IsIntersect(H, G)

text: 抛物线$y^{2}=100 x$的焦点坐标为?
fact_expressions: G: Parabola;Expression(G) = (y^2 = 100*x)

text: 已知$P$是椭圆$\frac{x^{2}}{4}+\frac{y^{2}}{8}=1$上一动点，$O$为坐标原点，则线段$O P$中点$Q$的轨迹方程为?

text: 直线$l$与抛物线$y^{2}=4 x$相交于$A$、$B$两点，$|A B|=6$，则$A B$中点到$y$轴距离的最小值为?
fact_expressions: l: Line;G: Parabola;A: Point;B: Point;Expression(G) = (y^2 = 4*x);Intersection(l, G) = {A, B};Abs(LineSegmentOf(A, B)) = 6

text: 设抛物线$C$: $y^{2}=4 x$焦点为$F$，准线为$l$，点$M$在$C$上，点$N$在$l$上，且$\overrightarrow{F N}=\lambda \overrightarrow{F M}(\lambda>0)$, 若$|M F|=\frac{4}{3}$，则$\lambda$的值为?

text: 已知抛物线$x^{2}=4 y$的焦点为$F$，若抛物线上一点$P$到$x$轴的距离为$2$，则$P F$的值为?
fact_expressions: G: Parabola;P: Point;F: Point;Expression(G) = (x^2 = 4*y);Focus(G) = F;PointOnCurve(P, G);Distance(P, xAxis) = 2

text: 直线$l$: $y=k x+2$与双曲线$C$: $\frac{x^{2}}{2}-y^{2}=1$有两个公共点则$k$的取值范围是?
fact_expressions: l: Line;C: Hyperbola;Expression(C) = (x^2/2 - y^2 = 1);Expression(l)=(y=k*x+2);NumIntersection(l,C)=2;k:Number

text: 已知点$A$为椭圆$\frac{x^{2}}{25}+\frac{y^{2}}{9}=1$的左顶点，点$B$为椭圆上任意一点，$y$轴上有一点$C(0,4)$，则三角形$A B C$的面积的最大值是?

text: 椭圆$\frac{x^{2}}{m^{2}}+\frac{y^{2}}{9}=1  (m>0)$的一个焦点为$(4 , 0)$，则该椭圆的离心率为?

text: 已知抛物线$x^{2}=-2 p y(p>0)$的焦点坐标为$F(0,-3)$，则直线$y=x$被抛物线截得的弦的中点坐标为?

text: 已知圆$M$:$(x-4)^{2}+y^{2}=169$，圆$N$:$(x+4)^{2}+y^{2}=9$，动圆$P$和圆$M$相内切，和圆$N$相外切，则动圆圆心$P$的轨迹方程是?

text: 已知$F_{1}$、$F_{2}$是椭圆$\frac{x^{2}}{6}+\frac{y^{2}}{3}=1$的两个焦点，$A$、$B$分别是该椭圆的左顶点和上顶点，点$P$在线段$A B$上，则$\overrightarrow{P F_{1}} \cdot \overrightarrow{P F_{2}}$的最小值为?

text: 已知点$A(-1,1)$和椭圆$C$: $\frac{x^{2}}{4}+\frac{y^{2}}{3}=1$ , $M$是椭圆$C$上的动点，$F$是椭圆$C$的右焦点，则$|M A|+2|M F|$的最小值为?

text: 方程$16 x^{2}+k y^{2}=16$表示椭圆，则$k$的取值范围是?
fact_expressions: G: Ellipse;Expression(G)=(k*y^2 + 16*x^2 = 16);k:Number

text: 双曲线$C$与椭圆$\frac{x^{2}}{9}+\frac{y^{2}}{5}=1$有公共焦点，且$C$的一条渐近线方程为$x+\sqrt{3} y=0$，则$C$的方程为?
fact_expressions: C: Hyperbola;G: Ellipse;Expression(G) = (x^2/9 + y^2/5 = 1);Focus(C) = Focus(G);Expression(OneOf(Asymptote(C))) = (x + sqrt(3)*y = 0)

text: 点$M(-3,0)$，点$N(3,0)$，动点$P$满足$|P M|=10-|P N|$，则点$P$的轨迹方程是?
fact_expressions: M: Point;N: Point;P: Point;Coordinate(M) = (-3, 0);Coordinate(N) = (3, 0);Abs(LineSegmentOf(P, M)) = 10 - Abs(LineSegmentOf(P, N))

text: 椭圆$E$: $\frac{x^{2}}{25}+\frac{y^{2}}{9}=1$的左焦点为$F_{1}$，直线$x=m$与椭圆$E$交于$A$、$B$两点.当$\Delta F_{1} A B$的周长最大时，则$m$的值等于?

text: 已知焦点在$x$轴上的椭圆方程为$(m-1) x^{2}+(3 m-4) y^{2}=m$，则$m$的范围为?
fact_expressions: G: Ellipse;PointOnCurve(Focus(G), xAxis);m: Number;Expression(G) = (x^2*(m - 1) + y^2*(3*m - 4) = m)

text: 已知椭圆$\frac{x^{2}}{a^{2}}+\frac{y^{2}}{b^{2}}=1$离心率$e=\frac{1}{2}$，过椭圆中心的直线交椭圆于$A$、$B$两点 ($A$在第一象限)，过$A$作$x$轴垂线交椭圆于点$C$，过$A$作直线$A P$垂直$A B$交椭圆于点$P$，连接$B P$交$A C$于点$Q$，则$\frac{A Q}{Q C}$=?
fact_expressions: G: Ellipse;b: Number;a: Number;e: Number;H: Line;A: Point;P: Point;B: Point;C: Point;Q: Point;Expression(G) = (y^2/b^2 + x^2/a^2 = 1);Eccentricity(G) = e ;e = 1/2;PointOnCurve(Center(G), H);Intersection(H, G) = {A, B};Quadrant(A) = 1;Z: Line;PointOnCurve(A, Z);IsPerpendicular(Z, xAxis);Intersection(Z, G) = C;PointOnCurve(A, LineOf(A, P));IsPerpendicular(LineOf(A, P), LineSegmentOf(A, B));Intersection(LineOf(A, P), G) = P;Intersection(LineSegmentOf(B, P), LineSegmentOf(A, C)) = Q

text: 已知$A(2,1)$, $B(2,-1)$ , $O$为坐标原点，动点$P(x, y)$满足$\overrightarrow{O P}=m \overrightarrow{O A}+n \overrightarrow{O B}$，其中$m, n \in \mathbf{R}$，且$m^{2}+n^{2}=\frac{1}{2}$，则动点$P$的轨迹方程是?
fact_expressions: A: Point;B: Point;P: Point;O: Origin;x1:Number;y1:Number;m:Real;n:Real;Coordinate(A) = (2, 1);Coordinate(B) = (2, -1);Coordinate(P) = (x1, y1);VectorOf(O, P) = m*VectorOf(O, A) + n*VectorOf(O, B);m^2 + n^2 = 1/2

text: 已知圆$C$的方程$(x-1)^{2}+y^{2}=1$,$P$是椭圆$\frac{x^{2}}{4}+\frac{y^{2}}{3}=1$上一点，过$P$作圆的两条切线，切点为$A$、$B$，则$\overrightarrow{P A} \cdot \overrightarrow{P B}$的取值范围为?

text: 已知椭圆$\frac{x^{2}}{a}+\frac{y^{2}}{9}=1(a>9)$长轴的一个顶点到直线$x-\sqrt{3} y=0$的距离不小于$2$，则椭圆的离心率的取值范围为?

text: 椭圆$\frac{x^{2}}{25}+\frac{y^{2}}{16}=1$上有一点$M$到右准线的距离是$\frac{20}{3}$，则点$M$到左焦点的距离是?

text: 已知焦点在$x$轴上的双曲线的虚轴长等于半焦距，则双曲线的渐近线方程是?
fact_expressions: G: Hyperbola;PointOnCurve(Focus(G),xAxis) = True;Length(ImageinaryAxis(G)) = HalfFocalLength(G)

text: 设过抛物线$y^{2}=2 p x(p>0)$上任意一点$P$(异于原点$O$) 的直线与抛物线$y^{2}=8 p x(p>0)$交于$A$、$B$两点，直线$O P$与抛物线$y^{2}=8 p x(p>0)$的另一个交点为$Q$，则$\frac{S_{\triangle A B Q}}{S_{\triangle A B O}}$=?

text: $P$是双曲线$C$: $\frac{x^{2}}{4}-y^{2}=1$右支上一点,直线$l$是双曲线$C$的一条渐近线,$P$在$l$上的射影为$Q$、$F_{1}$是双曲线$C$的左焦点,则$|P F_{1}|+|P Q|$的最小值为?

text: 双曲线$x^{2}-\frac{y^{2}}{b^{2}}=1(b>0)$的一条渐近线方程为$y=\sqrt{3} x$，则双曲线的焦点为?

text: 设椭圆$C$: $\frac{x^{2}}{a^{2}}+\frac{y^{2}}{b^{2}}=1(a>b>0)$的左、右顶点分别为$A$、$B$、$P$是椭圆上不同于$A$、$B$的一点，设直线$A P$ , $B P$的斜率分别为$m$ , $n$ ,则当$\frac{a}{b}(3-\frac{2}{3 m n})+\frac{2}{m n}+3(\ln |m|+\ln |n|)$取得最小值时，椭圆$C$的离心率是?
fact_expressions: C: Ellipse;Expression(C) = (y^2/b^2 + x^2/a^2 = 1);a: Number;b: Number;a > b;b > 0;A: Point;B: Point;LeftVertex(C) = A;RightVertex(C) = B;P: Point;Negation(P=A);Negation(P=B);PointOnCurve(P, C);m: Number;n: Number;Slope(LineOf(A, P)) = m;Slope(LineOf(B, P)) = n;WhenMin((a/b)*(3 - 2/(3*m*n)) + 2/(m*n) + 3*(ln(Abs(m)) + ln(Abs(n))))

text: 已知双曲线$E$: $\frac{x^{2}}{4}-\frac{y^{2}}{b^{2}}=1(b>0)$的离心率为$2$，点$P$是$E$上的动点，则点$P$到$E$的两条渐近线的距离之积为?
fact_expressions: E: Hyperbola;Expression(E) = (x^2/4 - y^2/b^2 = 1);Eccentricity(E) = 2;b: Number;b>0;P: Point;PointOnCurve(P, E) = True;A1: Line;A2: Line;Asymptote(E) = {A1, A2}

H: Line;Expression(H) = (y = k*x);k: Number;k>0;G: Hyperbola;Expression(G) = (y = 4/x);A: Point;B: Point;x1: Number;x2: Number;y1: Number;y2: Number;Coordinate(A) = (x1, y1);Coordinate(B) = (x2, y2);Intersection(H, G) = {A, B}

text: 已知过点$P(-1,1)$的直线$m$交$x$轴于点$A$，抛物线$x^{2}=y$上有一点$B$使$P A \perp P B$,若$A B$是抛物线$x^{2}=y$的切线，则直线$m$的方程是?
fact_expressions: m: Line;G: Parabola;A: Point;B: Point;P: Point;Expression(G) = (x^2 = y);Coordinate(P) = (-1, 1);PointOnCurve(P, m);Intersection(m, xAxis) = A;PointOnCurve(B,G);IsPerpendicular(LineSegmentOf(P,A),LineSegmentOf(P,B));IsTangent(LineSegmentOf(A, B), G)

text: $A$、$B$是双曲线$C$的两个顶点，直线$l$与双曲线$C$交于不同的两点$P$、$Q$，且与实轴垂直，若$\overrightarrow{P B} \cdot \overrightarrow{A Q}=0$，则双曲线$C$的离心率$e$=?
fact_expressions: B: Point;A: Point;C: Hyperbola;Vertex(C) = {A, B};l: Line;Intersection(l, C) = {P, Q};P: Point;Q: Point;Negation(P = Q);IsPerpendicular(l, RealAxis(C)) = True;DotProduct(VectorOf(P, B), VectorOf(A, Q)) = 0;e: Number;Eccentricity(C) = e

text: 已知椭圆$F$的左焦点$F_{1}$和右焦点$F_{2}$，上顶点为$A$ , $A F_{2}$的中垂线交椭圆于点$B$，若左焦点$F_{1}$在线段$A B$上，则椭圆离心率为?
fact_expressions: F: Ellipse;A: Point;B: Point;F2: Point;F1: Point;LeftFocus(F) = F1;RightFocus(F) = F2;UpperVertex(F)=A;Intersection(PerpendicularBisector(LineSegmentOf(A, F2)), F) = B;PointOnCurve(F1, LineSegmentOf(A,B))

text: 已知椭圆$\frac{x^{2}}{a^{2}}+\frac{y^{2}}{b^{2}}=1(a>b>0)$的左焦点$F_{1}$和右焦点$F_{2}$，上顶点为$A$ , $A F_{2}$的中垂线交椭圆于点$B$，若左焦点$F_{1}$在线段$A B$上，则椭圆离心率为?
fact_expressions: G: Ellipse;b: Number;a: Number;A: Point;B: Point;F2: Point;F1: Point;a > b;b > 0;Expression(G) = (y^2/b^2 + x^2/a^2 = 1);LeftFocus(G) = F1;RightFocus(G) = F2;UpperVertex(G) = A;Intersection(PerpendicularBisector(LineSegmentOf(A, F2)), G) = B;PointOnCurve(F1,LineSegmentOf(A,B))

text: 已知方程$(1+k) x^{2}-(1-k) y^{2}=1$表示焦点在$x$轴上的双曲线，则$k$的取值范围为?
fact_expressions: G: Hyperbola;Expression(G) = (x^2*(k + 1) - y^2*(1 - k) = 1);PointOnCurve(Focus(G), xAxis);k:Number

text: 已知双曲线$C$与椭圆$\frac{x^{2}}{12}+\frac{y^{2}}{3}=1$的焦点相同，且双曲线$C$的一条渐近线方程为$y=\frac{\sqrt{5}}{2} x$，则双曲线$C$的方程为?
fact_expressions: C: Hyperbola;G: Ellipse;Expression(G) = (x^2/12 + y^2/3 = 1);Focus(G) = Focus(C);Expression(OneOf(Asymptote(C))) = (y = x*(sqrt(5)/2))

text: 已知双曲线的方程为$\frac{x^{2}}{9}-\frac{y^{2}}{16}=1$，则双曲线的焦点到渐近线的距离为?
fact_expressions: G: Hyperbola;Expression(G) = (x^2/9 - y^2/16 = 1)

text: 双曲线$C$: $\frac{x^{2}}{a^{2}}-\frac{y^{2}}{b^{2}}=1(a>0, b>0)$的离心率为$\sqrt{3}$， 当$a=1$时，直线$x-y+m=0$与双曲线$C$交于不同的两点$A$、$B$，且线段$A B$的中点在圆$x^{2}+y^{2}=5$上，则$m$的值?
fact_expressions: C: Hyperbola;b: Number;a: Number;G: Circle;H: Line;m: Number;B: Point;A: Point;a>0;b>0;a=1;Expression(C) = (-y^2/b^2 + x^2/a^2 = 1);Expression(G) = (x^2 + y^2 = 5);Expression(H) = (m + x - y = 0);Eccentricity(C) = sqrt(3);Intersection(H, C) = {A, B};PointOnCurve(MidPoint(LineSegmentOf(A,B)),G);Negation(A=B)

text: 已知椭圆$C$: $\frac{x^{2}}{a^{2}}+\frac{y^{2}}{b^{2}}=1(a>b>0)$的长轴长为$8$ , $F_{1}$, $F_{2}$是$C$的两个焦点，$P$为$C$上一点，且$P F_{1} \perp P F_{2}$ , $\Delta P F_{1} F_{2}$的面积为$9$，求椭圆$C$的标准方程?
fact_expressions: C: Ellipse;Expression(C) = (y^2/b^2 + x^2/a^2 = 1);b: Number;a: Number;a > b;b > 0;Length(MajorAxis(C)) = 8;F1: Point;F2: Point;Focus(C) = {F1, F2};P: Point;PointOnCurve(P, C);IsPerpendicular(LineSegmentOf(P, F1), LineSegmentOf(P, F2));Area(TriangleOf(P, F1, F2)) = 9

text: 已知抛物线$y^{2}=4 x$的焦点为$F$，其准线与$x$轴交于点$A$，过$A$作直线$l$与抛物线交于$M$、$N$两点，则$|F M|^{2}+|F N|^{2}$的取值范围为?
fact_expressions: l: Line;G: Parabola;F: Point;M: Point;N: Point;Expression(G) = (y^2 = 4*x);Focus(G) = F;Intersection(Directrix(G), xAxis) = A;PointOnCurve(A, l);Intersection(l, G) = {M, N};A:Point

text: 已知$O$为坐标原点，双曲线$\frac{x^{2}}{a^{2}}-\frac{y^{2}}{b^{2}}=1(a>0, b>0)$上有$A$、$B$两点满足$O A \perp O B$，且点$O$到直线$A B$的距离为$c$，则双曲线的离心率为?
fact_expressions: G: Hyperbola;b: Number;a: Number;A: Point;B: Point;O: Origin;a>0;b>0;Expression(G) = (-y^2/b^2 + x^2/a^2 = 1);PointOnCurve(A,G);PointOnCurve(B,G);c:Number;IsPerpendicular(LineSegmentOf(O,A),LineSegmentOf(O,B));Distance(O, LineOf(A,B)) = c

text: 已知动点$P$在椭圆$\frac{x^{2}}{49}+\frac{y^{2}}{40}=1$上若点$A$的坐标为$(3,0)$,点$M$满足$|\overrightarrow{A M}|=1$,且$\overrightarrow{P M} \cdot \overrightarrow{A M}=0$,则$|\overrightarrow{P M}|$的最小值是?

text: 椭圆$C$: $\frac{x^{2}}{a^{2}}+\frac{y^{2}}{b^{2}}=1(a>b>0)$的一个焦点坐标为$(2,0)$，且椭圆过点$A(2 , 3)$，则椭圆$C$的离心率为?
fact_expressions: C: Ellipse;b: Number;a: Number;A: Point;a > b;b > 0;Expression(C) = (y^2/b^2 + x^2/a^2 = 1);Coordinate(A) = (2, 3);Coordinate(OneOf(Focus(C))) = (2,0);PointOnCurve(A, C)

text: 已知双曲线$C$: $\frac{x^{2}}{a^{2}}-\frac{y^{2}}{b^{2}}=1(a>0, b>0)$的右焦点为$F$，过点$F$的直线$l$: $y=\sqrt{3}(x-2 a)$与双曲线$C$的右支交于点$A$，且与$y$轴交于点$B$. 若$\triangle O B F$的面积为$8 \sqrt{3}$，其中，$O$为坐标原点，则$\frac{|A F|}{|B F|}$=?

text: 抛物线$y^{2}=4 x$的焦点为$F$，过点$P(2,0)$的直线与该抛物线相交于$A$、$B$两点，直线$A F$, $B F$分别交抛物线于点$C$、$D$. 若直线$A B$, $C D$的斜率分别为$k_{1}$, $k_{2}$，则$\frac{k_{1}}{k_{2}}$=?

text: 已知$P$是抛物线$x^{2}=4 y$上的一动点，则点$P$到直线$l_{1}$: $4 x-3 y-7=0$和$l_{2}$: $y=-1$的距离之和的最小值是?

text: 设$F_{1}$、$F_{2}$是椭圆$C$: $\frac{x^{2}}{4}+\frac{y^{2}}{m}=1$的两个焦点，若$C$上存在点$P$满足$\angle F_{1} P F_{2}=90^{\circ}$，则$m$的取值范围是?

text: 设$M$、$N$是双曲线$\frac{x^{2}}{a^{2}}-\frac{y^{2}}{b^{2}}=1(a>0, b>0)$实轴的两个端点，$Q$是双曲线上的一点(异于$M$、$N$两点)，$\angle Q M N=\alpha$, $\angle Q N M=\beta$, 则$\tan \alpha \tan \beta$=?

text: 已知圆$C_{1}$:$(x-2)^{2}+(y-2)^{2}=4$ , $C_{2}$:$(x+2)^{2}+(y+1)^{2}=2$，点$P$是圆$C_{1}$上的一个动点，$A B$是圆$C_{2}$的一条动弦，且$|A B|=2$，则$|\overrightarrow{P A}+\overrightarrow{P B}|$的最大值是?

text: 已知点$O$为坐标原点，点$M$在双曲线$C$: $x^{2}-y^{2}=1$上，过点$M$作双曲线$C$的某一条渐近线的垂线，垂足为$N$，则$|O N| \cdot|M N|$的值为?

text: 点$P$在曲线$\sqrt{\frac{x^{2}}{25}}+\sqrt{\frac{y^{2}}{9}}=1$上运动，$E$是曲线第二象限上的定点，$E$的纵坐标是$\frac{15}{8}$ , $O(0,0)$ , $F(4,0)$，若$\overrightarrow{O P}=x \overrightarrow{O F}+y \overrightarrow{O E}$，则$x+y$的最大值是?

text: 若$A$点坐标为$(1,1)$ , $F_{1}$是椭圆$5 y^{2}+9 x^{2}=45$的下焦点，点$P$是该椭圆上的动点，则$|P A|+|P F_{1}|$的最大值为$M$，最小值为$N$，则$M-N$=?

text: 设$F$为抛物线$C$: $x^{2}=16 y$的焦点，直线$l$: $y=-1$，点$A$为$C$上任意一点，过点$A$作$A P \perp l$于$P$，则$|  A P|-| A F| $=?

text: 椭圆$C$上一点$P$到两个焦点$F_{1}(-2,0)$, $F_{2}(2,0)$的距离之和等于$6$，则$C$的标准方程为?

text: 抛物线的焦点是$F(1 ,-1)$，准线方程是$x-y=0$，那么它的顶点坐标是?

text: 已知点$P(6 , y)$在抛物线$y^{2}=2 p x(p>0)$上，若点$P$到抛物线焦点$F$的距离等于$8$，则焦点$F$到抛物线准线的距离等于?

text: 抛物线$y=\frac{1}{4} x^{2}$上的动点$P$到直线$l_{1}$: $3 x-4 y-6=0$和直线$l_{2}$: $y=-1$的距离之和的最小值是?

text: $F_{1}$、$F_{2}$是椭圆$\frac{x^{2}}{9}+\frac{y^{2}}{7}=1$的两个焦点，$A$为椭圆上一点，且$\angle A F_{1} F_{2}=45^{\circ}$，则$\triangle A F_{1} F_{2}$的面积为?

text: 已知$P$是抛物线$y=\frac{1}{4} x^{2}$上的一动点，则点$P$到直线$l_{1}$: $4 x-3 y=7$和直线$l_{2}$: $y=-1$的距离之和的最小值是?

text: 已知直线$l$: $x-\sqrt{3} y=0$交双曲线$\Gamma$: $\frac{x^{2}}{a^{2}}-\frac{y^{2}}{b^{2}}=1(a>0, b>0)$于$A$、$B$两点，过$A$作直线$l$的垂线$A C$交双曲线$\Gamma$于点$C$. 若$\angle A B C=60^{\circ}$，则双曲线$\Gamma$的离心率为?
fact_expressions: Gamma: Hyperbola;l: Line;a: Number;b: Number;a>0;b>0;A: Point;B: Point;Expression(l) = (x - sqrt(3)*y = 0);Expression(Gamma) = (-y^2/b^2 + x^2/a^2 = 1);Intersection(l, Gamma) = {A, B};C: Point;PointOnCurve(A, LineOf(A, C));IsPerpendicular(LineOf(A, C), l);Intersection(LineOf(A, C), Gamma) = C;AngleOf(A, B, C) = ApplyUnit(60, degree)

text: 已知$P$是椭圆$\frac{x^{2}}{4}+y^{2}=1$上的一点，$F$为右焦点，点$A$的坐标为$(0, \sqrt{6})$，则$\triangle A F P$周长的最大值为?
fact_expressions: G: Ellipse;A: Point;F: Point;P: Point;Expression(G) = (x^2/4 + y^2 = 1);PointOnCurve(P, G);RightFocus(G) = F;Coordinate(A) = (0, sqrt(6))

text: 过抛物线$M$: $y^{2}=4 x$的焦点$F$作两条相互垂直的弦$A B$,$C D$，分别交$M$于$A$、$B$、$C$、$D$，则$|A B|+|C D|$的最小值为?
fact_expressions: M: Parabola;Expression(M) = (y^2 = 4*x);F: Point;Focus(M) = F;A: Point;B: Point;C: Point;D: Point;PointOnCurve(F, LineSegmentOf(A, B));PointOnCurve(F, LineSegmentOf(C, D));IsChordOf(LineSegmentOf(A, B), M);IsChordOf(LineSegmentOf(C, D), M);IsPerpendicular(LineSegmentOf(A, B), LineSegmentOf(C, D));Intersection(LineSegmentOf(A, B), M) = {A, B};Intersection(LineSegmentOf(C, D), M) = {C, D}

text: 已知$F_{1}$ ,$ F_{2}$是椭圆$\frac{x^{2}}{4}+\frac{y^{2}}{3}=1$的左右焦点，若直线$l$过焦点$F_{1}$，且与椭圆交于$A$、$B$，则$\Delta ABF_{2}$的周长为?
fact_expressions: l: Line;G: Ellipse;A: Point;B: Point;F2: Point;F1: Point;Expression(G) = (x^2/4 + y^2/3 = 1);LeftFocus(G)=F1;RightFocus(G) = F2;PointOnCurve(F1, l);Intersection(l,G) ={A,B}

text: 已知双曲线$C$: $\frac{x^{2}}{a^{2}}-\frac{y^{2}}{b^{2}}=1(a>0, b>0)$的左焦点为$F$，过原点的直线$l$与双曲线左、右两支分别交于点$P$, $Q$, 且 满 足$|Q F|-|P F|$的值为虚轴长，则该双曲线离心率为?
fact_expressions: l: Line;C: Hyperbola;b: Number;a: Number;Q: Point;F: Point;P: Point;O:Origin;a>0;b>0;Expression(C) = (-y^2/b^2 + x^2/a^2 = 1);LeftFocus(C) = F;PointOnCurve(O,l);Intersection(l,LeftPart(C))=P;Intersection(l,RightPart(C))=Q;Abs(LineSegmentOf(Q,F))-Abs(LineSegmentOf(P,F))=Length(ImageinaryAxis(C))

text: 已知椭圆的中心在坐标原点$O$、$A$、$C$分别是椭圆的上下顶点，$B$是椭圆的左顶点，$F$是椭圆的左焦点，直线$A F$与$BC$相交于点$D$. 若椭圆的离心率为$\frac{1}{2}$，则$\angle BDF$的正切值?
fact_expressions: G: Ellipse;O: Origin;Center(G) = O;A: Point;C: Point;UpperVertex(G) = A;LowerVertex(G) = C;B: Point;LeftVertex(G) = B;F: Point;LeftFocus(G) = F;D: Point;Intersection(LineOf(A, F), LineOf(B, C)) = D;Eccentricity(G) = 1/2

text: 已知$F$为抛物线$C$: $y^{2}=4 x$的焦点，$P$为抛物线$C$上在第一象限的点.若$M$为$P F$的中点，$O$为抛物线$C$的顶点，则直线$O M$斜率的最大值为?
fact_expressions: C: Parabola;M: Point;O:Origin;P: Point;F: Point;Expression(C) = (y^2 = 4*x);Focus(C) = F;PointOnCurve(P, C);Quadrant(P)=1;MidPoint(LineSegmentOf(P, F)) = M;Vertex(C)=O

text: 已知$F$为抛物线$C$: $y^{2}=4 x$的焦点，点$A$在抛物线上，若点$P$是抛物线准线上的动点，$O$为坐标原点，且$|A F|=5$，则$|P A|+|P O|$的最小值为?
fact_expressions: C: Parabola;A: Point;F: Point;P: Point;O: Origin;Expression(C) = (y^2 = 4*x);Focus(C) = F;PointOnCurve(A, C);PointOnCurve(P, Directrix(C));Abs(LineSegmentOf(A, F)) = 5

text: 已知$F$是抛物线$y^{2}=-16 x$的焦点，$O$为坐标原点，点$P$是抛物线准线上的一动点，点$A$在抛物线上，且$|A F|=8$，则$|P A|+|P O|$的最小值为?
fact_expressions: G: Parabola;A: Point;F: Point;P: Point;O: Origin;Expression(G) = (y^2 = -16*x);Focus(G) = F;PointOnCurve(P, Directrix(G));PointOnCurve(A, G);Abs(LineSegmentOf(A, F)) = 8

text: 抛物线$y^{2}=2 p y(p>0)$上的点到其准线距离最小值为$1$，则$p$=?
fact_expressions: G: Parabola;Expression(G) = (y^2=2*p*y);p: Number;p>0;H: Point;PointOnCurve(H, G);Min(Distance(H, Directrix(G))) = 1

text: 双曲线$4 x^{2}-y^{2}-4=0$上一点$P$到它的一个焦点的距离等于$3$,那么点$P$到另一个焦点的距离等于?
fact_expressions: G: Hyperbola;P: Point;Expression(G) = (4*x^2 - y^2 - 4 = 0);PointOnCurve(P, G);F1:Point;F2:Point;OneOf(Focus(G))=F1;OneOf(Focus(G))=F2;Negation(F1=F2);Distance(P, F1) = 3

l: Line;E: Ellipse;b: Number;a: Number;P: Point;F2: Point;Q: Point;F1: Point;a > b;b > 0;Expression(E) = (y^2/b^2 + x^2/a^2 = 1);LeftFocus(E) = F1;RightFocus(E) = F2;PointOnCurve(F2,l);Intersection(l, E) = {P, Q};Abs(LineSegmentOf(P, F2)) = 2*Abs(LineSegmentOf(Q,F2));Abs(LineSegmentOf(Q,F1))=3*Abs(LineSegmentOf(Q,F2))

text: 已知$F$为抛物线$y^{2}=4 x$的焦点，过$F$作斜率为$k_{1}$的直线和抛物线交于$A$、$B$两点，延长$A M$ , $B M$交抛物线于$C$，$D$两点，直线$C D$的斜率为$k_{2}$若$M(4,0)$，则$\frac{k_{1}}{k_{2}}$=?
fact_expressions: G: Parabola;H: Line;D: Point;C: Point;A: Point;M: Point;B: Point;F: Point;k2: Number;k1: Number;Expression(G) = (y^2 = 4*x);Coordinate(M) = (4, 0);Focus(G) = F;PointOnCurve(F, H);Slope(H) = k1;Intersection(H, G) = {A, B};Intersection(OverlappingLine(LineSegmentOf(A, M)), G) = C;Intersection(OverlappingLine(LineSegmentOf(B, M)), G) = D;Slope(LineOf(C, D)) = k2

text: 已知抛物线$C$: $y^{2}=4 x$的焦点为$F$，准线与$x$轴的交点为$H$，点$P$在$C$上，且$|P H|=\frac{\sqrt{5}}{2}|P F|$，则$\Delta P F H$的面积为?
fact_expressions: C: Parabola;P: Point;F: Point;H: Point;Expression(C) = (y^2 = 4*x);Focus(C) = F;Intersection(Directrix(C), xAxis) = H;PointOnCurve(P, C);Abs(LineSegmentOf(P, H)) = (sqrt(5)/2)*Abs(LineSegmentOf(P, F))

text: 已知双曲线$C$: $\frac{x^{2}}{a^{2}}-\frac{y^{2}}{b^{2}}=1(a>0, b>0)$的左、右焦点分别为$F_{1}$、$F_{2}$，过$F_{2}$作$x$轴的垂线与双曲线交于$M$、$N$两点，且$\overrightarrow{N F_{1}} \cdot \overrightarrow{M F_{1}}<0$，则双曲线$C$的离心率的取值范围是?
fact_expressions: C: Hyperbola;a: Number;b: Number;N: Point;M: Point;F1: Point;F2: Point;a>0;b>0;Expression(C) = (-y^2/b^2 + x^2/a^2 = 1);LeftFocus(C) = F1;RightFocus(C) = F2;H: Line;PointOnCurve(F2,H);IsPerpendicular(H,xAxis);Intersection(H, C) = {M, N};DotProduct(VectorOf(N, F1), VectorOf(M, F1)) < 0

text: 抛物线$y^{2}=2 p x(p>0)$的焦点为$F$、$O$为坐标原点，$M$为抛物线上一点，且$|M F|=3|O F|$, $\Delta M F O$的面积为$16 \sqrt{2}$，则抛物线的方程为?
fact_expressions: G: Parabola;Expression(G) = (y^2 = 2*(p*x));p: Number;p>0;F: Point;Focus(G) = F;O: Origin;M: Point;PointOnCurve(M, G) = True;Abs(LineSegmentOf(M, F)) = 3*Abs(LineSegmentOf(O, F));Area(TriangleOf(M, F, O)) = 16*sqrt(2)
C1: Hyperbola;a: Number;C2: Hyperbola;b: Number;a>0;b>0;Expression(C1) = (y^2/a^2 - x^2/b^2 = 1);Expression(C2) = (x^2/4 - y^2 = 1);Asymptote(C1) = Asymptote(C2)

text: $AB$是过$\frac{x^{2}}{16}-\frac{y^{2}}{9}=1$右焦点$F$的弦，过$A$作右准线的垂线$AA_{1}$,$A_{1}$为垂足，连接$BA_{1}$交$x$轴 于$C$点，则$C$的坐标是?
fact_expressions: A: Point;B: Point;A1: Point;F: Point;G:Curve;C:Point;Expression(G)=(x^2/16-y^2/9=1);IsChordOf(LineSegmentOf(A,B),G);PointOnCurve(F,LineSegmentOf(A,B));RightFocus(G)=F;PointOnCurve(A,LineSegmentOf(A,A1));IsPerpendicular(RightDirectrix(G),LineSegmentOf(A,A1));FootPoint(RightDirectrix(G),LineSegmentOf(A,A1))=A1;Intersection(LineSegmentOf(B,A1),xAxis)=C

text: 焦点在$x$轴上的椭圆$\frac{x^{2}}{25}+\frac{y^{2}}{k}=1$的离心率为$\frac{3}{5}$，则$k$=?
fact_expressions: G: Ellipse;k: Number;Expression(G) = (x^2/25 + y^2/k = 1);PointOnCurve(Focus(G), xAxis);Eccentricity(G) = 3/5

text: 过椭圆$\frac{x^{2}}{9}+\frac{y^{2}}{5}=1$的右焦点$F$作斜率为$k$的直线$l$与椭圆相交于$A$、$B$两点，若$\overrightarrow{A F}=2 \overrightarrow{F B}$，则$k$=?
fact_expressions: l: Line;G: Ellipse;A: Point;F: Point;B: Point;k: Number;Expression(G) = (x^2/9 + y^2/5 = 1);RightFocus(G) = F;PointOnCurve(F, l);Slope(l) = k;Intersection(l, G) = {A, B};VectorOf(A, F) = 2*VectorOf(F, B)

text: 设$e$是椭圆$\frac{x^{2}}{a}+\frac{y^{2}}{4}=1$的离心率，若$e \in(\frac{1}{2}, \frac{\sqrt{3}}{2}]$，则$a$的取值范围是?
fact_expressions: G: Ellipse;Expression(G) = (y^2/4 + x^2/a = 1);a: Number;e: Number;Eccentricity(G) = e;In(e,(1/2, sqrt(3)/2])

text: 若抛物线$y^{2}=-2 p x(p>0)$的准线为圆$x^{2}+y^{2}-4 x=0$的一条切线，则抛物线的标准方程为?
fact_expressions: G: Parabola;Expression(G) = (y^2 = -2*p*x);p: Number;p>0;H: Circle;Expression(H) = (-4*x + x^2 + y^2 = 0);IsTangent(H, Directrix(G)) = True

text: 设动点$A$的轨迹为抛物线$y^{2}=4 x$，点$B(2,0)$为定点.若线段$A B$的中点为点$P$，则点$P$的轨迹方程为?
fact_expressions: G: Parabola;A: Point;B: Point;P: Point;Expression(G) = (y^2 = 4*x);Coordinate(B) = (2, 0);MidPoint(LineSegmentOf(A, B)) = P;PointOnCurve(A, G)

text: 已知$\triangle ABC$外接圆半径$R=\frac{14 \sqrt{3}}{3}$，且$\angle ABC=120^{\circ}$, $BC=10$，边$BC$在$x$轴上且$y$轴垂直平分$BC$边，则过点$A$且以$B$、$C$为焦点的双曲线方程为?

text: 双曲线$y^{2}-x^{2}=1$的焦点坐标为?

text: 已知$O$为坐标原点，抛物线$C$: $y^{2}=2 p x$上一点$A$到焦点$F$的距离为$4$，若点$M$为抛物线$C$准线上的动点，若$\overrightarrow{M F}=3 \overrightarrow{F A}$，则$p$=?
fact_expressions: C: Parabola;p: Number;M: Point;F: Point;A: Point;O: Origin;Expression(C) = (y^2 = 2*p*x);PointOnCurve(A, C);Focus(C) = F;Distance(A, F) = 4;PointOnCurve(M, Directrix(C));VectorOf(M, F) = 3*VectorOf(F, A)

text: 已知$x_{0}<0$,$M(x_{0}, 0)$,$O$为坐标原点，若在抛物线$C$: $y^{2}=4 x$上存在点$N$，使得$\angle O M N=45^{\circ}$，则$x_{0}$的取值范围是?

text: 已知点$A(-\frac{1}{2}, 0)$，抛物线$y^{2}=2 x$的焦点为$F$，点$P$在抛物线上，且$|A P|=\sqrt{2}|P F|$，则$|O P|$=?

text: 已知椭圆$M$: $\frac{x^{2}}{a^{2}}+\frac{y^{2}}{b^{2}}=1(a>b>0)$的左、右焦点分别为$F_{1}$、$F_{2}$，抛物线$N$:$ y^{2}=2 p x$的焦点为$F_{2}$. 若$P$为$M$与$N$的一个公共点，且$|P F_{1}|=\sqrt{2}|P F_{2}|$，则$M$的离心率为?
fact_expressions: N: Parabola;p: Number;M: Ellipse;a: Number;b: Number;P: Point;F1: Point;F2: Point;Expression(N) = (y^2 = 2*(p*x));a > b;b > 0;Expression(M) = (y^2/b^2 + x^2/a^2 = 1);LeftFocus(M) = F1;RightFocus(M) = F2;Focus(N) = F2;OneOf(Intersection(M,N))=P;Abs(LineSegmentOf(P, F1)) = sqrt(2)*Abs(LineSegmentOf(P, F2))

text: 已知$A$、$B$分别为椭圆$\frac{x^{2}}{4}+\frac{y^{2}}{3}=1$的左、右顶点，点$M$、$N$为椭圆上的两个动点，满足线段$M N$与$x$轴垂直，则直线$M A$与$N B$交点的轨迹方程为?

text: 已知直线$l$过椭圆$C$: $\frac{x^{2}}{2}+y^{2}=1$的左焦点$F$且交椭圆$C$于$A$、$B$两点，$O$为坐标原点. 若$\overrightarrow{O A} \cdot \overrightarrow{O B}=0$，过点$O$作直线$A B$的垂线，垂足为$H$，则点$H$为?

text: 已知点$P$在曲线$C$: $y=\frac{1}{2} x^{2}$上，曲线$C$在点$P$处的切线为$l$，过点$P$且与直线$l$垂直的直线与曲线$C$的另一交点为$Q$、$O$为坐标原点，若$OP \perp OQ$，则点$P$的纵坐标为?

text: 已知焦点在$x$轴上的双曲线的渐近线方程是$y=\pm 2 x$，则此双曲线的离心率是?

text: 已知方程$\frac{x^{2}}{5+k}+\frac{y^{2}}{4-2 k}=1$表示椭圆，则$k$的取值范围为?

text: 设$F_{1}$、$F_{2}$为椭圆$\frac{x^{2}}{9}+\frac{y^{2}}{5}=1$的左, 右焦点，点$P$在椭圆上，若线段$P F_{1}$的中点在$y$轴上，则$\frac{| P F_{2} |}{|P F_{1}|}$的值为?

text: 若双曲线$\frac{x^{2}}{a^{2}}-\frac{y^{2}}{b^{2}}=1(a>0, b>0)$的离心率为$\frac{2 \sqrt{3}}{3}$，则直线$y=\frac{b}{a} x$的倾斜角为?

text: $F$为抛物线$C$: $y^{2}=4 x$的焦点，过$F$且斜率为$k$的直线$l$与抛物线交于$P$、$Q$两点，线段$P Q$的垂直平分线交$x$轴于点$M$，且$|P Q|=6$，则$|M F|$=?

text: 已知抛物线$x^{2}=4 y$上一点$A$到$x$轴的距离为$m$，到直线$x+2 y+8=0$的距离为$n$，则$m+n$的最小值为?

text: 过双曲线$\frac{y^{2}}{3}-x^{2}=1$上任一点$P$向两渐近线作垂线，垂足分别为$A$、$B$，则$|A B|$的最小值为?
fact_expressions: G: Hyperbola;A: Point;B: Point;Expression(G) = (-x^2 + y^2/3 = 1);P:Point;PointOnCurve(P,G);L1:Line;L2:Line;Asymptote(G)={L1,L2};H1:Line;H2:Line;PointOnCurve(P,H1);PointOnCurve(P,H2);IsPerpendicular(H1,L1);IsPerpendicular(H2,L2);FootPoint(H1,L1)=A;FootPoint(H2,L2)=B

text: 若双曲线的渐近线的方程为$y=\pm 3 x$，且经过点$(2 ,-3  \sqrt{3})$，则双曲线的方程是?
fact_expressions: G: Hyperbola;H: Point;Coordinate(H) = (2, -3*sqrt(3));Expression(Asymptote(G)) = (y = pm*(3*x));PointOnCurve(H, G)

text: 椭圆$\frac{x^{2}}{2}+y^{2}=1$被直线$y=x-1$截得的弦长为?
fact_expressions: G: Ellipse;H: Line;Expression(G) = (x^2/2 + y^2 = 1);Expression(H) = (y = x - 1)

text: 已知$A$、$B$是椭圆$C$: $\frac{x^{2}}{a^{2}}+\frac{y^{2}}{b^{2}}=1(a>b>0)$的左、右顶点，$P$为$C$上一点，设直线$P A$,$P B$的斜率分别为$k_{1}$, $k_{2}$，若$k_{1} k_{2}=-\frac{4}{9}$，则椭圆的离心率为?
fact_expressions: C: Ellipse;b: Number;a: Number;A: Point;P: Point;B: Point;a > b;b > 0;Expression(C) = (y^2/b^2 + x^2/a^2 = 1);LeftVertex(C) = A;RightVertex(C) = B;PointOnCurve(P, C);Slope(LineOf(P, A))=k1;Slope(LineOf(P, B)) = k2;k1:Number;k2:Number;k1*k2 = -4/9

text: 已知抛物线$C$: $y^{2}=-4 x$的焦点$F$ ,$ A(-1,1)$，则曲线$C$上的动点$P$到点$F$与点$A$的距离之和的最小值为?
fact_expressions: C: Parabola;F: Point;P:Point;A:Point;Expression(C) = (y^2 = -4*x);Focus(C) = F;Coordinate(A) = (-1, 1);PointOnCurve(P,C)

text: 焦点分别为$(-2,0)$,$(2,0)$且经过点$(2,3)$的双曲线的标准方程为?
fact_expressions: G: Hyperbola;H: Point;I: Point;J: Point;Coordinate(H) = (-2, 0);Coordinate(I) = (2, 0);Coordinate(J) = (2, 3);Focus(G) = {H,I};PointOnCurve(J,G)

text: 若双曲线$\frac{x^{2}}{a^{2}}-\frac{y^{2}}{b^{2}}=1(a>0, b>0)$的一条渐近线的倾斜角为$60^{\circ}$，则$\frac{b^{2}+1}{a}$的取值范围是?
fact_expressions: G: Hyperbola;Expression(G) = (-y^2/b^2 + x^2/a^2 = 1);b: Number;a: Number;a>0;b>0;Inclination(OneOf(Asymptote(G))) = ApplyUnit(60, degree)

text: 设椭圆$C$:$ \frac{x^{2}}{2}+y^{2}=1$的左焦点为$F$，直线$l$: $x-y+2=0$.动点$P$在椭圆$C$上，记点$P$到直线$l$的距离为$d$，则$|P F |-d$的最大值是?
fact_expressions: l: Line;C: Ellipse;P: Point;F: Point;Expression(C) = (x^2/2 + y^2 = 1);Expression(l)=(x-y+2=0);LeftFocus(C) = F;PointOnCurve(P, C);Distance(P, l) = d;d:Number

text: 已知点$P$是椭圆$C$: $\frac{x^{2}}{a^{2}}+\frac{y^{2}}{b^{2}}=1(a>b>0)$上一点，$P$与椭圆上、下顶点连线的斜率之积为$-\frac{4}{9}$，则$C$的离心率为?
fact_expressions: C: Ellipse;b: Number;a: Number;P: Point;a > b;b > 0;Expression(C) = (y^2/b^2 + x^2/a^2 = 1);PointOnCurve(P, C);Slope(LineSegmentOf(P, UpperVertex(C)))*Slope(LineSegmentOf(P, LowerVertex(C))) = -4/9
G: Ellipse;t: Number;Expression(G) = (x^2/25 + y^2/t = 1);Focus(G) = {F1,F2};F1: Point;F2: Point;Distance(F1,F2) = 6

text: 已知$A$、$B$为抛物线$y^{2}=4 x$上的两个动点，且$O A \perp O B$，抛物线的焦点为$F$，则$\triangle A B F$面积的最小值为?
fact_expressions: G: Parabola;O: Origin;A: Point;B: Point;F: Point;Expression(G) = (y^2 = 4*x);PointOnCurve(A, G);PointOnCurve(B, G);IsPerpendicular(LineSegmentOf(O, A), LineSegmentOf(O, B));Focus(G) = F

text: 设抛物线$y^{2}=2 x$的焦点为$F$，过点$F$的直线与抛物线相交于$A$、$B$两点（点$A$在第一象限），若$\overrightarrow{A F}=2 \overrightarrow{F B}$，则$|A B|$=?
fact_expressions: G: Parabola;H: Line;A: Point;F: Point;B: Point;Expression(G) = (y^2 = 2*x);Focus(G) = F;PointOnCurve(F, H);Intersection(H, G) = {A, B};Quadrant(A) = 1;VectorOf(A, F) = 2*VectorOf(F, B)

text: 已知抛物线的方程是$y=a x^{2}$，则它的焦点坐标为?
fact_expressions: G: Parabola;Expression(G) = (y = a*x^2);a: Number

text: 若双曲线$C$: $x^{2}-\frac{y^{2}}{b^{2}}=1(b>0)$的渐近线方程为$y=\pm 7 x$，则$b$=?
fact_expressions: C: Hyperbola;b: Number;b>0;Expression(C)=(x^2-y^2/b^2 = 1);Expression(Asymptote(C))=(y=pm*7*x)

text: 已知椭圆$T$:$\frac{{x^2}}{a^2}+\frac{{y^2}}{b^2}=1(a>b>0)$的离心率为$\frac{{\sqrt{2}}}2$，右焦点$F(1,0)$，三角形$ABC$的三个顶点都在椭圆$T$上，设它的三条边$AB$、$BC$、$AC$的中点分别为$D$、$E$、$M$，且三条边所在直线的斜率分别$k_1$、$k_2$、$k_3$，且$k_1$、$k_2$、$k_3$均不为$0$，$O$为坐标原点。若直线$O D$、$O E$、$O M$的斜率之和为$1$，则$\frac{1}{k_{1}}+\frac{1}{k_{2}}+\frac{1}{k_{3}}$=?
fact_expressions: T: Ellipse;Expression(T) = (x^2/a^2 + y^2/b^2 = 1);a: Number;b: Number;a > b;b > 0;Eccentricity(T) = sqrt(2)/2;F: Point;Coordinate(F) = (1, 0);RightFocus(T) = F;A: Point;B: Point;C: Point;PointOnCurve(Vertex(TriangleOf(A, B, C)), T) = True;MidPoint(LineSegmentOf(A, B)) = D;MidPoint(LineSegmentOf(B, C)) = E;MidPoint(LineSegmentOf(A, C)) = M;D: Point;E: Point;M: Point;k1: Number;k2: Number;k3: Number;Slope(OverlappingLine(LineSegmentOf(A, B))) = k1;Slope(OverlappingLine(LineSegmentOf(B, C))) = k2;Slope(OverlappingLine(LineSegmentOf(A, C))) = k3;Negation(k1 = 0);Negation(k2 = 0);Negation(k3 = 0);O: Origin;Slope(LineOf(O, D)) + Slope(LineOf(O, E)) + Slope(LineOf(O, M)) = 1

text: 双曲线$\frac{x^{2}}{a^{2}}-\frac{y^{2}}{b^{2}}=1(a>0, b>0)$经过点$(\sqrt{3}, 2)$，且离心率为$3$，则它的虚轴长是?
fact_expressions: G: Hyperbola;b: Number;a: Number;H: Point;a>0;b>0;Expression(G) = (-y^2/b^2 + x^2/a^2 = 1);Coordinate(H) = (sqrt(3), 2);PointOnCurve(H, G);Eccentricity(G)=3

text: 过抛物线$y=\frac{1}{4} x^{2}$焦点的直线与此抛物线交于$A$ , $B$两点，$A$ , $B$中点的纵坐标为$2$，则弦$AB$的长度为?
fact_expressions: G: Parabola;Expression(G) = (y = x^2/4);H: Line;PointOnCurve(Focus(G), H);A: Point;B: Point;Intersection(H, G) = {A, B};YCoordinate(MidPoint(LineSegmentOf(A, B))) = 2;IsChordOf(LineSegmentOf(A, B), G)

text: 经过点$P(1,-2)$作椭圆$3 x^{2}+4 y^{2}=24$的弦$A B$，使得点$P$平分弦$A B$，则弦$A B$所在直线的方程为?
fact_expressions: G: Ellipse;A: Point;B: Point;P: Point;Expression(G) = (3*x^2 + 4*y^2 = 24);Coordinate(P) = (1, -2);PointOnCurve(P, LineSegmentOf(A, B));IsChordOf(LineSegmentOf(A, B), G);MidPoint(LineSegmentOf(A, B)) = P

text: 中心在坐标原点，一个焦点为$(5,0)$，且以直线$y=\pm \frac{3}{4} x$为渐近线的双曲线方程为?
fact_expressions: G: Hyperbola;O: Origin;Center(G) = O;H: Line;Expression(H) = (y = pm*((3/4)*x));Asymptote(G) = H;Coordinate(OneOf(Focus(G)))=(5,0)

text: 已知抛物线$C$: $y=\frac{1}{4} x^{2}$的焦点为$F$，其准线与坐标轴交于点$E$，过$F$的直线$l$与抛物线$C$交于$A$、$B$两点，若$3 \overrightarrow{E F}=\overrightarrow{E A}+2 \overrightarrow{E B}$，则直线$l$的斜率$k$=?
fact_expressions: l: Line;C: Parabola;E: Point;F: Point;A: Point;B: Point;k: Number;Expression(C) = (y = x^2/4);Focus(C) = F;Intersection(Directrix(C),axis)=E;PointOnCurve(F, l);Intersection(l, C) = {A, B};3*VectorOf(E, F) = VectorOf(E, A) + 2*VectorOf(E, B);Slope(l) = k

text: 若动圆过定点$A(-3,0)$且和定圆$C$:$(x-3)^{2}+y^{2}=4$外切，则动圆圆心$P$的轨迹方程是?

text: 已知$F$为抛物线$y^{2}=6 x$的焦点，$P$为抛物线上的任意一点，点$B(4,3)$，则$|P B|+|P F|$的最小值为?

text: 已知直线$l$分别切抛物线$x^{2}=2 p y  (p>0)$和圆$x^{2}+(y+1)^{2}=1$于点$A$, $B$($A$, $B$不重合)，点$F$为抛物线的焦点，当$|A F|$取得最小值时，$p$=?

text: 若抛物线$y^{2}=2 p x(p>0)$上一点到焦点和到抛物线对称轴的距离分别为$5$和$4$，则抛物线的方程为?

text: 已知双曲线$\frac{x^{2}}{a^{2}}-\frac{y^{2}}{b^{2}}=1(a>0, b>0)$的一个焦点为$(3 , 0)$ , 一个顶点为$(1,0)$，那么其渐近线方程为?

text: 已知$F$是抛物线$y^{2}=4 x$的焦点，其准线与$x$轴交于$P$点，过$P$的直线$l$与抛物线交于$A$、$B$两点，设$F A$, $F B$的斜率分别为$m$, $n$,则$\frac{m}{n}$=?

text: 抛物线$C$: $y^{2}=2 p x$的焦点坐标为$F(\frac{1}{2} , 0)$，则抛物线$C$的方程为?若点$P$在抛物线$C$上运动，点$Q$在直线$x+y+5=0$上运动，则$P Q$的最小值等于?

text: 若椭圆$\frac{x^{2}}{16}+\frac{y^{2}}{7}=1$和双曲线$x^{2}-\frac{y^{2}}{8}=1$有相同的焦点$F_{1}$, $F_{2}$，点$P$是两条曲线的一个交点，则$P F_{1} \bullet PF_{2}$的值是?
